K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385a-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta sya gu hya siddhya rtha aa bhi sa ma ya he tu sarba bo dhi satva sya tsarya sa mu dra de sha buddhoshnshi sha sh'u rangga n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385a-5: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385a-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-0: bcom ldan @385b 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-1: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-3: sh'akya'i sras po chos la dbang thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-4: srid pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-5: grong khyer gyi skye bo la sman par mdzad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-6: sangs rgyas dang lhan cig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-7: tshos kyi tshul ston par nus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-9: khams gsum las 'phags pa'i spobs pa can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-11: gdul bya sgrol bar byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-13: sdug bsngal gyi 'obs las brgal ba sha stag la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-15: nyan thos chen po sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-16: moonggal gyi bu chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-18: gang po byams ma'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-20: nye rgyal sogs nyan thos chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-21: gzhan yang rang rgyal slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge 'dun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:385b-22: gsar du zhugs pa'i nyan thos grangs med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu dbyar gnas pa las dgag dbye'i dus su phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang the tshom gcod pa'i slod du bcom ldan 'das la chos ston par gsol bar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la thugs brtse bas rjes su gdams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-0: gsang ba'i gnas yongs su zhu bar 'khod @386a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-1: pa na; bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gsang ba 'di 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir gdan bshams pa la sku drang por bsrangs nas bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-2: 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis thos par dka' ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-3: gsung ka la pingga'i dbyangs kyis phyogs bcur khyab par mdzad de ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-4: de'i tshe gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang 'dus par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dbyangs gtso bor gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-6: dus de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi yab kyi dus mchod bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod gsol bar pho brang du gdan drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-7: rang nyid kyis bsus te zhal zas bla na med pa'i ro mchog dang ldan pa rgya chen po bshams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang thabs cig tu gdan drangs shing pho brang gi bram ze dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-9: rig byed mkhas pa rnams kyang dus ston la mgron du gnyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-10: de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rang rang gis gnas su dus ston gsol bar 'dod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal dbyangs la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386a-12: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-0: dgra bcom pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gi khyim so sor dus ston spyod par byed du chu gcig gsung ngo @386b kun dga' bo ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-1: snga logs shig nas gzhan zhig tu phyin nas dus ston der ma 'dus pa las re zhig na gnas brtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-2: slob dpon gzhan med par rang nyid gcig pur 'ongs pa na gdugs tshod yol bas lhung bzed thogs te bsod snyoms la khyim nas khyim du rgyu ba na 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-3: bdag gis ci nas kyang sbyin bdag mchog gam dman pa yang rung ste; rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-4: gdol ba'i rigs sogs gtsang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-5: smad pa mtha' dag snyoms par sems pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-6: sbyin pa po mtha' dag gi dge ba dpag tu med pa rdzogs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:386b-9: rab 'byor la 'di skad ces nyan thos chen po khyed cag gis sems mi snyoms pa ma byed cig ces nan tar zlog par mdzad pas so; ;zhes sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la brten te sems kyi sgrib pa bsal te the tshom dang smad par 'gyur ba'i gnas spangs te lam srang mthar gyis bgrod nas pho brang gi sgor sleb pa na gzugs drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du byas nas slong ba'i spyod lam zhi bas rgyu ba'i tshe smad tshong ma'i sgo khang du sleb pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-0: sgyu ma'i g-yo thabs kyi 'phrul can ma tingga dang phrad pa na des ka pi la zhes bye ba'i tshangs pa'i rig sngags btab bas kun dga' bo rang dbang med par rig sngags kyis gzir te rjes su 'brangs nas khang par sleb pa na nom nyug @387a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-2: mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo sgyu ma'i sngags rdzas kyis gzir ba mngon par mkhyen nas la 'ur zhal zas gsol te phyir gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-7: rje'u rigs rnams 'dus te bcom ldan 'das las chos nyan pa'i phyir slad kyis 'brangs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'jigs pa med pa'i nor bu brgya pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer spros pa'i rtse mor padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ba la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i gzugs skyil krung gis bzhugs pas gsang sngags kyi tshigs bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-11: khyod kyis rig sngags 'dis kun dga' bo bskyab par gyis la sgyu ma'i sngags rdzas 'jig par gyis shig gsungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-12: 'jam dpal gyis bka' ji lta ba bzhin bgyis pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-13: ma tingga dang kun dga' bo yang 'jam dpal gyi slad bzhin bcom ldan 'das ga la bar 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-14: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang phyag 'tshal te mchim blags nas ji ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387a-15: bdag sngon nas mang du thos pa lags na'ang rtogs pa'i chos kyi rom myong snyam du 'gyod pas gdungs bzhin du gus pa chen pos nan tar gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-0: phyogs @387b bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub mngon du mdzad pa'i zhi lhag gi ting nge 'dzin phul du byung ba bde blag tu 'thob pa'i thabs bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-1: de'i tshe gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-2: gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i nyan thos chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs la zhugs pa mang po dag kyang chos ston pa nyan par 'dod pas mchis shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-4: rna ba blags te cang mi smra bar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-6: khyod bdag dang rigs gcig pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-7: sngon chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bstan pa'i tshul la legs pa ci zhig mthong nas drin dang ldan zhing snying du sdug pa dang phangs pa dag bor nas rab tu byung bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-9: kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis spras pa ngo mtshar zhing dag cing gsal ba gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa mthong nas rtag tu 'di ltar sems lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-10: bee d'urya ltar rnam par dag pa'i sku'i bkod pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-11: 'dod pa dang sred pa'i zag pa dang 'dres pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-14: dri ma dang snyigs ma mi gtsang bas sbrel pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:387b-16: ngo mtshar zhing khyad par du 'phags pa gser btsom lta bur dag cing gsal ba'i sku'i bkod pa de lta bu 'khrungs par mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-1: sems gus pas dad cing skra bregs te khyod kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-5: khyed cag gis 'di ltar blta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-6: thog ma med pa nas skye 'chi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas 'khor ba na rang gi de kho na nyid dag cing 'od gsal ba rtag tu gnas pa ma rtogs pas mngon zhe na nye bar blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-8: gsog 'ba' zhig pas na kun tu brgyud mar 'khor zhing 'phyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-9: khyod da ste bla na med pa'i byang chub don dam pa'i de kho na nyid nan tan du tshol bar sems na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-10: rnam par dag pa'i yid kyis lan smros shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-11: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bgrod pa gcig pa'i dbu ma'i lam 'di sa skye 'chi brgal ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-12: sems dang ngag dbu ma'i lam du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-13: mthar thug pa'i bar gyis dang lam la gnas pa thams cad kyang dbu ma'i lam 'di las rnam pa gzhan du 'dren pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-15: kho bos khyod la dri bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-16: khyod kyis dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sems can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-17: ji ltar na mtshan bzang por blta bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-18: gang gis na blta bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388a-21: kho bos mig dang yid kyis mthong zhing 'dod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-0: mig gis gsal bar bcom ldan @388b 'das kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa mthong ba las yid kyis mngon par 'dod pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-1: de ltar na bdag gis skye 'chi spangs par 'khums [?] lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-3: khyod kyis mig gis mthong zhing yid kyis 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-4: mig dang yid gang la gnas pa ma shes na nyon mongs dang sdug bsngal spang bar mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-5: dper na; rgyal po 'ga' zhig chom po ba 'ongs pa dmag gis bzlog par 'dod pa na dmag gi dpung des kyang chom po pa gang du gnas pa shes par bya dgos pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-6: mig dang yid dag nyid kyis 'khor bar bsdams pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-7: mig dang yid dag nyid gang du gnas pa khyod la dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-10: 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad sems can du gdags pa'i rnam grangs bcus bsdus pa so so ba nyid na'ang de dag thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa lus kyi nang du gnas par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mthon mthing padma lta bu yang zhal gyi dkyil 'khor du mchis par blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-12: bdag gi yul bzhi 'dzin pa'i dbang po gzugs can dvangs pa bzhi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-13: bdag gi gzugs nyid la gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-14: bdag gi rnam par shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-15: lus kyi nang du gnas par blta lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:388b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-0: da lta khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'dun sar @389a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-1: gnas pa na rgyal byed kyi tshal gang du gnas par blta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-4: chos kyi 'dun sa rnam par dag pa'i kun dga' ra ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-5: mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-10: khyod kyis chos kyi 'dun sa 'dir je ci zhig mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-13: bdag gis je bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-15: phyi logs su kun dga' ra ba tshal dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-19: khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba tshal dang bcas pa mthong ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-22: kun dga' ra ba gseng yab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-23: mthong rgya che ba 'di'i nang du bdag gnas bzhin du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-24: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang kyi 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas kun dga' bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'khor 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rgyal po spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389a-26: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i lam 'di nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-0: sgo 'di nyid nas @389b mngon par gshegs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-1: khyod kyis legs par nyon cig gsungs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-2: kun dga' bos phyag 'tshal te gus pas 'dud cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba gseng yab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-4: mthong rgya che ba 'di'i nang du gnas bzhin du phyi'i kun dga' ra ba nags tshal dang bcas pa mthong bar smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-5: ci sems can 'ga' zhig 'dir gnas bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bar kun dga' ra ba'i phyi logs mthong ba lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-8: sems can 'ga' zhig 'dir gnas bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bar kun dga' ra ba'i phyi logs mthong ba 'ga' yang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-10: kun dga' bo; khyod nyid de kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-11: khyod kyis rnam par shes pa gsal ba nyid na thams cad gsal bar rigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-12: khyod kyi rnam par shes pa gsal ba lus kyi nang na lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-13: de lta na lus kyi nang nyid gsal bar rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:389b-14: sems can gyi nang na 'ga' zhig thog mar shes pas lus kyi nang gsal bar byas nas gzod phyi'i yo byad gsal bar byed pa 'ga' mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-0: rtsa rgyu sa g-yo ba yang mi gsal bar snang bzhin du shes pa @390a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-5: nges par nang gsal ba nyid ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-6: phyi gsal ba nyid du lta ga la 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-9: khyod kyis rnam par shes pa gsal zhing rig pa lus kyi nang du yod par smras pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-11: kun dga' bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-12: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dbyings 'di 'tshal ba ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-13: gdon mi za bar rnam par shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-14: lus kyi phyi na gnas par 'khums lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-17: khang pa'i phug tu sbar ba'i sgron me nang gsal ba nyid kyis sgo nas khyams cher gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-18: sems can thams cad kyis nang gi bdag nyid mi gsal bar lus kyi phyi rol gsal ba 'di yang mar me'i 'od kyis phyi'i dngos po gsal bar byed kyi nang gi dngos po ma yin pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-21: gdon mi za bar ston pa'i dgongs pa la 'bab par 'gyur ba kho na lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-23: khyod kyis gang nga'i rjes su 'brangs te mnyan yod nas kham gyi zas bsod snyoms la rgyu bas rgyal byed kyi tshal du zas spangs pa'i dge slong la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390a-24: ci gcig gis 'tshal ma 'tshal bas thams cad 'grangs par 'gyur lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390b-4: dge slong 'di dag dge slong nyid du mtshungs na'ang lus dang srog tha dad pa lags pas ji ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390b-5: gcig gis 'tshal ma 'tshal bas thams cad 'grangs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:390b-7: rnam par shes pa gsal zhing rig pa phyi rol tu mchis na lus dang sems tha dad pas 'brel ba med par 'gyur la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-5: zhing de dag thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po ji snyed cig yod pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi zhing na 'khod bzhin du thal mo sbyar te chos ston pa la mnyan par sems shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-7: sems can rnams thog ma med pa nas shing tog aa kra gu dang mtshungs pa'i phyin ci log gi rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las kyi sa bon dang gis smin pas; kun tu dka' thub spyod pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-10: gzhan yang mu stegs byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-12: bdud kyi ris kyi dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-13: bdud kyi sde thams cad du 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:395b-15: rgyud kyi rnam grangs gnyis mi shes par gzhan du 'khrul pa la zhugs pa dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-0: bye ma btsos pa la zas kyi mchog @396a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-1: tu 'gyur bar rlom pa dang mtshungs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-2: rdul phra rab snyed kyi bskal pa'i bar du brtson par byas kyang byang chub 'thob par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-4: rnam grangs gnyis yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-7: thog ma med pa'i skye 'chi'i rtsa ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-8: da lta khyod cag sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa can gyis sems nyid rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin du blta ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-10: thog ma med pa nas 'bral du med pa'i byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-11: myang 'das rnam par byang ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-12: da lta khyod kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-13: rnam 'gyur thams cad skyed par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-14: rang gi ngo bo rnyed par dka' ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-15: sems can rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo yongs su stor bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-16: nyin bzhin du 'bad par byas kyang phyin ci log gi rigs sna tshogs su don med par 'khyams par gyur te rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-17: kun dga' bo; da ste ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyis skye 'chi'i rang bzhin spong bar 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396a-20: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gser gyi mdog can khu tshur mdzad nas brkyang ste kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gser gyi mdog can gyis bdag gi yid dang mig snang bar byas lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-4: khyod kyis ci zhig gis mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-6: bdag cag 'khor 'dus pas mig gis mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-8: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gser gyi mdog can gyis khyod kyi mig dang yid snang bar byas par smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-9: khyod kyi mig gis mthong mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-10: khyod kyi sems gang zhig bdag gi phyag gis snang bar bgyi ba'i yul du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems gang du gnas pa 'dri na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-13: bdag gis sems btsal te dpyad cing nan tar gtugs pa na dpyod cing gtugs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-14: sems lags so snyam du sems so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-19: kun dga' bo dngangs te stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-20: 'di nyid bdag gi sems ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-21: ci zhig bdag gi sems yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-24: phyi rol don gyis stongs pa'i sems kyi rnam pa rdzun pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-25: yang dag pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin rnyog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:396b-26: khyod kyis thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du rkun po la rang gi bur rlom pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-0: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid stor bas na 'khor bar 'khor @397a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi nu bo tha chung lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-5: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon par dad pas rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-6: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid la bsnyen bkur ba nas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi zhing khams kyi mthar thug pa'i bcom ldan 'das bshes gnyen la dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa'i snying stobs chen po bskyed de bya bar dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pa mtha' dag sems 'di kho na'i bgyi ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-7: dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba smad par byed pa rnams kyang sems 'di nyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-8: da lta rnam par dpyod pa'i sems 'di nyid ma yin par gsungs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-11: sa dang shing lta bur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-12: sems gsal ba nyid dang bral na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-17: 'di sems nyid ma yin par gsungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-18: bdag dngangs par ma zad nyan thos 'di dag kyang the tshom med pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-19: thugs rje chen pos bdag cag gi rmongs pa bsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397a-20: de'i tshe ston pas kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pa thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su 'chad par mdzad pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-0: bcom ldan 'das sengge'i khri la bzhugs pa nyid kyis kun dga' bo'i spyi @397b bor phyag bzhag ste bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'chad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-2: chos thams cad kyi 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-4: 'jig rten rdul phra rab yan chad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang sems kyi rgyu las dngos por red par bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-6: 'jig rten na yod pa'i chos thams cad kyi nang na rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-9: 'jur mdud yan chad kyang rgyu'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-10: stong pa'i ngo bo dag kyang ming dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-12: 'od gsal ba'i sems rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sems kyi khams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-13: ji ltar na dngos po med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-14: gal te khyod kyis ci nas rnam par 'byed pa rtog cing dpyod pa'i sems kun tu gsal ba 'di nyid ga sems kyi bdag nyid du mngon par zhen na; de lta na gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-17: reg bya sogs las su bya ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba'i gzhan du sems kyi dngos po yongs su rdzogs pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro; ;de ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'chad pa nyan pa na rnam par 'byed pa'i rtog pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-18: chos kyi sgra nyid las 'byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-19: phyi rol gyi gzugs dang sgra yongs su chad pa'i zhi ba'i sems kho nar yongs su brtags par gnas pa na yang chos kyi yul gyis bcings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:397b-20: rdul gyi gzugs brnyan la rnam par dpyod pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-1: med par blta bar bshad pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-2: gzhan du na khyod kyis sems nyid la so sor rtog bas dpyod par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-3: gal te yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba'i rnam par 'byed pa'i sems nyid ka khyod kyi sems yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-4: rnam par 'byed pa'i sems yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-6: 'on te 'di nyid ka yul gyi rnam pa rnam par rig pa'i rdul gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-9: de nyid 'gag pa'i dus su phyin pa na sems nyid rus spal gyi spu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-10: ri bong gi rva dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-11: khyod kyi chos nyid kyi sku dang lhan cig chad pa dang 'gag par 'gyur bas gang zhig gis skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-12: de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pa cang mi smra bar ngo mtshar zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-14: 'jig rten na lam yongs su slob pa rnams da ltar mthar gyis snyoms 'jug dgu la bslab kyang zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-15: skye 'chi'i rnam par rtog pa sems nyid la bden par rlom pas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-16: de yang kun dga' bo khyod kyang mang du thos pa nyid na'ang 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par ma gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398a-17: kun dga' bos de skad thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-0: yang mchi @398b ma blags te yan lag lngas sa la gtugs nas pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-1: bdag gis ston pa'i zham 'bring par rab tu byung nas ston pa'i gzi byin gyi mthu las rtag tu bsam pa na bdag gis yongs su 'bad pa med par ci zhig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin stsal par bgyid do snyam du sems lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-2: lus sems tha dad du yongs su ma rtogs lags pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-3: bdag gis sems kyi de kho na nyid stor bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-4: lus kyis tshangs par spyad na'ang sems kyis 'bras bu mngon du ma byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-6: bu dbul pos rang gi pha bskyur te bros pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-7: da ste mang du thos na'ang bsgoms pas yid la ma byas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-8: ma thos pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-9: gzhan gyis zas bzang por bsnyad kyang ro ma myong ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-12: da lta sgrib pa gnyis kyis bcings pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-13: sems kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par ma gyur lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-15: bdag cag ma gon med skyabs med rnams la thugs brtse bas sems kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar mdzad cing chos kyi mig 'byed par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi dpal be'u las 'od zer gyi tshogs kha dog brgya stong 'khrug pa spros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:398b-17: phyogs bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dus gcig tu bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-1: pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor la reg nas slar 'khyil te kun dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-2: 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyang snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-3: kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-4: bdag gis khyod kyi slad du chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-5: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la yang zab cing gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-6: dag cing gsal ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gsal bar byed cing rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-8: khyod kyis sngar lan gsol ba'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'od 'phro ba'i khu tshur rgyu cis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-12: ci zhig gis mthong bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i ri bo dang mtshungs pa dag cing gsal bar 'khrungs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-16: bdag cag gi mig lam du snang ba na phyag sor gyi 'khor lo rnam par bzlums te ston par mdzad pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-17: khu tshur gyi rnam par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis da ste bde ba'i bka' yis gsal bar bgyi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-20: blo gros dang ldan pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-21: dpes bsnyad pa na rtogs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi khu tshur ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-0: bcom @399b ldan 'das kyi phyag ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi khu tshur du mi 'grub la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-2: khyod kyi mig ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-3: khyod kyis mthong bar mi 'grub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-4: khyod kyi mig gi dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang dper bgyis pa na 'dra bar mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-8: bdag gi mig gi dbang po dang bral na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-9: bdag gis mthong bar mi 'grub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-10: bdag gi mig gi dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang dper bgyis pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-13: khyod kyis 'dra bar bsnyad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-16: lag pa med pa'i mi la khu tshur nyid med par rigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-18: mig med pa'i mis mthong ba rnam pa thams cad du med par mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-20: khyod kyis lam du 'gro ba'i long ba rnams la khyod kyis ci zhig mthong zhes bgam ste 'di bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-22: gdon mi za bar mun pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur te gzhan mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-23: zhes smra ba las brtsams te bsam pa na yul gyi rnam pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-28: long ba'i mdun du mun pa snang ba la ji ltar na mthong bar bsnyad par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:399b-30: long bas mthong ba'i mun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-0: mig ldan pas mthong ba'i phug @400a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-1: gi mun pa gnyis la khyad par mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-6: phug na gnas pa'i mun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-7: long bas mthong ba'i mun pa gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ci yang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-10: long bas mun pa mthong bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-11: glo bur du mig dang ldan par gyur na mdun gyi yul gyi rnam pa kha dog sna tshogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-12: de lta na mun pa'i phug na gnas pa'i skyes bus mdun gyi mun pa mthong ba na blo bur du sgron me sbar ba'i tshe yul gyi rnam pa kha dog sna tshogs pa mthong ba na sgron mes mthong bar bsnyad par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-13: gal te sgron me mthong bar 'gyur na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-14: sgron me nyid kyis mthong bar nus pas sgron mer bsnyad par mi bgyid la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-15: gal te sgron me mthong bar gyur ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-16: mig la rag ma lus pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-19: sgron mes gzugs snang bar nus pa dang mthong ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-20: mig nyid de sgron mes ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-21: mig gis gzugs gsal bar nus pa nyid la rang bzhin mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-22: sems kyis mthong ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400a-24: ma yin no; ;zhes gsungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-0: 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pas ston pa'i bka' 'di yang thos par 'gyur te chang mi smra bar 'khod kyang da dung sems kyis rtogs par @400b ma gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-1: slad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos rjes su bzung bar gsol ba'i slad du thal mo sbyar te gus pas btud de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs te blta zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bal ltar 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel ba'i phyag gser gyi 'od can brkyang ste phyag sor gyi 'khor lo yongs su phye ste 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pa'i kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-3: bdag gis bdud rtsi thog mar rnyed nas drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags su kun shes koondi n+ya la sogs pa dge slong lnga sde dang 'khor rnam bzhi la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-4: sems can thams cad byang chub ma thob cing dgra bcom par ma gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-5: yul gyi mgron po nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyis bslad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-7: de'i tshe ji ltar na yongs su rdzogs par khyed cag gis 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-8: de'i tshe kun shes koondi n+ya stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-10: na tshod yol ba lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-11: 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rnam par grol ba'i gnas mngon du byas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-12: yul gyi mgron po zhes pa'i tha snyad las 'bras bu thob pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-15: mgron po 'ga' zhig mgron khang du sleb ste nyal ba'am za bar brtsams te don mngon par 'grub pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:400b-16: byes kyi chas rnams bsnams te yang lam du 'gro bar brtsams nas 'dug par mi sems pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-1: te gzhir 'khod pa zhig na gzhan du 'gro bar mi byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-5: mi sdod cing gzhir 'khod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-7: sdod par mi byed pa nyid la mgron po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-10: nam mkha' drangs pa na nyi ma'i zer snod du phog pa na rdul phra mo'i tshogs nam mkha'i khams la gsal bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-11: rdul phran g-yo ba nyid na'ang nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-14: dvangs shing mi sgrib pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-16: g-yo zhing 'gyur ba ni; yul du bsnyad par sems lag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-17: g-yo zhing 'gyur ba nyid las yul du brtags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-20: gsungs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du phyag sor gyi 'khor lo 'byed pa dang sdum pa res mos su mdzad bzhin pas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-23: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis rin chen brgya ltar mdzes pa'i phyag gi 'khor lo 'khor 'das pa'i nang du 'byed sdum mdzad pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du 'byed 'dzum byed par mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'byed sdum yod pas de ltar mthong @401b ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-1: khyod kyi mthong ba nyid la 'byed pa dang sdum pa yod pa las de ltar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-3: ston pa'i rin po che'i phyag 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du 'byed cing sdum pa bdag gis mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag nyid la 'byed sdum yod pa las te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-5: bdag gi mthong ba nyid la 'byed sdum yod pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gang zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-14: bdag gi mthong ba nyid la gnas pa yang ma mchis na g-yo ba lta ga la zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-17: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil nas rin po che'i 'od zer kun dga' bo'i g-yas logs su spros pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-18: kun dga' bos g-yas su kyogs te blta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-19: slar yang 'od zer gcig kun dga' bo'i g-yon logs su spros pa la kun dga' bos g-yon du kyogs te blta ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-22: khyod kyi mgo bo da lta ji ltar na g-yo bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:401b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che'i 'od zer mdzes pa spros pa bdag gi sna ma logs g-yas g-yon du 'khyug pa na g-yas g-yon du blta ba'i slad du mgo bo g-yo bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-1: kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od zer blta bar g-yas g-yon du mgo bo g-yo ba na ci mgo bo nyid g-yo ba'am mthong ba nyid g-yo bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-3: ston pa; bdag gi mgo bo nyid g-yo ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-5: dvangs pa yang ma dmigs la g-yo ba yang ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-8: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-9: de ltar na sems can rnams kyis g-yo ba nyid las yul du bsnyad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-10: mi sdod pas na mgron por bsnyad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-11: khyed cag gis kun dga' bo'i mgo bo nyid g-yo bar byed la mthong ba nyid mi g-yo bar ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-12: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'byed sdum byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-13: mthong ba nyid la 'byed sdum mad pa la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-14: ji lta na da lta g-yo bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-18: mgo nas mjug gi bar dran rtog gis skye 'gag byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-19: de kho na nyid stor bas phyin ci log tu spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-20: sems kyi de nyid bden pa stor bas phyi rol gyi yul la rang gi de nyid du 'khrul bas 'khor ba 'dir rang nyid 'phyan pa 'ba' zhig len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402a-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-0: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba @402b theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-2: de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su stsal pa'i bka' thos pas lus sems sim pa myong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-3: thog ma med pa nas rang gi de kho na nyid stor bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-4: phyi rol gyi yul rdzun pa la bden par zhen te gzugs brnyan rnam par 'byed par gyur pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-5: da ste legs par rtogs pas nu ma stor ba'i byis pa glo bur du brtse ba'i ma dang 'phrad pa ltar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-6: thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' rjes su mnyan par sems pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-7: lus sems mngon du byas te; don dam dang kun rdzob bam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-8: bden pa dang rdzun pa da lta mngon sum du mthong ba'i skye 'gag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-9: skye 'gag dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar mdzad du gsol zhes re zhing sdod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-10: de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal langs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-11: bdag gis sngon sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa ma thos pa'i tshe ka ty'a na dang yang dag rgyal ba can sogs kyis shi ba'i tshe bem rig rgyun chad pa la myang 'das zhes smra ba thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-12: da ste sangs rgyas mjal ba na bdag gi yid nem nur du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-14: da lta'i sems 'di skye 'gag med pa'i gnas gsal bar mdzad par 'gyur snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:402b-15: 'khor 'dus pa'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang de kho na ltar sems lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-1: kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-3: khyod kyi sha rus rdos bcas kyi lus 'di rdo rje ltar gzhom du med bzhig gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-4: 'on te 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang bcas grang zhes smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-7: bdag gi lus 'di mthar 'jig pa'i chos can nyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-9: khyod da lta gson bzhin du ji ltar 'jig pa'i chos can du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-12: bdag gi lus mi rtag cing 'jig pa'i chos can da lta ma zhig mod kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-13: bdag gi sems da lta dran rig da lta yang skye zhing yang 'jig pa glo bur glo bur du 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-14: mes thal bar byed pa ltar 'phral 'phral du 'jig cing 'gag pa mthong ba las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-15: 'gag pa rang 'jig pa med par mi 'gyur bas nges na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-16: bdag gi lus mthar 'jig pa'i chos can du nges par rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-21: da lta lang tsho yol te byad bzhin dar la babs pa'i skabs las rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba lags mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-24: bdag byis pa'i skabs su sha pags 'jam zhing 'khril chags la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403a-25: dar la babs pa'i skabs su rtsal stobs yongs su rgyas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-0: da lta lang @403b tsho yol bas rtsal stobs rgud cing dran pa rmongs pa la thug pas lus kyi rang bzhin 'gyur la zungs dma' zhing khams rnyog pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-1: skra dkar gnyer ma lhags pas ring por mi thogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-2: ji ltar na; sngon gyi dar la babs pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-5: khyod kyi lang tsho glo bur du rgas par lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-10: mngon pa ma yin par dbyar dgu na dus kyis 'gyur bas rim gyis gtugs par gyur nas tshod 'dir sleb snyam lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-12: bdag lo nyi shu lon pa na gzhon pa nyid na'ang byad bzhin 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-13: lo bcu'i dus las rgud par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-14: lo sum cu'i tshe nyi shu las kyang rgud la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-15: da lta ni; lo gnyis kyis lhag pa'i drug cu lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-16: sngon lo lnga bcu'i gnas skabs na 'di bas gzhon sha can lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-18: rim gyis lang tsho yol ba'i rnam 'gyur rjes su dpag ste; re zhig lo bcu bcu na rnam 'gyur mngon par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-19: yang zhib tu brtags tshe lo khyud kor re la 'gyur bar ma zad lo re bzhin 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-20: lo rer ma zad zla rer dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-21: zla rer ma zad nyin rer yang 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:403b-22: zhib tu na skad cig skad cig la yid 'gyur ba'i bar dag tu yang mi brtan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-0: des na bdag gi lus mthar 'jig pa'i chos can du ngas @404a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-3: khyod kyis rnam par 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa'i ngang tshul mthong bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-4: khyod mthar 'jig pa'i chos can du shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-5: ci khyod mthar 'jig pa'i tshe na khyod la mi 'jig pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-6: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-7: bdag gis nges par ma 'khums lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-9: bdag gis rtogs par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-12: rgyal po; khyod kyis sngon nam zhig na gangg'a'i klung mthong ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-14: bdag lo gsum na mas bkur te khyab 'jug gi lha khang mjal bar dong ba'i tshe klung babs pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-15: de'i tshe gangg'a yin par 'khums lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-18: khyod kyis smras pa lta na lo nyi shu na lo bcu las brgal ba nas bzung ste drug cu'i bar du lo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-21: dus tshod re re bzhin yid tsam re rnam par 'gyur bar smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-22: khyod kyis lo gsum na gangg'a'i klung mthong ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-23: lo bcu gsum pa'i tshe mthong ba na ci gangg'a gzhan du 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-25: lo gsum gyi tshe mthong ba las gzhan du ma 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404a-26: lo drug cu na yang de kho na ltar lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-0: bcom ldan 'das @404b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-1: khyod da lta skra dkar gnyer ma lhags pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-2: bzhin byis pa'i gnas skabs yos nges par rgas par gyur mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-3: khyod kyis sngon byis pa'i gnas skabs su mthong ba las gangg'a gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dbye ba lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-19: gdod nas skye 'chi ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-21: khyod kyis skye 'chi nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-22: des na ci'i phyir khyod kyis da dung kun tu rgyu sogs kyi rjes su 'brangs te shi ba'i tshe bem rig chad par smra bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-23: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de skad thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-24: lus 'di brjes pa'i tshe rten 'di bor nas skye ba gzhan len pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-25: 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig sngon ma thos pa'i gtam gyis lhag par rtsen zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-26: de'i tshe kun dga' bo stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:404b-28: bdag gis gsung 'di 'khums pa lam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rang @405a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-1: gi rang bzhin brlag ste phyin ci log tu spyod par gsungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-2: des na byams brtses bdag gi dri ma sbyang du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi mdog can 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa 'og tu brkyang ste kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-4: khyod kyis bdag gi phyag rgya 'di mthong ba las gyen du blta bar smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-5: thur du blta bar smra; kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-7: 'di la thur du blta bar smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-10: gang zhig thur du bsnyad par bdag gis ma 'khums lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-13: 'jig rten rnams kyis 'di la thur du bsnyad par bgyi na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-14: gang zhig la gyen du bsnyad par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag bsgrengs te shing bal ltar 'jam pa'i sor mo steng du bstan pa'i tshe de la gyen du bsnyad par bgyi mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag bsgrengs te kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-18: 'di ltar steng 'og phan tshun gos brjes pa la 'jig rten pa rnams 'dra bar mthong ba yin snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi dag gsal chos kyi sku gnyis dpe mtshungs su phye ba'i tshe go bar nus yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-0: rang bzhin @405b phyin ci log tu bsnyad pa de la khyod kyis dpyad cing bltas pa na khyod kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dper byas pa'i tshe phyin ci log tu bsnyad na ci zhig phyin ci log ces brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-1: de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das la mig 'bur tshugs su mi 'dzum par blta zhing lus sems kyi phyin ci log gang la bsnyad pa ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams brtse bskyed de kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-3: 'khor 'dus pa la thugs kyis bsrang ste rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang mtshungs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-4: rigs kyi bu rnams; bdag gis rgyun du bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-6: shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-7: sems las byung ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-8: kun gyi rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-9: sems nyid las byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-11: sems thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba las byung ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-12: khyod cag ji ltar rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-13: dag pa'i de khon nyid kyi rin po che ster nas ye shes nyid las rmongs pa tshol bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-17: stong pa'i 'jur mdud las gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-18: de las yang 'du shes sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:405b-19: de las phung por red par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-0: rgyu'i rnams 'dus pa las nang gi g-yeng ba'i rnam rtog gis bskyod pas phyi rol gyi don thams cad la @406a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-1: rgyug pas 'khrul zhing 'khyams nas rnyog pa'i rnam pa la sems kyi rang bzhin du 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-2: de ltar gcig tu rmongs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-3: gzugs kyi dngos po nyid nang gi rang bzhin du bzung nas rtag tu phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi dngos po ri klung dang nam mkha' stong pas chen po'i bar thams cad rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin pa ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-5: dvangs shing gsal ba'i rgya mtsho chen po stong phrag brgya pa yongs su dor nas chu bur phra mo'i rnam pa la rba rlabs su bltas te rgya mtsho chen por rtag tu 'khrul pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-7: rmongs pa las kyang cher rmongs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-8: da gzod bdag gi phyag thur du bstan pa bye brag ma phyed pa dang 'dra bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed cag lhag par byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-10: brtse bar bya bar gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-11: de'i tshe kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las lhag par brtse ba'i bka' lung mnos te mig mchi mas gang bzhin du thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-12: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmad du byung ba de ltar thos pa las rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406a-14: rtag tu gnas pa rtogs par gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-0: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi bka' mchid stsal brtogs pa las sems kyi rgyud 'di nyid drangs pas gcig tu gus shing pu dud @406b du byed pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-1: de lta bu'i sems tsam zhig thob mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-2: sems de nyid bden pa'i rtsa ba can du lta bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag par byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-4: brtse bas bdag gi the tshom bcad nas bla na med pa'i go 'phang la 'god pa'i chos zab mo bshad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-6: khyed cag rgyu dngos po'i sems nyid kyis chos kyi tshul thos par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-7: chos kyi tshul la bden par mngon par zhen pas chos kyi de nyid ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-8: 'ga' zhig gis sor mo'i rtse mos zla ba bstan pa na de las zla ba la blta bar rigs kyi; sor mo nyid zla bar bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-9: mi des zla bar ring du 'khrul par ma zad sor mo de la'ang ring du 'khrul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-11: ston byed kyi sor mo dvangs pa'i zla ba zhes ring du 'khrul bas sor mor ring du 'khrul ba lta zhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-12: snang mun kyang mi phyed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-14: sor mo'i rtse mo dvangs pa'i zla bar bzung bas snang mun log par nor bas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-15: khyod kyang de bzhin du blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-16: bdag gis dam pa'i chos 'chad pa'i bka' rnam par 'byed nus pa nyid du bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-17: 'on te bdag gis stsal pa'i bka' dang 'brel ba med pa'i khyod kyi sems nyid gzhan du gyur ba lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-19: mgron po mgron khang du 'ong ba cung zad 'dug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:406b-20: 'phral du 'gro bas rgyun du mi gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-2: de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin nyid yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-3: gang du yang 'gro bar mi byed pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-5: sgra dang bral ba'i rnam par rig pa'i rang bzhin yang med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-7: sgra la rnam par rig pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin yod par ma zad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-8: bdag gi bzhin rnam par rig pa yang gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad las gzhan du khyod kyi rnam par rig pa'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-10: sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-11: gzugs ma yin zhing stong pa ma yin pa'i dngos po gnag lhas kyi bu sogs kyis zab mo'i gnas su zhen pa'i bar dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-12: ci ste chos thams cad dang bral ba'i rnam par rig pa'i rang bzhin med par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-13: khyod kyi sems kyi rang bzhin so sor ldog cing 'gro ba nyid na gang zhig gnas pa po nyid du gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-15: bdag gi sems nyid so sor ldog na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i rmad du byung ba'i sems gsal rig ji ltar na mi ldog par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-17: thugs brtsebs dgongs te bdag gi slad du bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407a-19: khyod kyi mthong ba'i rang bzhin rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig 'di /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-0: rmad du byung ba'i sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin @407b ma yin kyang zla gnyis dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-1: zla ba'i brnyan po dang mi 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-2: khyod kyis legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-3: bdag gis mi ldog pa'i rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-5: kun dga' ra ba'i sgo phye ste shar phyogs nas nyi ma shar ba na 'od 'khyug par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-6: nam gung na zla snang bral ba'i tshe smag dang sprin 'thibs pas mun par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-7: sgo dang skar khung nas ni mthong ba gsal bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-8: rtsig pa dang sgrib yol gyis chod pa na mthong ba sgrib par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-9: rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-10: yang yongs su rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-12: ci yang stong pa kho na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-13: thag ring po'i rdul 'tshubs pa'i rnam pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-14: mun par gtibs par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-15: rdul dvangs pa'i tshe na yang dvangs shing gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-17: khyed cag gis 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam pa de dag thams cad la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-18: bdag gis de dag rang rang gi rgyu'i gnas su ldog pa ston no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-22: 'gyur ba dang bcas pa de dag las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-24: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ldog par bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-26: nyi ma med na snang ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-30: nyi ma la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-32: nam gung gi zla snang bral ba la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:407b-34: skar khung la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-0: rtsig pa dang sgrib yol la @408a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-3: rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas su ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-5: stong pa la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-7: rdul 'tshubs pa la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-9: rdul dvangs pa la ldog par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-11: 'jig rten na yod pa'i chos rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-13: khyod kyi mthong ba'i sde tshan brgyad kyi snang ba'i rang bzhin gsal zhing rig pa 'di gang du ldog par bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-15: gal te snang ba la ldog na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-16: snang ba med pa'i tshe mun pa yang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-17: snang mun sogs sna tshogs pa'i yul rnam par 'byed pa yod pa'i tshe mthong ba nyid rnam par 'byed pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-18: ldog par bya ba thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-19: khyod ma yin ba nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-20: khyod kyi ldog pa med pa nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-21: khyod ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-22: 'di nyid las khyod kyi sems ye nas dag cing gsal ba rtogs par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-23: khyod rang nyid rmongs pas rang bzhin brlag ste skye 'chi'i 'khrul 'khor du chud pas rnam par 'khyams par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-24: des na de bzhin gshegs pas khyed cag snying re rje zhes brtse bar mdzad do; ;kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408a-25: bdag gi mthong ba'i rang bzhin 'di ldog pa med pa shes kyang gang zhig bdag gi yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yin ji ltar shes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-0: bcom @408b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-1: ngas khyod la 'dri bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-2: khyod kyis da lta zag pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa ma thob kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu las bsam gtan dang pa'i bar du sgrib thogs med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-4: 'dzam bu gling la lta ba'i tshe lag mthil gyi aa mra'i 'bras bu bzhin du snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-7: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-8: phra rab rdul snyed kyi dag pa'i zhing gi mthar thug pa'i bar mi gzigs pa ci yang ma mchis so; ;sems can rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-9: gsal bar bltas pa'i tshe nas dang tshon las mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-11: bdag gis khyod dang lhan cig rgyal chen bzhi'i gzhal med khang lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-14: bar snang 'gro ba rnams yongs su lta ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-15: snang mun sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa yod kyang mdun rol gyi yul gyi rnam pa so so dang ra zhing bsgrigs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-16: gzhan ma mchis pas khyod kyis 'dir rang dang gzhan rnam par 'byed par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-17: da lta ngas khyod kyi slad du snang ba de dag las gang zhig bdag gi rang bzhin yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-18: gang zhig dngos po'i rang bzhin 'byed par bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-20: khyod kyi nus pa ci yod kyis ltos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-21: nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:408b-23: khyod ma yin la gser gyi ri bdun gyi bar zhi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-0: @409a *// tu brtags pa'i tshe sna tshogs pa'i 'od bkra ba yang dngos po nyid yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-2: rim gyis zhib tu brtags pa na sprin ldang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-10: dud 'gro thams cad kyang dngos po yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-14: ring ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dngos po thams cad so so tha dad pa yin kyang khyod kyi gsal zhing rig pa'i snang ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-15: dngos po de de dag thams cad so so tha dad pa'i dbye ba yod kyang snang ba'i rang bzhin la tha dad med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-16: 'di'i rmad du byung ba'i gsal zhing rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-17: khyod kyi snang ba'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-18: gal te snang ba nyid yul gyi dngos po yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-19: khyod kyis nga'i snang ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-20: gal te lhan du mthong ba la nga'i snang ba mthong ba smra na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-21: ngas mi mthong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir nga'i mi mthong ba'i yul nyid mi mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-22: gal te nga'i mi mthong ba nyid mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-23: rang nyid mi mthong ba'i rnam pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-24: gal te nga'i mi mthong ba'i yul mi mthong na rang nyid dngos po ma yin par 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-25: ji ltar na khyod ma yin par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-26: gzhan yang khyod kyis dngos po mthong ba'i tshe khyod kyis dngos po mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409a-27: dngos po kyang khyod mthong bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-0: de ltar na rang bzhin 'khrug par gyur pas @409b bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-1: khyod nyid 'jig rten dang bcas pa rnam par bzhag pa mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-3: khyod kyis mthong ba'i tshe khyod kyi yin la bdag gi ma yin pa'i snang ba'i rang bzhin khyab par gyur pa khyod ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-6: khyod kyi rang gi yang dag pa'i rang bzhin la the tshom za ba'i rang gi rang bzhin mi shes par ci'i phyir phyir zhing bdag la the tshom za zhing 'dri bar bgyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-9: gal te snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-10: gdon mi za bar bdag gi yin la gzhan gyi ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-11: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang lhan du rgyal chen bzhi'i ngo mtshar gter gyi rin chen khang pa brtags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-12: nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar snang ba 'dis yongs su khyab cing mi mjed kyi khams yongs su gtugs bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-13: phyir log ste bsam gtan gyi khang par sleb pa na kun dga' ra ba kho na mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-14: bsam gtan gyi khang pa nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe bya 'dab tsam zhig mthong bar snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-16: snang ba 'di rang gi ngang gis 'jig rten khams khyab par snang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-17: da ste khang pa'i nang du gang bar snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-18: snang ba 'di chen po rnams 'dus nas chung bar gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-19: rtsig pa dang sgrib yol gyis chod pas bskal par gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:409b-20: 'di'i do na gang na gnas pa bdag gis ma shes pas thugs rje chen pos bdag gi slad du rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-3: 'jig rten thams cad kyi las don che chung phyi nang thams cad mdun rol gyi yul snang gis bsdus pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-4: mthong ba 'di la bkram pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-5: bcum par smra bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-7: snod gru bzhi ba'i nang gi stong pa gru bzhi pa mthong ba dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-8: kho bos khyod la yang 'dri bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-9: snod gru bzhi pa 'di'i nang gi stong pa gru bzhi pa snang ba de nges par gru bzhi pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-10: gru bzhi pa ma nges pa yin grang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-11: gal te nges par gru bzhi pa yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-12: snod zlum po bzhag pa'i tshe de'i nang gi stong pa zlum por mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-13: gal te ma nges pa yin tshe snod gru bzhi pa'i nang du yang stong pa gru bzhi pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-14: khyod kyis don 'di gang du gnas pa ma shes par smra na; don 'di'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-15: de ltar yin na ji ltar gnas par smra bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-17: gru bzhi dang zlum po med par 'jug na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-18: snod kyi gru bzhi pa gsal bar bya yi stong pa'i dngos po la gru bzhi pa med pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-19: bar snang stong pa'i dngos po gru bzhi pa yod pa gsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-20: zhes smra par mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-21: gal te khyod kyis dris pa ltar khang pa'i nang du gnas pa'i tshe mthong snang bcum nas chung dur byas pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410a-22: gyen du nyi ma la bltas pa'i tshe khyod kyis mthong snang 'di bteg nas nyi ma la sleb par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-0: gal te rtsig pa dang sgrib yol @410b gyis bar du bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-1: sgrib par nus na skar khung chung du brus pa'i tshe ci mthong snang 'thud par 'gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-2: don 'di nyid de ltar ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-3: sems can thams cad thog ma med pa nas rang gi rang bzhin dngos po la zhen pas dngos po 'khrul par 'phyan pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-4: de dag stor te las chen po dang chung du zhes rlom par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-5: gal te dngos po las mngon par log pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-6: lus dang sems yongs su ye nas dag cing de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor las g-yo ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-7: ba spu'i khung bu gcig la yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rab 'byams chud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-10: gal te mthong snang 'di nyid bdag gi rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-11: rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-12: bdag gi mdun na gnas pas gdon mi za bar mthong ba nyid du bden pas da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-13: bdag gi lus dang sems ci zhig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-14: bdag gi lus dang sems ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-15: rnam par dbye bar byar yod kyang mthong ba'i rang bzhin des bdag gi lus rnam par dbye bar ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-16: gal te bdag gi sems bdag la lta ba po'i rang bzhin yin tshe lta ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-17: nges par bdag gi yin par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:410b-19: bdag gi ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du dngos po bdag la lta bar 'gyur ba mi 'thad par gsungs pa dang cis mi @411a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-2: brtse ba chen pos ma rtogs pa'i gnas rnam par 'byed par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-4: khyod kyis mthong snang 'di khyod kyi mdun du gnas par smras pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-5: yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-6: gal te nges par mthong snang 'di khyod kyi mdun du gnas shing mthong bar nges pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-8: phyogs cha dang bcas par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-9: bstan du med par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-10: der ma zad da lta khyod dang lhan cig rgyal byed tshal du bsdad nas nags tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-15: mdun du gangg'a la phyogs te yongs su bltas pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-16: khyod kyis bdag gi sengge'i khri'i mdun nas lag pa brkyang ste rnam pa sna tshogs de dag ston par byed pa na 'thibs po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-21: rtsig pa dang sgrib yol dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-24: de ltar rtsva shing nas spu nyag gi bar che chung so so tha dad pa yod kyang gzugs kyang yin phyin chad bstan du med pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-25: gal te mthong snang 'di khyod kyi mdun du nges par gnas pa'i tshe khyod gyis mdzub mos rig par bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411a-26: gang zhig mthong snang yin pa ston par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-0: mthong snang du grub @411b pas ji ltar stong par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-1: gal te dngos po mthong snang yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-2: mthong snang du grub pas ji ltar dngos por 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-3: khyod kyis dngos po thams cad la zhib tu gzhigs te phra zhing gsal ba dag cing rmad du byung ba'i mthong snang gi rang bzhin 'di dang 'di zhes bdag la bstan te dngos po de dag dang 'dra bar phye ste gsal bar ma 'dres par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-5: bdag da lta khang pa brtsegs pa kun dga' ra ba gnas thag ring por chu bo gangg'a'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-6: yar nyi zlar bltas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-7: lag pas bstan cing mig gis mthong du rung ba thams cad dngos po kho na de mthong snang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-9: rgyal bas gsungs pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-10: bdag lta ba'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i nyan thos las dang po pa lta zhog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dngos po'i rnam pa thams cad las logs su mthong snang phye ste dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i rang gi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-16: khyod kyis mthong snang 'di dngos po thams cad dang bral ba logs su rang gi rang bzhin med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-17: zhes smras kyang khyod kyis bstan pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi nang na mthong snang du gdags pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:411b-18: yang khyod la bshad par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-0: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig rgyal byed tshal nas yang nags tshal dang rab nas nyi @412a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-1: zla'i bar du rnam pa sna tshogs pa la so sor dpyad pa na ci zhig ltar na'ang khyod kyi rmad du byung ba'i mthong snang bstan du med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-2: khyod kyis yang dngos po de dag las gang zhig mthong snang ma yin pa ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-4: bdag gis rgyal byed tshal la sogs pa bltas pa na de dag las gang zhig mthong snang ma yin pa ma 'khums so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-6: nags tshal nyid mthong snang ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-7: ji ltar na nags tshal mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-8: ci ste nags tshal nyid mthong snang yin na yang ci zhig nags tshal mthong bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-9: zhes pa nas ji ltar stong pa mthong snang ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-10: stong pa nyid ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-11: gal te stong pa nyid mthong snang yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-12: yang ci zhig stong pa mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-13: yang bdag gis zhib tu brtags pa na dngos po de dag gi nang nas phra zhib zhib par phye ba'i tshe mthong snang ma yin pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-17: de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i slob pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' 'di thos pas sems blong blong bor 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412a-18: don de'i mtha' dang mu ma shes pas yud cig dngangs shing nem nur du gyur te dran pa stor ba ltar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag rtab rtab bor gyur par gzigs nas byams brtse mngon du mdzad de kun dga' bo dang 'khor 'dus @412b pa rnams la rjes su ston pa'i slad du bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-2: bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po bka' yang dag pa bden pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-3: ji lta ba nyid ji bzhin du gsungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-4: rdzun pa med cing bslu ba med la; kun tu rgyu rnam pa bzhis 'chi ba med par brlang pos log par smras pa dang mi mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-5: khyed cag gis zhib tu brtag par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-6: brtse bas bskyangs pa'i re ba ma brlag cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-7: de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po'i sras 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'khor rnam pa bzhi la brtse ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas lag pa thal mo sbyar te gus pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-9: 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsal bar phye ba'i mthong ba rnam par dag pa gzugs dang stong pa gnyis yin min gyi don ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-11: 'di'i mdun gyi rkyen gzugs dang stong pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gal te mthong ba yin na bstan du yod par rigs so; ;gal te mthong ba ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-12: mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-13: da lta don de nyid kyi gnas lugs mi shes pa'i phyir de ltar the tshom du gyur cing skrag par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-14: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dag gi spyod yul ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:412b-15: des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtse ba chen pos dngos po 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-0: mthong ba'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sdod lugs de @413a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-1: nyid las gang zhig yin pa dang ma yin pa ma 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-2: don 'di gsal bar phye nas bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-4: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so sor ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na der mthong ba dang mthong ba'i rkyen snang ba'i mtshan ma dag nam mkha'i me tog ltar gdod ma nas ci yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-6: mthong ba 'di dang rkyen 'di dag gdod ma nas rmad du byung ba'i byang chub kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing gsal ba'i chos kyi sku der yang yin pa dang ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-9: ngas da lta khyod la dri yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-12: 'jam dpal zhes bya ba gzhan yang yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-13: 'on te 'jam dpal de lta bu med bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-17: bdag 'jam dpal yin zhing bdag las gzhan 'jam dpal med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-19: bdag las gzhan 'jam dpal yod na gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-20: gzhan yang da lta bdag gis 'jam dpal med ces ma smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-21: de la yin pa dang ma yin pa gnyis kyi mtshan ma med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-22: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-0: rmad du byung ba'i mthong ba @413b gsal ba 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-1: yul stong pa nyid dag kyang de kho na bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-2: gdod ma nas rmad du byung ba'i gsal ba bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag pa'i sems dam pa'i bden pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-3: rdzun pa'o gzugs dang stong pa thos pa dang mthong bar gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-10: zla ba gcig tu bden na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-11: de la rang ngos nas zla ba yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-12: ma yin pa gnyis med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-13: de'i phyir da lta khyod kyi mthong ba dang mthong ba'i yul la rnam pa sna tshogs su gsal bar snang ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-14: log par rtog pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-15: 'di'i nang nas yin pa dang ma yin pa 'byed par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-16: de yang dag par rmad du byung ba'i gsal zhing rig pa'i rang bzhin la brten pas na khyod la bstan du yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-17: bstan du med pa las 'da' bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-18: de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-19: bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsung ba chos kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal ba'i rig pa'i rkyen phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gsal zhing dvangs pas gtan du gnas pa'i rang bzhin skye 'gag med pa bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsung ba chos kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:413b-20: sngon gyi bram ze ka pi las smras pa'i gsang tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-0: thal ba byug ba po la sogs pa'i phyi rol pa rnams kyis bdag bden bar yod cing phyogs bcur bya ba pa yin zhes pa 'di dang ji ltar @414a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis langka'i ri la blo gros chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don 'di rgyas par bka' stsal pa'i tshe phyir rol pa de dag rtag pa rang byung du smra la bdag gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bka' stsal pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-3: de rnams kyi shes par bya ba'i yul ma yin zhes bka' stsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-4: da lta gal te gsal zhing rig pa 'di'i rang bzhin rang byung skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa gsob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-6: phyin ci log thams cad dang yongs su bral ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-7: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin pa lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-8: de dag gis rang byung du grub ces smras pa dang 'dra bas ji ltar na rnam par phye ste bstan nas log pa'i lta ba gang la yang mi 'jug cing yang dag pa'i sems kyi gsal zhing rig pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-11: bdag gis da lta de lta bur thabs la mkhas pas phye ste bstan nas khyod la yang dag par bka' stsal pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-12: khyod kyis ma rtogs par rang byung ba'o snyam du rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-14: gal te rang byung du grub par bden na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-15: gor ma chag par rang byung ba'i dngos po yod par gsol bar 'byed rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414a-16: khyod kyis legs par dpyod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-0: rmad du byung ba'i mthong ba gsal ba 'di'i nang na gang zhig bdag @414b mthong ba 'di'i snang ba bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-5: gal te snang ba bdag yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-6: mun pa mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-7: gal te stong pa rang byung ba'i dngos po yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-8: bem po mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-9: de bzhin du des mtshon nas mun pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i bar bdag yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-10: snang ba'i dus su mthong ba'i rang bzhin rgyun chad nas ji ltar na snang ba mthong bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-11: kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-12: da lta mthong ba dam pa 'di'i rang bzhin nges par rang byung min par bka' stsal ba las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-13: yang bdag gis gsal bar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-14: 'on kyang ji lta ba bzhin legs par ma rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la dri ba zhu'o; ;don 'di ji ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mthun zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-16: khyod kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dri zhing gsol na bdag gis slar yang khyod la 'dri'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-17: da lta khyod kyis mthong ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rang bzhin rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes so zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-18: yang mthong ba 'di snang ba la brten nas mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-19: mun pa la brten nas mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-20: stong pa la brten nas mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-21: bem po la brten nas mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-23: gal te snang ba la brten pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:414b-24: mun pa mi mthong bar rigs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-7: mun pa dang 'brel bar mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-8: stong pa dang 'brel bar mthong ngam /
