K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-12: bem po mi mthong bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-13: bem po dang 'brel ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-14: stong pa mi mthong bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-15: de bzhin du snang ba dang 'brel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-16: mun pa dang 'brel ba'i bar du stong pa dang bem po ltar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-18: yang dag cing rmad du byung ba gsal zhing rig pa 'di gdod ma nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-19: rang byung du grub pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-20: rang byung du ma grub pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-21: ma yin pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-22: ma yin pa min pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-24: yin pa min pa yang ma yin zhing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415a-25: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-0: lag pas nam mkha' stong pa la nyug cing nom ba ji lta ba bzhin du rang dgar rang nyid sdug @415b bsngal bar byed pa tsam las nam mkha' stong pa la khyod kyi 'dod pa bzhin ji ltar 'dzin par nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-1: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-6: snang ba la brten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-8: mig la brten par bka' stsal ba'i don ci lta bu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-12: bdag gis 'jig rten gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad bka' stsal pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-13: yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-16: 'jig rten gyi skye bo thams cad kyis bdag gis mthong bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-18: ji ltar na mthong la ji ltar na mi mthong zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-20: 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag nyi ma dang zla ba dang sgron me'i 'od la brten nas dngos po sna tshogs mthong bas na mthong ba zhes bya la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-21: gal te 'od gsal ba'i snang ba gsum po 'di med na; mthong bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-23: gal te snang ba med pa'i tshe mi mthong zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-24: mun pa nyid kyang mi mthong bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:415b-25: gal te nges par mun pa mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-1: med cas bya bar rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-2: ji ltar na mthong ba med ces smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-4: gal te mun pa'i dus su snang ba'i mtshan ma mi mthong zhes tha snyad 'dogs na da lta snang ba'i dus su mun pa'i mtshan ma mi mthong ba'i phyir yang mi mthong ba nyid ces tha snyad 'dogs par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-5: 'di ltar na mi mthong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-6: mtshan ma gnyis ka la 'jug par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-7: gal te mtshan ma gnyis yod na gcig gis gcig phan tshun go skabs 'phrog par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-8: khyod kyi mthong ba'i rang bzhin 'di nyid re zhig kyang med par gyur pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-9: 'di ltar na gnyis po thams cad la mthong ba zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-12: khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste; snang ba mthong ba'i tshe mthong ba de snang ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-13: mun pa mthong ba'i tshe mthong ba de mun pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-14: stong pa mthong ba'i tshe mthong ba de stong pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-15: bem po mthong ba'i tshe mthong ba de bem po ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-16: don 'di bzhi de ltar yin mod kyang slar yang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-17: mthong bya mthong ba'i tshe mthong ba de mthong bya ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-18: mthong ba de mthong bya dang bral na mthong ba'i don tshang bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-19: yang ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416a-22: ltos pa'i mtshan ma zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-0: khyod la sogs pa nyan @416b thas rnams gli [?] rtul zhing rtogs pa med pas dag cing gsal ba'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-1: ngas khyod la bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-3: byang chub mchog gi lam la le lo ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-6: 'jig rten gyi skyabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bstan pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-8: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-9: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa bka' stsal pa rnams bdag cag gi sems kyis gsal bar ma rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-10: da lta gzhan yang mthong bya mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-12: zhes thos pas ches cher 'khyams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-13: rmongs pa rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-14: thugs rje chen pos rjes su brtse bar dgongs te bdag cag thams cad la dag la gsal zhing rig pa'i sems gsal bar phye ste bstan du gsol zhes zhus nas ngus shing mig nas mchi ma phyung ste gdung ba'i yid kyis spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rmad du byung ba'i bka' nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:416b-15: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang bcas pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gzungs chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa rgya chen po mchog tu gyur pa sbyangs pa'i lam rgyas par bka' stsal par dgongs te kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' @417a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-3: khyod kyis nan tan du sbyangs pas mang du thos par gyur mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-4: don 'di zab cing phra ba'i bsgoms byung gis ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-5: da lta khyod kyis legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-6: ngas khyod la gsal bar phye ste bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-7: der ma zad yang slad ma'i dus kyi sems can so so'i skye bo rnams byang chub kyi go 'phang la dgod cing gzhag pa'i phyir du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-9: sems can ji snyed ba de thams cad 'khor bar 'khor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-10: phyin ci log rnam pa gnyis so sor 'byed pa'i mthong ba rdzun pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis skye ba blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-11: las kyi dbang gis 'khor bar 'khor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-12: phyin ci log gi mthong ba gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-14: sems can thams cad kyi so so'i las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-16: sems can thams cad kyi spyi mthun gyi las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-17: so so'i las kyi mthong ba gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-20: 'jig rten na mi zhig nad kyis mig dmar zhing rab rib tu gyur te mtshan mo sgron me'i 'od la bltas pa'i tshe 'od kor zlum po kha dog lnga pa rim par bkra ba mthong ba lta bu'o; ;khyod ci snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-21: mtshan mo 'bar ba'i sgron me'i 'od las byung ba'i 'od kor zlum po 'di sgron me'i gzugs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417a-22: 'on te mthong ba'i gzugs zhes bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-1: gal te 'di nyid sgron me'i gzugs zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-2: mig la rab rib med pa rnams ci'i phyir thun mong du mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-3: mig rab rib dang ldan pa kho nas 'od kor zlum po mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-4: gal te mthong ba'i gzugs zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-5: mthong ba de nyid gzugs su 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-6: mig rab rib dang ldan pa des 'od kor zlum po ji ltar mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-8: gal te 'od kor zlum po 'di sgron me dang bral zhing logs su yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-9: nye logs su yod pa'i yol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-12: stan la bltas pa na yang grib ma zlum po 'byung bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-13: gal te mthong ba dang bral nas logs su yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-14: mig gis mthong ba ma yin par 'gyur zhing mig rab rib dang ldan pa de'i mig la grib ma zlum po gang nas mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-16: gzugs nges par sgron me la yod la mthong ba'i skyon gyis 'od kor du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-17: 'od kor dang mthong ba gnyis rab rib kyi skyon du 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-18: rab rib mthong ba kho na'i skyon ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-20: mthong ba zhes brjod par mi bya na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-21: de la sgron me ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-22: mthong ba ma yin zhes brjod du rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-23: zla gnyis su snang ba nyid dang 'dra zhing dngos kyang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:417b-24: gzugs brnyan yang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-0: zla gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu mig 'bras btsir @418a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-1: ba las byung ba'i phyir mkhas pa'i skye bo gang dag mig 'bras btsir ba nyid gzugs dang gzugs ma yin pa mthong ba dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-2: ma bral ba zhes mi brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-4: mig rab rib tu gyur pa las byung ba'i phyir da lta gang zhig sgron me yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-5: gang zhig mthong ba yin zhes tha snyad mi 'dogs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-6: sgron me ma yin; mthong ba ma yin zhes so sor phye ste ci zhig brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-7: spyi mthun gyi las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong ba gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-9: 'dzam bu gling 'dir rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bo'i bar bar du gling stong phrag gsum yod cing dbus kyi gling chen po la shar nub kyi phyogs thams cad la rgyal khams stong phrag gnyis dang sum brgya yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-10: gling phran gzhan thams cad rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-11: gling de dag la lar rgyal khams brgya phrag gnyis gsum dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-12: 'ga' zhig tu rgyal khams gcig dang gnyis nas brtsams te sum cu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-14: lnga bcu'i bar du yang yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418a-16: spyir 'di'i nang du gling phran gcig la rgyal khams gnyis yod pa las rgyal khams gcig gi skye bo dag la spyi mthun gyi las ngan pa'i 'bras bu mya ngan dang 'phrad pa'i sngon du gling phran gyi gnas de'i sems can la ltas dang mtshan ma ngan pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ba na nyi ma gnyis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-1: yang na nyi zla gzas zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-3: aa long dang lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od 'khyug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-4: gza' dang skar ma du ba can 'char ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-8: 'ja' zug pa la sogs pa'i ltas ngan pa sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-9: rgyal khams gcig pu des de ltar mthong ba las gzhan du rgyal khams gcig shos kyi sems can rnams kyis gtan nas mthong blta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-12: da lta ngas khyod la las gnyis lugs 'byung ldog tu dpe don sbyar zhing grangs te gsal bar bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-14: sems can de dag thams cad kyi so so'i las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong bas mthong ba'i tshe sgron me'i 'od las byung ba'i 'od kor de yul mngon sum pa lta bur gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-15: gang zag de'i mig rab rib tu gyur pa las byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-16: rab rib tu gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-17: mthong ba phyin ci log tu gyur cing gzugs las grub pa ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-18: de lta na yang rab rib mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-19: mthar gtugs pa'i mthong ba'i skyon ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-21: da lta khyod kyi mig la ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-25: sems can thams cad mthong ba rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-26: thog ma med pa nas byung ba'i mthong ba'i skyon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:418b-27: mthong ba dang mthong ba'i rkyen ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-0: yul mngon sum pa ltar gyur kyang @419a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-1: gdod ma nas bdag cag gi gsal zhing rig pa'i mthong ba dang 'brel ba'i rab rib yin pas mthong ba lta bur rig pa nyid rab rib tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-2: gso zhing rig pa'i sems su gyur cing gdod ma nas rig pa rkyen gyis rab rib tu gyur pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-3: rab rib tu gyur pa de rig pas rig na rig pa de rab rib can du mi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-4: 'di ni; yang dag par mthong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-6: ci'i phyir yang rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-9: mthong ba po zhes tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-10: de'i phyir da lta khyod kyis nga dang khyod la sogs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'gro ba rigs bcu po rnams mthong ba 'di thams cad rab rib tu gyur pas mthong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-11: mthong bas rab rib tu gyur pa ma mthong ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419a-12: mthong ba dngos gzhi de nyid kyi nges par dag pa'i rig pa'i rang bzhin gdod ma nas rab rib tu gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir de la mthong ba zhes tha snyad mi 'dogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-0: sems can de dag thams cad spyi mthun gyi las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong ba dang ldan pa'i skye bo'i nang du bye brag gi las kyi phyin ci log gi mthong ba dang ldan pa'i skye bo gcig gi mig glo bur du na na skye bo gcig pu des rab rib tu gyur pa'i grib ma zlum po mthong ba ltar skye bo mang po 'di thams @419b cad kyis ltas ngan mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-1: de thams cad kyi las las sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i dbang gis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-2: 'di dag thams cad thog ma med pa nas mthong ba rdzun pa las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-4: 'dzam bu gling gi gling stong phrag gsum dang bcas rgya mtsho chen po bzhis brgyan pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-5: gzhan yang phyogs bcu ji snyed pa'i zag bcas kyi 'jig rten khams nas sems can thams cad kyi bar du 'dra bar de dag thams cad zag pa med pa'i gsal zhing rig pa'i byang chub kyi sems su gyur cing mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-8: shes pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i skyon dang 'brel bas kun rdzob tsam du 'phrad pa dang ltos pa las skye ba dang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-11: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin pa'i rkyen dang gtan du 'bral bar nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-12: khyad par du skye ba dang 'gag pa'i rkyen thams cad 'gag cing skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mngon par rdzogs nas dag cing gsal ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin dang rig pa'i rang bzhin gtan du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-14: khyod sngon gdod ma'i rig pa rmad du byung ba gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:419b-15: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-0: rang byung ba'i mtshan nyid can ma yin pa rig na'ang gdod ma'i rig pa 'di nyid 'phrad pa dang ltos pa las @420a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-2: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa las ma byung ba yang ma yin pa gsal bar ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-4: ngas da ltar slar yang yul mngon sum pa las brtsams te khyod la 'dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-5: khyod da lta 'jig rten thams cad kyi log par rtog pa 'phrad pa dang ltos pa la sogs pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid du bzung nas rang nyid kyis rnam par rtog cing byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-6: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa las bskrun pa yin snyam du sems mod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-7: da lta khyod kyi rnam par dag pa'i mthong ba'i rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-8: snang ba dang 'phrad pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-9: mun pa dang 'phrad pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-10: thogs med dang 'phrad pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-11: bem po dang 'phrad pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-12: gal te snang ba dang 'phrad pa yin zhe na; da lta khyod kyis snang ba mthong ba'i tshe snang ba kho na mngon sum du gsal bar mthong bar rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-13: mthong ba'i bya ba sna tshogs 'dres pa ga la rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-14: mthong ba'i mtshan ma 'byed par nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-17: gal te mthong ba ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-18: ci'i phyir snang ba mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-19: gal te mthong ba nyid yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-20: ji ltar na; mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-21: gal te mthong ba nyid kyis khyab pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-22: gang du snang ba dang 'phrad par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420a-23: gal te snang bas khyab pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-0: gang du mthong @420b ba dang 'phrad pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-1: gdon mi za bar mthong ba snang ba dang tha dad ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-2: 'dres pa'i dbang gis gdod ma zhes pa'i ming 'dor bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-4: snang ba'i rang bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-5: des na snang ba 'phrad pa rigs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-8: bem po la sogs pa de dag kyang de nyid dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-10: da lta khyod kyi rnam par dag pa'i mthong ba'i rig pa de snang ba la ltos pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-11: mun pa la ltos pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-12: thogs med la ltos pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-13: bem po la ltos pa yin snyam ma mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-14: gal te snang ba la ltos pa yin zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:420b-16: gal te mun pa mthong ba'i tshe mun pa la ltos pa ma yin gyi snang ba la ltos pa yin snyam na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:422a-11: mig las byung ba ma yin no; ;kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:422a-13: gal te nam mkha' las byung ba yin zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:422b-6: gal te mthong ba med ce na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:422b-8: yang rab ri mthong ba'i tshe mig la gdod ma nas rab rib tu gyur pa med do zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:425b-13: gal te dbang po las byung ba yin na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:425b-15: 'di ltar na mnyan par byed pa'i shes pa gdod ma nas rang bzhin med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:426a-21: stong pa rang nyid snom par byed na khyod kyi skye mched la ltos pa 'brel med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:426b-19: stong pa las byung ba ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-3: ro yod pa'i shes pa med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-4: mngar ba dang kha ba'i ro ji ltar shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-5: gal te lce las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-6: mngar ba dang kha ba'i ro dang ro mi bro ba gdon mi za bar med par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-10: yang stong pa rang nyid kyis shes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-11: khyod kyi skye mched la ltos pa 'brel med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-12: de'i phyir lce'i skye mched kun rdzob tsam yin zhing /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-17: skye bo gang zhig lag pa grang mos lag pa dron mol reg pa'i rjes su grang ba'i reg pa shugs che na dro ba de grang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-18: dro ba'i reg pa shugs chen grang ba de dro bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-19: de bzhin du 'di gnyis mnyam du 'phrad cing tshor ba'i reg pa 'di bral ba las shes pa mngon du gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427a-20: shugs la ltos pa'i phyir tshor ba'i ngal ba 'khrul pa las gyur ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-0: lus dang bcas pa ngal nga'i 'khrul pa thams cad byang chub kyi chos nyid kyis @427b gtad nas ngal zhing 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-1: 'bral ba dang 'phrad pa gnyis den pa ma yin pa'i yul la brten nas bar skabs der shes pa skye ste /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-3: shes pa'i phung po 'di 'bral ba dang 'phrad pa dang phan pa dang gnod pa ste yul de gnyis dang bral ba na gtan nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-4: kun dga' bo; 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-5: shes pa 'di 'bral ba dang 'phrad pa las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-6: phan pa dang gnod pa las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-7: dbang po las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-8: stong pa las byung ba yang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-10: gal te 'phrad pa'i dus su byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-11: bral ma thag tu 'gag pa'i phyir bral ba ji ltar shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-13: gnod pa'i mtshan ma gnyis de nyid dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:427b-14: gal te dbang po las byung ba yin zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-2: skye bo gang zhig ngal zhing du ba nas gnyid log log pa las sad par gyur pa dang yul mthong zhing sems kyi kun rtog 'char la sems g-yengs nas 'phral du brjed pa dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-3: de ltar log par rtog pas rim bzhin du skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-6: 'gag pa'i bag chags smin pa myong ba'i dbang gis rim pa mi 'chol bar 'byung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-7: yid kyi shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-8: yid dang bcas pa ngal ba'i 'khrul ba thams cad byang chub kyi chos nyid kyis gtad nas ngal zhing 'phrul ba'i mtshan ma yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-9: skye 'gag gnyis bden pa ma yin pa'i yul la brten nas bar skabs der shes pa 'dus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-10: mthong ba dang thos pa nang du log nas 'jug tu med pa'i yul skye zhing 'gag pa'i nang gi don myong ba'i phyir shes pa'i rang bzhin zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-11: shes pa'i rang bzhin 'di sad gnyid dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-15: shes pa'i dbang po 'di sad pa dang gnyid log pa las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-16: skye 'gag las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-17: dbang po las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-18: stong pa las byung ba yang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428a-20: gal te sad pa las byung ba yin na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-1: gdon mi za bar skyes pa'i tshe byung ba yin zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-5: skyes pas 'gag pa gtan nas med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-6: skyes pa shes pa po su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-7: gal te dbang po las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-8: sad pa dang gnyid log pa'i mtshan ma gnyis lus kyi dbang gis 'byed pa dang sdud par 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-16: skye mched bcu gnyis gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dam pa'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-18: khyod kyis da lta ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-20: yang chu mig dang rdzing bu la sogs pa sna tshogs su mthong ba 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-21: 'di dag gzugs las mig gi yul du gyur pa yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:428b-22: mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan mar gyur ba yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-0: gal te mig gi dbang po las gzugs kyi mtshan @429a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-1: mar gyur pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-2: stong pa mthong ba'i tshe gzugs ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-3: gzugs kyi rang bzhin zhi bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-4: zhe na mngon sum du yod pa thams cad ci yang med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-5: gzugs kyi mtshan ma med par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-6: spyir stong pa'i gnas lugs sus shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-7: stong pa yang de kho na dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-8: gal te yul gzugs las [?] mig gis mthong ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-9: stong pa mthong ba'i tshe gzugs ma yin pa zhig na mthong ba nyid 'phral du zhi zhing 'gag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-10: 'gag na thams cad ci yang med par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-11: stong pa dang gzugs sus shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-12: de'i phyir yul can mthong ba dang yul gzugs dang stong pa thams cad skye zhing mched pa'i gnas med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-15: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin yang ma yin zhes shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-17: khyod legs par nyon la dpyod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-18: dze ta'i tshal 'di'i nang du zas bshams pa'i rjes su rnga brdung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-19: dge 'dun mang po 'du ba la dril chen brdung ba'i tshe rnga dang dril chen gyi sgra snga phyi bar mchad par grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-21: sgra 'di dang rna ba'i drung du 'ongs pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429a-22: rna ba sgra'i gnas su song ba yin snyam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-1: gal te sgra 'di rna ba'i drung du 'ongs pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-3: nga mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod snyoms la phyin pa na dze ta'i tshal du nga med pa dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-4: sgra 'di gdon mi za par kun dga' bo'i rna ba la 'ongs pa'i phyir moonggal gyi bu dang 'od srung la sogs pa thams cad kyi rna bar mi thos par rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-5: 'di'i nang du dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag dril chen gyi sgra thos ma thag tu thams cad lhan cig tu bkad sar 'dus nas 'ong ba lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-6: slar yang khyod kyi rna ba sgra de'i gnas su song ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-8: nga dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs nas 'dug pa na nga mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du med pa dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-9: khyod kyis rnga'i sgra thos nas rna ba 'phral du rnga brdung ba'i sar song ba'i phyir mnyam du byung ba'i dril chen gyi sgra mi thos par rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-10: de'i nang du glang po che dang rta dang phyugs dang lug la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i sgra skad rnams lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-11: gal te 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni med na yang thos pa nyid med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-12: de'i phyir thos pa dang sgra'i gdangs thams cad gnas kyang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-13: thos pa dang yul sgra gnyis kun rdzob tsam yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-14: gdod ma nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-15: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin yang ma yin zhes shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:429b-17: yang khyod spos snod kyi nang du bsregs pa'i tsandan gyi dri la snoms shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-0: tsandan 'di las cung zad cig bsregs @430a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-1: pa na mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi mtha' skor kun nas rgyang grags bzhi bcu'i nang du dus gcig tu thams cad kyis dri tshor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-2: 'di ji snyam du sems; tsandan gyi dri 'di tsandan gyi shing las skyes pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-3: khyod kyi sna las skyes pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-4: yang na stong pa las skyes pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-6: gal te tsandan gyi dri 'di khyod kyi sna las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-7: sna las skyes pa de nyid sna las 'byung bar rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-8: sna de tsandan ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-9: ci'i phyir sna'i nang du tsandan gyi dri yod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-10: khyod gyis tsandan gyi dri tshor ro zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-12: gal te stong pa las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430a-13: stong pa'i rang bzhin rtag pa yin pa'i phyir tsandan gyi dri de rtag par 'gyur bar rigs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-3: khyod dus gnyis su tshogs mang po dang mnyam du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar 'gyur la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-7: lce las skyes pa yin snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-8: yang na zas las skyes pa yin snyam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-10: gal te ro 'di khyod kyi lce las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-11: khyod kyi kha'i nang du lce gcig nyid yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-12: lce 'di la de'i tshe 'o ma'i ros khyab par gyur pa yin la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-14: ro gzhan du ma gyur pa de nyid la ro shes pa zhes brjod du mi rung ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-18: ji ltar rang gis shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-19: zas rang nyid kyis shes pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-20: gzhan gyis zos pa dang 'dra bas khyod kyis ro shes pa 'brel med do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-22: nam mkha' stong pa'i ro myong bar gyis shig dang ro ji ltar 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:430b-23: gdon mi za bar nam mkha' stong pa'i ro de lan tshva'i ro'o zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431a-1: bzhin la yang lan tshva'i ro myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431a-2: de ltar na 'jig rten 'di'i skye bo thams cad rgya mtsho'i nya dang 'dra bar rtag tu lan tshva'i ro tshor ba'i phyir ro mi bro ba gtan mi shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431a-3: ro mi bro ba mi shes na lan tshva'i ro mi tshor bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431a-24: mgo dang lag pa gnyis yan lag gcig tu 'gyur bar rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431b-0: gal te yan lag gcig @431b yin na; reg pa de mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431b-2: reg pa de gang la gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431b-3: reg byed la yod na reg bya ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431b-4: reg bya la yod na reg byed ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:431b-5: stong pa de khyod kyi reg byar mi rigs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:432a-0: @432a *// khyod kyi sems ji ltar khyod las tha dad du 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:434b-11: dri las skyes pa ma yin no //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-0: rnam par shes pa 'di lce las skyes shing lce'i khams su gyur pa @435a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-8: gal te lce'i rang bzhin kha ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-9: su zhig 'ongs nas lce'i ro myong ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-10: lce rang nyid kyis ro myong bar mi nus she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-11: sus rig nas shes pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-12: lce'i rang bzhin kha ba ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-13: ro rang nyid mi skye ba'i phyir ji ltar khams su gyur nas gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-14: gal te ro las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-15: rnam par shes pa ro nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-16: lce'i dbang po bzhin du rang nyid myong mi nus pa'i phyir ji ltar ro dang ro ma yin pa rig nas shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-17: yang ro sna tshogs dngos po gcig las skyes pa ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-18: ro mang po skyes pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang mang por 'gyur bar rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-19: gal te rnam par shes pa'i phung po gcig yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-20: nges par phung po ro las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435a-21: lan tshva dang ro mi gro ba dang mngar ba dang ro tsha ba rnams sbyar ba dang lhan skyes dang 'gyur ba'i ro sna tshogs pa so so'i mtshan ma thams cad ro gcig tu 'gyur bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-0: so sor @435b dbye bar byar med par rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-1: so sor dbye bar byar med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-2: rnam par shes pa zhes tha snyad 'dogs su mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-3: ci'i phyir lce dang ro dang rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes tha snyad btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-4: nam mkha' stong pa khyod kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bor skye bar mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-5: lce dang ro 'dres shing 'phrad pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-6: 'di'i dbus su gdod ma nas de bzhin nyid med pa la ji ltar khams skye bar 'gyur /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-11: yang khyod kyi shes pa de lus dang reg bya 'brel nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-12: rnam par shes pa 'di lus las skyes shing lus kyi khams su gyur pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-13: yang na reg bya las skyes shing reg bya'i khams su gyur pa yin; kun dga' bo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-14: gal te lus las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-15: nges par 'phrad pa dang 'bral ba gnyis shes pas rig pa 'brel ba med par 'gyur ba'i phyir lus ci zhig gis shes pa yin; gal te reg bya las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:435b-16: nges par khyod kyi lus med par 'gyur ba'i phyir sus lus med pa la 'phrad pa dang 'bral ba shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-0: @436a *// dngos po des reg bya mi shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-1: lus des reg bya yod bar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-2: lus kyis shes pa de reg bya nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-3: reg bya shes pa de lus nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-4: reg bya yin na lus ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-5: lus yin na reg bya ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-6: lus dang reg bya'i mtshan ma gnyis gdod ma nas gnas kyang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-7: lus dang 'phrad pa na lus kyi phung po'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-8: lus dang bral ba na khong stong la sogs pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-9: phyi nang ma grub pa la dbus ji ltar gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-10: dbus mi gnas na phyi nang gi rang bzhin stong par 'gyur ba'i phyir khyod kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa de gang la brten nas khams gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-11: de'i phyir lus dang reg bya 'brel nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba'i gnas gsum po med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-12: lus dang reg bya dang lus kyi khams gsum po gdod ma nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-15: yang khyod kyi shes pa de yid dang chos 'brel nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-16: rnam par shes pa 'di yid las skyes shing yid kyi khams su gyur pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-17: yang na chos las skyes shing chos kyi khams su gyur pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436a-19: gal te yid las skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-0: khyod @436b kyi yid la gdon mi za bar bsam par bya ba yod pa'i phyir khyod kyi yid mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-1: gal te mdun gyi chos med na yid skye ba yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-2: 'brel pa dang bral na mtshan ma med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ga la dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-3: yang khyod kyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa dang spros pa la sogs phye nas shes pa'i rang bzhin 'dra'o snyam mam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-4: tha dad do snyam du sems yid dang 'dra na yid nyid du gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-5: ji ltar yid las skyes pa zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-6: yid las tha dad cing 'dra ba ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-7: shes par bya ba med par 'gyur bar rigs; gal te shes par bya ba med na ji ltar yid las skyes pa zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-8: gal te shes par bya ba yod na ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-9: 'di la 'dra ba dang tha dad gnyis kyi rang bzhin mi 'grub pa la khams gang la gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-10: gal te chos las skyes pa yin zhe na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-11: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yul lnga dang mi 'bral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-12: khyod kyis dpyod la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-13: gzugs kyi chos dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan ma dang rnam pa gsal bar dbang po lnga la so sor ngo skal du sbyor ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-14: yid la yongs su sdud par bya ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-15: khyod kyi rnam par shes pa nges par chos la brten nas skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:436b-16: da lta khyod kyis legs par ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-0: sna tshogs pa'i chos rnams la mtshan @437a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-2: gal te gzugs stong pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-3: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-6: skye ba dang 'gag dang bral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-7: 'di dag mtshan ma mang po las gzhan ci yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-8: skyes pa na gzugs dang stong pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams rim gyis skyes la 'gag pa na gzugs dang stong pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams rim gyis 'gag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-9: gdod ma nas brten pa med pa'i phyir brten nas skyes pa ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang rnam par gyur pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-10: mtshan ma dang rnam pa med pa la khams ji ltar skye ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-11: de'i phyir yid dang chos 'brel nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba'i gnas gsum po thams cad med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-12: yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam pa gsum po gdod ma nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-13: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin yang ma yin zhes shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-14: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'phrad pa dang ltos pa dang brten nas 'byung ba'i chos 'ba' zhig gsungs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-17: 'jig rten du sna tshogs ba'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437a-18: skye ba thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phrad cing ltos pa las mngon par 'byung ba'o zhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-0: da lta de bzhin gshegs @437b pas brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-1: rang byung ba rnam pa gnyis ci'i phyir yongs su spangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-2: da lta 'di'i rgyu mtshan gang yin bdag gis ma 'tshal lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-3: sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bas dbu ma'i lam zab mo drang don tsam du ma yin par gsal bar bstan du gsol zhes gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-4: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-5: khyod sngon theg pa chung du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las yid byung ste bral bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed nas bla na med pa'i byang chub gus pas tshol ba'i phyir ngas da lta khyod la nges pa'i don rmad du byung ba phye nas bstan bzhin du ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi drang ba'i don du rnam par brtags nas brten nas 'byung bas rang nyid dkris shing 'ching bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-6: khyod mang du thos pa yin na'ang dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-7: sman gyi bye brag smra ba po 'ga' zhig mig sngar sman rnams mthong bzhin du khyad par ngo mi shes pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-8: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyir zhing thugs brtse ba'i yul nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-10: deng khyod kyis legs par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-11: ngas khyod la khyad par phye zhing bkral te bstan nas slad ma'i dus su theg pa chen pos 'gro ba rnams la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:437b-13: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la gus pas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-2: khyod kyis smras pa ltar na 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phrad cing ltos pa las 'jig rten du sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-3: skye ba mngon par 'byung ngo zhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-5: gal te 'byung ba chen po de dag gi mtshan nyid dang gzugs 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-6: 'byung ba chen po thams cad lhan cig 'phrad cing ltos par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-8: nam mkha' stong pa bzhin du gzugs thams cad la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-9: gal te 'phrad pa dang ltos pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-12: thog ma dang tha ma gcig las gcig skye zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-13: skye ba dang 'chi ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de skyes nas 'chi zhing shi nas skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-14: skye bzhin 'chi bzhin du mgal me'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar rgyun du mi gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-17: chu yang 'khyags par gyur nas 'khyags pa yang chur 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-20: sa gzhi chen por gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-22: sa rdul phra mo nas rdul phra rab kyi par du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-23: gzugs shin tu phra ba'i mthar thug de cha bdun las grub pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438a-24: slar yang rdul phra rab bgos na nges par stong par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-0: gal te rdul phra rab 'di nyid bgos pas nam mkha' stong par 'gyur @438b na; nam mkha' stong pa las gzugs kyi rnam pa grub par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-1: da lta khyod kyis dris pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-2: 'phrad cing ltos pa'i rkyen gyis 'jig rten du sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas rnam par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-4: zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-6: rdul phra rab gcig pu 'di ji tsam pa'i nam mkha' dang 'phrad cing ltos pa las 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-7: rdul phra rab rdul phra rab nyid dang ltos pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-8: gal te slar yang rdul phra rab bgos te stong par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-9: ji tsam pa'i rdul phra rab kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' stong par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-10: gal te gzugs ltos pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-11: gzugs ltos pa yin gyi stong pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-12: gal te stong pa ltos pa yin na stong pa ltos pa yin gyi gzugs ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-13: gzugs la bgo bar nus kyi stong pa la ji ltar ltos pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-17: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-21: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par las kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur ba khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-22: so so skye bo 'khor ba pa dag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:438b-23: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-0: thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis so sor @439a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-2: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-4: me'i khams la lus med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-7: grong khyer gyi nang du zas ma zos pa'i khang par g-yos byed pa la lag tu me shel thogs nas nyi ma'i thad du gtad nas me sngor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-9: 'phrad cing ltos pa zhes tha snyad btags pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-11: nga da lta khyed cag stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dus pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-12: 'dus pa gcig yin kyang de'i rigs rus phye na lus so sor yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-13: thams cad la nye du dang rigs dang rus dang ming dag so sor yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-18: 'od srung gyi rigs yin pa nas kun dga' bo goo ta ma'i rigs yin pa'i bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-20: gal te me'i khams 'di 'phrad cing ltos pa las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-21: de'i lag tu shel thogs nas nyi ma'i thad du me sbor ba'i tshe me de shel las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-22: spra ba las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-23: nyi ma las byung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-25: gal te nyi ma las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-26: khyod kyi lag gi spra ba de nyi ma nyid kyis sbar bar nus na 'od de phog pa'i yul thams cad kyi nags tshal thams cad sreg par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439a-27: gal te shel las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-0: shel @439b na; shel las byung nas rang nyid kyis spra ba sbor nus bzhin du shel rang nyid ci'i phyir zhu bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-1: khyod kyi lag tu 'dzin pa na tshig pa'i rnam pa yang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-2: shel zhu ba smos ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-3: gal te spra ba las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-4: ci'i phyir nyi ma dang shel la brten nas 'od dang shel phan tshun 'phrad pa las gdod me 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-5: khyod slar yang dpyod la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-6: shel ni; lag tu bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-8: nam mkha' la shar ba yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-10: sa las skyes pa yin pa la me 'di gang nas byung ste rim pas 'dir sleb pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-11: nyi ma dang shel phan tshun thag ring pos bar du chod nas 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-13: rgya med par rang byung ba yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying p'i rang bzhin gyi me ni yang dag pa'i stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-16: rang bzhin gyi stong pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-20: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par snang ba khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-23: 'jig rten gyi skye bo yul gang du shel thogs ba'i yul der me 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:439b-24: chos thams cad kyi dbyings khyab par kun tu song na 'jig rten thams cad du mched par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-0: 'jig rten thams cad du khyab par mched @440a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-2: las kyi dbang gis mngon du gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-3: so so skye bo 'khor ba bdag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-4: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-5: thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis so sor phye nas 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-6: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-12: mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi drang srong ka bi la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-14: padma aa si ta la sogs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan chen po dag zla ba'i bcud blangs te sgyu ma'i rdzas bsdebs pa la sgyu ma mkhan de dag mtshan gung nam mkha' drangs par zla ba rgyas pa la lag tu chu shel thogs te zla ba las chu bzed de len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-15: chu 'di shel las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-16: nam mkha' la rang gi ngang gis yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-19: gal te zla ba las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-20: thag ring po nas 'ongs te shel las chu dbyung nus pa yin pa la de brgyud nas 'ongs pa'i gnas thams cad kyi nags tshal dag las rgyun 'bab par rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-21: rgyun de shel las 'byung ba la sgug mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-23: chu de zla ba las babs pa min par gsal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-24: gal te shel las byung ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440a-25: shel 'di'i nang nas rgyun du chu 'bab par rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-0: @440b mtshan gung zla ba gsal ba las len pa la sgug ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-1: gal te nam mkha' las byung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-2: nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa'i phyir chu yang mtha' med pa 'byung bar rigs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-3: mi yul nas lha yul gyi bar du bying bar rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-4: ci'i phyir chu dang skam dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba dag yod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-5: khyod slar yang legs par ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-7: nam mkha' la shar ba yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-9: lag par bzung ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-10: shel la bzed pa'i chu'i snod ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-11: mi yis sta gon byas pa yin pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-12: chu de phyogs gang nas babs te 'dir 'ong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-13: zla ba dang shel phan tshun thag ring pos bar du chod nas 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-15: rgyu med par rang byung ba yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-16: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi chu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-18: rang bzhin gyi stong pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-22: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par snang ba khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-23: yul gang du shel thogs pa'i yul de la chu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-24: chos thams cad kyi dbyings khyab par song na chos kyi dbyings thams cad skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:440b-26: 'jig rten kun tu bkang na phyogs mtshams yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-0: las kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur @441a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-2: so so skye bo 'khor ba pa dag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-3: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-4: thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis 'dzin par byed do; ;cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-6: rlung gi khams la lus med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-7: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-9: khyod skabs 'ga' zhig tu gos tshags byas te dge 'dun gyi tshogs chen po 'dus pa'i tshe snam sbyar gyi gra bskyod nas drung gi mi gzhan la reg pa tsam gyis rlung chung ngu des mi'i gdong la phog par byed do; ;rlung 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-10: snam sbyar gyi gra las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-11: nam mkha' stong pa las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-12: mi de'i gdong las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-14: gal te rlung de snam sbyar gyi gra las byung ba yin na khyod kyis rlung gyon par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-15: gos de rlung gis bskyod nas khyod kyi lus dang 'bral bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-16: ngas da lta tshogs kyi nang du chos gsungs pa na gos kyi gra rlung gis bskyod pa la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-17: nga'i gos kyi rlung gang du 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-18: gos kyi nang du rlung sbed par mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-19: gal te nam mkha' stong pa las skyes so zhe na; khyod kyi gos mi bskyod pa'i tshe ci'i phyir rlung mi 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441a-20: stong pa'i rang bzhin rtag pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir rlung ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-0: rgyun du 'byung bar rigs shing rlung med na @441b nam mkha' stong pa yang 'gag par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-1: rlung 'gag pa shes par nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-2: stong pa 'gag pa ji ltar shes par nus gal te skye ba dang 'gag pa yod na nam mkha' stong pa zhes brjod du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-3: nam mkha' stong pa yin pa la rlung ji ltar 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-4: gal te rlung phog pa'i gdong las 'byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-5: de'i gdong las byung zhing khyod la phog par rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-6: khyod kyi gos tshags byas pa la ci'i phyir pha rol gzhan gyi gdong la phog par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-7: khyod kyis legs par dpyod la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-11: gzhan gyi yin la; nam mkha' stong pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-12: gtan mi g-yo ba la rlung gang nas bskyod de 'dir sleb /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-13: rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-14: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-15: rlung gi khams rgyu med par rang byung ba yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi rlung ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-19: rang bzhin gyi stong pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:441b-23: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par snang ba khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-0: khyod mi gcig pu'i gyon pa'i gos cung zad bskyod pa la rlung cung zad 'byung ba ltar chos kyi @442a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-1: dbyings khyab par song ba na yul khams thams cad 'gengs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-2: 'jig rten kun tu khyab na phyogs mtshams yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-3: las kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-4: so so skye bo 'khor ba pa dag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-5: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-6: thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-7: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-9: stong pa'i rang bzhin la gzugs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-10: gzugs dang stong pa'i dbang gis shes shing gsal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-12: mnyan yod grong khyer gyi chu klung nas thag ring po'i sar rgyal rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-15: gdol ba'i rigs mang po de dag gzhi gsar pa bzung ste khron pa brkos te chu tshol ba'i skabs su sa khru gang brkos pa na nang du stong pa khru gang yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-16: de bzhin du 'dom do brkos na stong pa 'dom do yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-17: stong pa zab mi zab ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-18: brkos te blangs pa'i sa mang nyung gi dbang gis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-20: sa las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-21: brkos pa las byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-22: yang na rgyu med par rang byung ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442a-24: gal te stong pa 'di rgyu med par rang byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-0: sa brko ba'i sngon @442b du stong pa la ci'i phyir gzung du med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-1: sa gzhi chen po nyid mthong gi stong pa mthong ba gtan nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-2: gal te sa las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-3: sa brko ba'i tshe stong pa 'jug pa mthong bar rigs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-4: sa brko ba la stong pa mi 'jug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-5: ci'i phyir sa las skye zhes smra rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-6: gal te 'byung ba dang 'jug pa med ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-7: stong pa dang sa gtan nas tha mi dad du 'gyur bar rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-9: gcig tu 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dbyung ba'i tshe stong pa yang ci'i phyir mi dbyung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-10: gal te brkos pas byung zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-13: sa phyung ba yin zhes smra mi rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-14: brkos pas byung ba ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-15: sa kho na brkos nas phyung ba yin par rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-16: ci'i phyir stong pa mthong ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-17: khyod kyis slar yang zhib tu dpyod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-18: legs par rtog la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-20: mi'i lag pas sa ji tsam brkos pa'i tshod tsam gyis bskyis nas len no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-22: sa las bskyis nas dbyung ba yin pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-23: stong pa 'di gang nas byung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-24: brko ba dang stong bar 'gyur ba dang khong stong dang khong stong ma yin pa rnams phan tshun mtshon du mi rung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-25: 'phrad pa dang ltos pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-26: stong pa rgyu med par rang byung ba zhes smra ru mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:442b-27: gal te nam mkha' 'dis stong pa'i rang bzhin la khyab par bkang nas gdod ma nas brgyud de mi g-yo bar 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-1: sngar yod pa'i sa chu me rlung thams cad 'byung ba chen po lnga zhes tha snyad du 'dogs pa shes par rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-2: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid yang dag mthar thug ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gdod ma nas skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-4: khyod kyi sems mi gsal zhing rmongs pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-5: nam mkha' stong pa la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-12: rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-16: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun par rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-19: khron pa gcig brkos na khron pa gcig gi stong pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-20: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' stong pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar yin gyis phyogs bcu kun tu khyab na phyogs mtshams yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-21: las kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443a-22: so so skye po 'khor ba pa dag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-0: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin @443b ni; thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-1: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-3: rnam par rig pa la shes pa med; gzugs dang stong pa'i dbang gis skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-5: da lta khyod kyi lus dze ta'i tshal du gnas pa ltar nyin mo snang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-6: mtshan mo mun par gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-7: mtshan gung du zla ba yod na 'od dang ldan la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-8: zla ba med na mun pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-9: snang ba dang mun pa'i rkyen gyis rig pa 'byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-10: rig pa 'di snang ba dang mun pa'i gzugs dang slar nam mkha' stong pa dang lhan du lus gcig yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-16: rig pa 'di gal te snang ba dang mun pa dang nam mkha' stong pa dang gdod ma nas lus gcig yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-17: snang ba dang mun pa gnyis kyi gzugs thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-18: mun pa'i tshe snang ba med cing snang ba'i tshe mun pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-19: gal te mun pa dang gcig yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-20: snang ba yin na reg pa 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:443b-21: gdon mi za bar snang ba dang lhan du yin na mun pa'i dus su 'gag par rigs 'gag na der zad kyi yang ji ltar snang ba mthong ba dang mun pa mthong zhes rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-0: gal te snang ba dang mun pa yin na tha dad rigs pa la skye 'gag med pa yin na ci'i phyir gcig ces @444a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-2: gal te rig pa 'di'i ngang tshul mun pa dang snang ba dang lhan du lus gcig tu gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-4: khyod snang ba dang mun pa dang nam mkha' stong pa las phral te rig pa'i gdod ma'i gnas lugs dbye bar nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-7: nam mkha' stong pa dang bral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-8: rig pa 'di'i ngang tshul rus sbal gyi spu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-10: snang ba dang mun pa dang nam mkha' stong pa rnam pa gsum la 'di so sor tha dad pa'i phyir rig pa gang nas grub /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-11: snang ba dang so sor tha dad pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dra zhes rung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-12: rnam pa gsum po 'di las bral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-13: gtan nas med pa la ji ltar gzhan zhes rung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-14: stong pa la cha phye rig pa la cha phye zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-15: rang rang gi ngo skal gyi yul 'byed du med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-17: mun pa mthong ba dang snang ba mthong ba'i rang bzhin de 'pho zhing 'gyur ba ma yin pa ji ltar tha dad ces so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-18: khyod kyis slar yang legs par sgrims la gsal bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-19: rab tu rtog cing dpyod la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-23: zla ba med pa'i rjes su 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-26: stong pa ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444a-28: rig pa 'di'i ngang tshul gang gis 'byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-0: @444b 'phrad pa dang ltos pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-1: rig pa'i ngang tshul rgyu med par rang byung ba yin zhes smra mi rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-2: gal te mthong ba dang thos pa dang shes pa'i rang bzhin kun tu khyab cing gdod ma nas g-yo 'gul med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-3: gdon mi za bar mtha' med cing mi g-yo ba nam mkha' stong pa slar yang g-yo ba sa chu me rlung dang lhan du 'byung ba chen po drug ces tha snyad 'dogs pa shes par rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-4: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid yang dag mthar thug ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gdod ma nas skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-7: khyod thog ma nas blun pa dang rmongs pas mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-8: gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-9: khyod mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa 'di la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-16: 'dra ba mi 'dra ba gang yang ma yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-19: tshor ba'i snang ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:444b-24: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid dang mthun pas rang rang gi blo'i skal ba dang 'tsham par khyod kyis gtan nas ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-1: po gcig gi mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-2: chos kyi dbyings la khyab na thos pa dang snom pa dang mya ba dang reg pa dang tshor zhing shes pa'i yon tan dam pa thams cad rgyas par chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab nas phyogs bcu kun tu khyab na phyogs mtshams yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-3: las kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-4: so so skye bo 'khor ba pa dge rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-5: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-6: thams cad du rig pa dang sems kyis so sor 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-7: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-9: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rgyu med dbang po drug dang yul la brten nas 'khrul pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-10: khyod da lta 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshogs 'di dag la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-11: khyod kyis mig gis thams cad la rim gyis lta ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-12: me long du shar ba bzhin du dbye ba gtan nas 'byed nus pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-13: khyod kyi rnam par shes pa nang gi rtog pas re re nas 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-23: zhes so sor ngos 'dzin par byed do; ;rnam par shes pa 'dis gsal bar shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445a-26: nam mkha' stong pa las byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-0: yang na rten med par glo bur du @445b byung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-2: gal te khyod kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rig pa las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-3: snang ba dang mun pa dang gzugs dang stong pa bzhi po 'di dag gtan nas ma byung bas; khyod kyi rig pa gtan med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-4: rig pa'i khams kyang med pa la gang nas rnam par shes pa skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-5: gal te khyod kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs las byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-6: rig pa las byung ba ma yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-7: snang ba la lta mi dgos shing mun pa la yang lta mi dgos pa'i phyir snang ba dang mun pa ma mthong la de lta na gzugs dang stong pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-8: gzugs de yang med pa la rnam par shes pa gang nas skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-9: gal te stong pa las byung ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-11: rig pa ma yin par 'gyur la rig pa ma yin par phyir dbye bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-12: rang bzhin gyis snang ba dang mun pa dang gzugs dang stong pa shes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-13: gzugs ma yin pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'gag cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-14: mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa dag brten pa'i gnas med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-15: 'di gnyis gzhan la gnas pa'i phyir stong pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-19: dngos po dang 'dra ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-20: khyod kyi rnam par shes pa skye na yang ci zhig dbye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-21: gal te brten pa med par glo bur du skyes pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:445b-22: ci'i phyir nyin mo zla ba logs su ngos zin par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-1: bsgrims te phra zhing gsal bar zhib tu phye ste dpyod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-3: khyod kyi mig la brten la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-6: gzugs shar ba la yod par 'jog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-7: gzugs ma shar ba la med par 'jog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-8: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa gang la brten nas skyes pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-12: mi g-yo'o; ;'phrad pa dang ltos pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-13: snom pa dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa'i bar ji lta ba bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-14: rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa rkyen med par rang byung ba yang ma yin no; ;gal te rnam par shes pa 'di'i yid gdod ma nas brten pa'i gnas med do zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-15: gdon mi za bar mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa'i bar gsal bar dbye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-16: kun nas rnam pa thams cad du khyab pa dvangs shing 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin la brten pa ma yin zhes shes par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-17: de ltar stong pa dang sa chu me rlung dang lhan du 'byung ba chen po bdun zhes tha snyad btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-18: chos rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gdod ma nas skye ba dang 'gag pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-20: khyod kyi sems rags shing rdzun pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-21: mthong ba dang thos pas mngon par byung ba nges par shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446a-22: gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-0: khyod @446b gdon mi za bar khams drug po 'di rnam par shes pa'i sems mthong bar rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-5: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-6: yang na stong pa dang yod pa ma yin zhe'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-7: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-10: yang dag pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-11: rmad du byung ba'i tshor ba rnam par dag pa dvangs pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-12: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab nas phyogs bcu'i stong pa'i nang du chud cing 'byung ba ma rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-14: lus kyi dbang gis mngon du 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-15: so so skye bo 'khor ba pa dag rmongs te brten nas 'byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-16: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad rig pa dang sems kyis so sor 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:446b-17: cung zad tsam brjod du yod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i don ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-0: de'i tshe kun dga' bo dang dge 'dun gyi 'khor 'dus pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas zab cing phra ba'i sgo nas phye ste bstan pa mnos te lus sems dga' bde rgyas shing thogs pa med pa thob pas dge 'dun gyi 'khor 'dus pa de dag rang rang gi sems so so nas phyogs bcur khyab par shes nas phyogs bcur nam mkha' stong pa mthong ba la lag tu thogs pa'i lo ma mthong ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad @447a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-1: kyi dngos po ji snyed pa thams cad byang chub mchog gi 'od gsal ba'i sems yin pa'i phyir sems kyi ngang tshul yongs su khyab pa'i nang du phyogs bcu thams cad 'dus shing chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-2: pha ma las skyes pa'i lus la phyir bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-3: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' stong pa'i nang du rlung gis bdas pa'i rdul phran ltar sdod du med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-4: yang mtsho chen po snon po'i steng du g-yengs pa'i lbu ba gcig bzhin du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-6: 'dis rang rang gi lus la legs par rig cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-7: rmad du byung ba'i mchog gi gdod ma'i sems rtag par gnas shing 'gag pa med pa'i don rang gis rnyed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing sngar ma thos pa'i chos thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-8: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-9: 'gyur med rmad byung 'od gsal khyab bdag rje //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-10: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i rgyal po srid na dkon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-11: bdag cag bskal pa bye ba'i log rtog bsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-12: grangs med tshogs la ma ltos chos sku thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-13: re 'bras rin chen rgyal po mchog grub nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-14: gangg'a'i bye snyed sems can bsgral bar bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-15: zab mo sems 'dis rdul snyed zhing mchod de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-16: 'di yis brtse ldan rgyal ba'i bka' drin gzhal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang por mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-0: snyigs ma @447b lnga ru dpa' ba'i dam bca' bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-1: gal te 'gro gcig sangs rgyas ma thob par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-2: bdag ne ci nas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-3: dpa' ba chen po mthu chen snying rje che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-4: lkog gyur phra mo'i the tshom bsal du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-5: bdag ni bla med byang chub la bkod nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-6: phyogs bcu'i khams su chos kyi dga' ston bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-7: stong pa'i rang bzhin gzhig par nus srid kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-8: mi phyed sems 'di cis kyang 'gyur ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-11: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-13: de'i tshe byams ma'i bu gang po dge 'dun gyi 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa g-yon par gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gus pas gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-14: dpal yon chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-15: sems can thams cad kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa med pa'i don dam pa'i don gsal bar mdzad pa la mkhas pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-17: bdag chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bsngags pa lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:447b-18: da lta de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zab cing phra ba'i chos kyi dbyangs rmad du byung ba thos ba na dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-1: bo 'on bas gom pa brgya tsam gyi thag ring po'i sar sbrang bu'i skad mnyan pa na de'i gzugs kyang mi mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-2: skad thos pa smos ci dgos pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs nas bdag gi sgro 'dogs sel bar mdzad kyang da dung yang don 'di la som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral te gting mtha' rtogs par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-6: kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i skye bo dag don ji tsam khong du chud kyang goms pa'i bag chags kyi zag pa ma zad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-7: bdag la sogs pa zag pa zad pa'i skye bo 'dus pa'i tshogs dag zag pa zad kyang da lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi dbyangs thos ma thag tu the tshom med par byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-9: gal te 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs pa'i dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-13: khams la sogs pa thams cad gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'od gsal ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448a-14: ji ltar glo bur du ri dang chu klung dang sa chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i dngos po'i rnam pa skyes nas rim gyis phan tshun du thog ma dang tha ma med par res mos su 'khor ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-0: yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i sa chu me rlung gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab nas gsal bar rtag tu gnas pa @448b yin zhes gsungs lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-2: gal te sa'i khams kun tu khyab pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-3: chu la ji ltar chud par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-4: chu'i khams kun tu khyab pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-5: me skye bar mi 'gyur; yang chu dang me gnyis kyi khams nam mkha' stong pa la kun tu khyab nas ji ltar phan tshun du gnod bya gnod byed du gyur te nyams par byed mi nus zhes byar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-11: ci'i phyir 'di gnyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa yin zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas brtse ba snying rje chen po'i sgo nas bdag sogs 'khor 'dus pa rmongs shing 'khyams pa rnams la blo gros skyed par 'tshal bas gsol pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-15: yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te skom pas gdungs pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i rjes su bstan pa nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gang po dang bcas pa 'dus pa'i nang du zag pa zad pa mi slob pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-17: de bzhin gshegs pas de ring 'dus pa la dam pa las kyang dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin bstan nas 'dus pa khyed cag rang bzhin gyi rigs nges pa'i nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:448b-18: bdag med pa gnyis mngon du ma gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-0: rang gi theg pa las log ste theg pa mchog la gzhol @449a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-1: ba'i dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis theg pa chen po kho na'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-2: rnam par dag pa'i sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-3: yongs su sbyong ba'i spyod pa mchog gi gnas thob par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-4: khyed cag legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-6: gang po la sogs pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings mnyan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-7: zhes gus pas nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-8: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-10: khyod kyis gdod ma nas 'od gsal ba de ci'i phyir glo bur du ri dang chu klung dang sa gzhir gyur pa yin zhes smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-11: yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsal bang gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i rig pa rmad du byung ba'i 'od gsal pa de gdod ma nas rig pa rmad du byung ba'i 'od gsal bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-16: bdag gis rgyun du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsungs pa'i do na 'di thos pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-18: khyod kyis rig pa 'od gsal ba de rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir rig pa zhes btags pa 'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-19: yang na rig pa de 'od gsal pa med pa'i phyir 'od gsal ba'i rig pa zhes btags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449a-21: gal te 'di nyid 'od gsal ba med pa'i phyir rig pa zhes btags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-2: gal te gsal du med pas 'od gsal ba nyid rig pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-3: gzung bar bya ba yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-5: gzung bar bya ba med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-8: rig pa yang dvangs shing gsal ba'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-9: rang bzhin gyi rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-10: gdon mi za bar gsal ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-11: 'khrul nas 'od gsal bar gyur cing sangs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-12: gsal bar bya ba ma yin pa gsal ba'i phyir gzung bar bya ba mngon par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-13: 'khrul zhing gzung bar bya ba mngon par byas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-14: khyod cag gi 'khrul pa'i 'dzin pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-15: gdod ma nas 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba med pa la glo bur du gzhan du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-16: de yang gzhan dang gzhan yin pa'i phyir slar yang 'dra ba mngon par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-17: 'dra ba dang mi 'dra ba phye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-18: 'di las yang mi 'dra ba dang gzhan du med pa gzung bar bya ba mngon par byas so; ;de ltar rmongs shing ldongs nas phan tshun res mos su gyur te ngal nas 'khrul pa skye'o /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-19: 'khrul pa brgyud nas yul brtsams te rang nyid 'khyams shing g-yengs nas de las yul gyi 'khrul pa nyon mongs skya zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-21: 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-22: rang bzhin du gnas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:449b-23: nam mkha' stong par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-5: gtan nas 'dra ba dang gzhan du med pa zhes pa de yang dag pa'i dngos po'i chos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-6: sangs pa'i gsal ba dang stong pa'i mun pa gnyis ka phan tshun ltos nas rnam par 'gyur ba can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-7: de'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi mtha' brten par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-8: stong pa las g-yo ba'i bdag nyid du gyur nas gsal ba rab tu sgrib par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-9: rin po che gser zhes bya ba de gsal zhing dag pas rab tu bzung ba las byung ba yin; de'i phyir gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yul khams gnas gzhi thams cad brten par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-10: dag cing brten pa las rin po che gser du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-11: g-yo zhing gsal ba las rlung 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-12: rlung dang gser gnyis phan tshun ltos pa'i phyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gyur ba dang g-yo ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-13: rin po che gsal ba las rlan byung ste me'i 'od steng du spros bas chu'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i mtha'i khongs su chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-14: me steng dang chu 'og tu phan tshun 'brel te brtan par gnas shing gsher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-15: rgya mtsho chen por gyur to //
