K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-16: skam pa'i cha ni; gling du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-17: de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du me'i 'od 'phags par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450a-18: gling gi steng du chu bo'i rgyun 'bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-0: chu'i nus ba me yis zil gyis mnan nas @450b gong bur chags te ri bo mthon por gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-1: de'i phyir ri'i rde la rgyab na me 'byung la bzhugs pa na chur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-2: sa'i nus pa chus zil gyis mnan pas gong bur gyur nas rtsi shing du gyur to; ;de'i phyir nags tshal bsregs ban sa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur la btsir na chu 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-3: phan tshun du 'dres nas sa bon du gyur pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel pa 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-4: gsal ba'i rdzun pa gzhan med kyi dag pa'i gsal ba la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-5: rdzun pa gcig tu gnas nags la ba'i ngang tshul las 'dar mi rung la rten cing 'brel pa'i chos dag las thos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-9: gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya la sogs pa'i rdzun pa rnam pa drug 'di las skyes nas mthong ba dang tshor ba dang thos pa dang shes pa rnams so sor bral nas las kyi bye brag mthong nas 'dzin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-10: tshogs pa dang gyes pa las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-12: gsal ba mthong nas gzugs mngon du 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-13: gsal zhing rig pa las 'du shes 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-14: mthong ba mi mthun pa las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-16: 'du shes dang mthun pa las ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:450b-18: chags pa las rim gyis sa bon du gyur te 'du shes dang 'brel nas mngal chags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-0: 'brel ba las skye ba dang skyed pa'i las gcig tu mthun pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel ba'i dbang @451a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-4: rdzus skyes la sogs pa mer mer po dang nur nur por gyur nas rang rang gi skal ba las mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-5: sgo nga las skyes pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-6: 'du shes las skyes pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-9: drod gsher las skyes pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-10: tshor ba dang reg pa las 'byung ba yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-13: bsam pa dbang 'du shes dang tshogs pa dang 'bral ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-14: phan tshun du 'gyur nas res mos su rang rang gis bsags pa'i las kyi dbang gis skye gnas bzang ba dang ngan par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-15: rten cing 'brel pa 'di la sems can thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-17: 'du shes dang chags pa lhan du 'brel nas 'dod pas 'bral bar mi nus pa'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyi pha ma dang bu dang tshe bor 'gyur zhing skyes nas rgyun mi 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-20: sred pa dang chags pa lhan du rgyas nas chags pa ldog tu mi rung ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-21: 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgong skyes dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451a-24: mngal skyes dag rang rang gi mtha'i dbang gis mthu dang ldan pas mthu med pa za zhing gtsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-0: mis lugs zos pa'i rjes su lug de mir skyes @451b shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-1: sngar gyi mi de shi nas lug tu skye ba bzhin du sems can gyi ris bcu'i bar du 'chi bzhin skye bzhin du gcig gis gcig la res mos kyis lan glon zhing za bzhin du las ngan pa lhan du rgyas shing phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du thug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-4: tshur srog bcad pa'i lan du phar yang lan 'jal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-5: rten cing 'brel pa 'di la bskal pa brgya stong 'das na yang skye 'chi las thar par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-6: tshur yid 'phrog par byas pa na phar gzugs la chags par byed do; ;rten cing 'brel pa 'di la bskal pa brgya stong 'das na yang kun dkris las grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-8: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-9: log par g-yem pa rnam pa gsum po 'di ci nas kyang rtsa bar gyur ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel pa 'di la las kyi 'bras bu phan tshun du brgyad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-11: phyin ci log gsum po 'di brgyud pa ni; dag cing gsal bas yang dag par shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:451b-12: shes pa'i phyir gzugs su gyur cing rdzun pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas snang ba mngon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-0: ri dang chu klung dang sa gzhi'i gzugs dang kha dog thams cad rim gyis res mos su 'khor bzhin du rdzun pa'i 'khrul pa 'di'i rkyen gyis thog ma dang tha ma med par gcig tu 'khor @452a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-2: gal te rmad du byung ba'i rig pa 'di gdod ma nas rmad du byung ba'i gsal ba'i rig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-4: 'bri ba yang ma yin pa la ci'i phyir rgyu med par glo bur du ri dang chu klung dang sa chen po dang gzugs thams cad dngos su skye zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas da lta rmad du byung ba'i stong pa dang gsal ba dang rig pa brnyes pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-6: ri dang chu klung dang sa chen po sogs dngos po rnams dang 'brel zhing goms pa'i bag chags dang zag pa ji ltar yang skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-9: phyogs bslad pa'i skye bo zhig yul ljongs shig tu lho la byang ngo snyam du sems pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-11: yang na ma 'khrul par phyogs bslad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-13: phyogs bslad pa'i skye bo 'di 'khrul pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-16: 'khrul pa la rtsa ba med lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-17: ji ltar de la 'khrul pa zhes bya bar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-18: rtogs pa na 'khrul pa mi skye lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-19: ji ltar de la ma 'khrul pa zhes bya bar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-0: 'khrul pa'i skye bo de 'khrul bzhin pa'i tshe glo bur @452b du phyogs shes pa'i skye bos bstan nas shes pa na gang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-2: skye bo 'di ji tsam 'khrul yang yul ljongs der slar yang 'khrul lam zhes bka' stsal pa na gang pos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-7: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no; ;'phrul pa 'di la gtan nas rtsa ba med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-8: rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-9: gtan nas 'khrul pa med pa la 'khrul pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-10: 'khrul pa rig na 'khrul pa de 'gag par 'gyur la slar yang mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-11: skye bo rab rib can bar snang stong pa lar ri mthong ba dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-12: nad dang bral ma thag tu bar snang la ra ri mthong ba med par 'gyur ro; ;gal te skye bo blun po stong pa'i ra ri dag nas slar yang stong pa las ra ri snang ba la sgug na khyod kyis de blun po zhes bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-13: blo dang ldan pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-14: gang pos gsol pa; bar snang stong pa la gdod ma nas ra ri med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-15: 'khrul nas ra ri skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-16: ra ri dang bral ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-17: ra ri snang ba'i stong pa la ra ri dang bral ba mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-18: phyin ci log yin pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-19: slar yang de snang du re ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-20: de nges par phyin ci log gi blun po yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:452b-21: 'di lta bu phyin ci log gi skye bo la blun po'am blo dang ldan pa zhes ji ltar 'drir rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-2: khyod kyis phye ste smras pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-3: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rmad du byung ba'i rig pa 'od gsal stong pa la ci'i phyir yang ri dang chu klung sa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhes 'dri bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-5: gser khong na yod pa'i gser lhad dang 'dres pa de bzhus pa na slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-6: shing thal bar gyur pa de slar yang shing du mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-8: gang po; yang khyod kyis dris pa'i sa chu me rlung gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab na chu dang me'i khams phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed du gyur nas mi 'gag gam snyam du rtog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-9: yang nam mkha' stong pa dang sa chen po la sogs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings khyab nas nges par phan tshun du chud par mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-12: nam mkha' stong pa bzhin gzugs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-13: thams cad kyi rnam pa min yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dag mngon du gyur pa mi 'gog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-14: ci'i phyir zhe na; gang po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-15: nam mkha' stong pa la nyi ma shar na snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-16: sprin gyis sgrib na mog bor 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453a-17: rlung ldang na g-yo ba 'byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-0: sprin dang bral na drangs @453b par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-1: na bun 'thibs na mi gsal bar 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-2: rdul langs na rnyog ma can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-3: chu dvangs na gzugs snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-5: de ltar phyogs thams cad kyi rnam pa dngos po rang rang gi gnas nas skyes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-6: yang na stong pa la yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-7: gal te rang rang gi gnas las skyes so zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-9: dper na nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'od de nges par nyi ma'i 'od yin na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-10: ci'i phyir nam mkha' la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la ltos; gal te nam mkha'i 'od yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-11: nam mkha' rang nyid lham mer 'gyur bar rigs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-12: mtshan gung dang sprin dang na bun 'thibs pa'i tshe ci'i phyir 'od gsal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-13: des na snang ba de nyi ma'i rkyen las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-14: nam mkha'i rkyen las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-15: nam mkha' dang nyi ma tha dad pa'i rkyen las byung ba ma yin zhes shes par rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-17: gdod ma nas rdzun pa ngos gzung med pa la stong pa'i me tog las stong pa'i 'bras bu chags pa ltar ci'i phyir de'i skabs med par phan tshun gnod bya gnod byed du 'gyur ba'i don 'dri rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:453b-19: gdod ma nas bden zhing rmad du byung ba'i gsal ba'i rigs de tsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-1: byung ba'i sems gsal rig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-2: gdod ma nas chu dang me ma yin pa la ci'i phyir phan tshun du mi chud pa dris /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-3: nges par rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-4: khyod stong pa nyid 'dod na stong pa nyid mngon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-5: sa chu me rlung 'dod na de yang so sor gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-6: gal te yod do cog gsal bar byed na; de dag kyang so sor gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-7: ci'i phyir thams cad gsal ba yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-10: chu'i nang du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan mthong ba ltar skye bo gnyis kyis mnyam du chu'i nang gi nyi ma la blta bzhin du gyes nas phyogs shar nub tu song ba na so sor nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan re re rjes su 'brangs nas 'gro yang shar du gcig dang nub tu gcig gdod ma nas med la nyi ma gcig nyid kyang ci'i phyir so sor 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-11: nyi ma so so ba gnyis yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-12: ci'i phyir nyi ma gcig gi gzugs brnyan mthong zhes rgol zhing smra bar mi rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454a-13: yang dang yang du brtags na rdzun dang gsob kho na yin zhing nges pa'i gtad so med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-0: khyod gzugs dang stong pa phan tshun 'gal zlar bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por rtog na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid gzugs dang stong par gyur nas chos kyi dbyings kun tu @454b khyab pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-1: des na de'i nang nas rlung ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-9: sems can thams cad rmongs shing 'khyams nas rig pa las gzhan du gyur te yul la ltos pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-10: de yis yid nyon mongs te 'khrul pa byung ste 'jig rten gyi gzugs su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-11: nga'i rmad du byung ba'i gsal ba 'gag pa med pa dang skye ba med pas chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ltos phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-12: rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig gcig pus chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab nas gsal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-13: de'i phyir 'di'i nang nas gcig dpag tu med par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-14: dpag tu med pa yang gcig tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-15: chung ba las che ba mngon du gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-16: che ba las chung ba mngon du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-17: chos kyi dbyings las mi g-yo zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-18: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu khyab bo; ;sku la phyogs bcu'i mtha' med pa'i nam mkha' stong pa chud cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-19: skra'i rtse mo gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-20: rdul gcig gi nang du bzhugs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-21: yul 'gag nas rig pa la ltos pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:454b-22: de bzhin nyid rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig gi rang bzhin byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-0: de ltar yin pa la de bzhin @455a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-1: gshegs pa'i snying po rmad du byung ba'i gdod ma'i sems ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-7: me ma yin; mig ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-19: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-22: rig pa dang ma rig pa zad pa ma yin pa nas rga pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-24: rga shi zad pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-30: thob pa ma yin; sbyin pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-36: pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-37: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-38: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455a-39: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-0: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs @455b pa'i snying po rmad du byung ba gdod ma'i gsal rig 'di nyid sems nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-18: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid nas de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyi bar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-21: yang rig pa dang ma rig pa zad pa nas rga ba nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-23: rga shi zad pa'i bar nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-36: pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-38: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:455b-39: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rmad du byung ba gdod ma'i gsal rig nyid @456a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-2: yin pa dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-3: ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-4: yin pa nyid dang ma yin pa nyid ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-5: 'jig rten srid pa gsum du 'khyams pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang rgyal rnams rang rang gi rnam par shes pa la dpags nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i byang chub dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-7: 'jig rten gyi gtam gyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-10: pi wang rgyud bdun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-13: rgyud bzhi pa rnams dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-14: ji tsam du dbyangs snyan kyang sor mo mnyen pa ma yin na ji ltar yang 'byin mi nus pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-15: khyed cag sems can thams cad 'di nyid dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-16: rin po che lta bu yang dag pa'i sems gsal rig so sor rdzogs par khyab na yang gal te nga'i sor mos mnan pa tsam gyis rgya mtsho lta bu'i phyag rgyas 'od zer lham mer mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-17: khyod kyi sems g-yos ma thag tu dang po kho nar yul dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456a-19: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi go 'phang la nan tan du mi brtson par theg pa dman pa la mos shing 'dod nas cung zad thos pas ngoms pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-0: bdag @456b de bzhin gshegs pa'i rmad du byung ba yang dag pa'i gsal rigs dvangs pa'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar kun tu khyab pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-2: bdag gis thog ma med pa nas rtog pa'i sems kyis bzung nas 'khor bar yun ring du 'khyams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-3: da lta theg pa mchog thob kyang da dung mthar thug pa la shin tu ring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-5: 'khrul pa thams cad zad nas gcig pur rmad du byung ba yang dag pa brnyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la spro ba bskyed nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-7: sems can thams cad ci'i phyir 'khrul pas bzung nas rang gi gsal rig sgrib cing 'di ltar bying nas sdig pa myong ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-9: khyod the tshom zad kyang gtan nas ma zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-10: ngas 'jig rten du gsal ba'i don gcig bzung nas khyod la 'dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-11: khyod kyis mnyan yod kyi skye bo a'a dzny'a ta ti'i tshul ma thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:456b-12: de snga dro zhig glo bur du rang gi byad bzhin mthong bar 'dod nas me long la bltas te mthong ba na ci'i phyir ma mthong snyam du skrag cing gdung bas ma bzod nas gdon gyi 'khrul du bsam ste myos pa lta bur phyogs kun tu gtol med par rgyu ba 'di la khyod ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-0: mi 'di ci'i phyir rgyu mtshan med par myos nas gtol @457a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-3: mi 'di'i sems myos pa yin gyi rgyu mtshan gzhan gtan med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-5: gdod ma nas ldan pa'i rmad du byung ba'i gsol ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-6: mi bden zhes pa tsam du zad kyi brten pa'i rgyu mtshan ci yod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-7: gal te brten pa'i rgyu mtshan yod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-8: ji ltar mi bden zhes brjod du rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-9: sna tshogs pa'i 'khrul pa'i rtog pa gcig la gcig brten pas 'khyams pa las kyang 'khyams te rdul snyed kyi bskal pa 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-10: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas ji tsam gsal bar gsungs kyang khong du chud par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-12: 'khrul pa la brten nas byung ba yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-13: 'khrul pa'i gzhi med par shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-15: 'di la phyir zhing skye ba med pa la 'gag pa ji ltar yod ces bya; byang chub thob pa rnams gnyid sad pa'i mi rmi lam smra ba dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-16: sems ji ltar gsal yang rten 'brel gang la brten nas rmi lam nang gi dngos po len par nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457a-17: 'di gdod ma nas med pa la brten pa'i rgyu med par smos ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-0: da lta yang grong khyer de'i nang a'a dzny'a ta ti rgyu rkyen gang las rang gi mgo @457b las 'jigs nas bros pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-1: glo bur du myos pa sangs pa na mgo bo gzhan nas rnyed pa ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-2: myos pa ma sangs pa na yang dngos po dor ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-4: 'khrul ba'i rang bzhin 'di ltar na rgyu gang zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-7: sems can thams cad so sor 'byed pa rnam pa gsum pos gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dbang gis rjes su ni 'brang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-8: rnam pa gsum po'i 'brel pa dang bral bas rnam pa gsum po'i rgyu mi 'byung ba'i phyir a'a dzny'a ta ti myos pas sangs pa bzhin du khyod kyi sems kyi 'khrul pa rang gi ngang gis sangs par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-9: sangs ma thag tu byang chub mchog gi sems gsal rig nyid mngon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-10: gdod ma nas chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab bzhin par yod kyi gzhan las rnyed pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-11: 'di la ci'i phyir lus sems ngal zhing dub pa'i dka' thub [?] brten te thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-13: skye ba 'ga' zhig rang gi gos kyi nang du yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs te rang nyid kyis ma shes par gnas gzhan du slong zhing rgyu ba dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:457b-14: de ji tsam du dbul na yang nor bu de brlag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-0: glo bur du skye bo mkhas pas de'i nor bu de la bstan pa na rang nyid kyi 'dod pa tshim zhing don thams cad yid @458a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-1: bzhin du 'grub cing 'byor pa phun sum tshogs nas gdod yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzhan nas rnyed pa ma yin par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-3: de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas langs te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-5: srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang log par g-yem pa de dag gsungs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-6: rnam pa gsum po'i 'brel pa dang bral bas rnam pa gsum po'i rgyu mi 'byung ba'i phyir sems kyi a'a dzny'a ta ti myos pa'i rang bzhin rang gi ngang gis sangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-7: sangs pa na de nyid byang chub kyi go 'phang nyid yin gyi gzhan nas rnyed pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-9: shin tu gsal bar mngon du gyur pa yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i phyir rten 'brel gtan nas 'dor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-11: bdag gis thog ma nas rten 'brel gyis blo phye nas sad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458a-13: don 'di bdag cag nyan thos slob pa na tshod ma yol ba dag kho na ma yin par da lta 'dus pa 'di'i moonggal chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-0: rab 'byor la sogs pa bram ze rgan po dge sangs rgyas kyi rten 'brel thos pas sems bskyed @458b cing de nyid rtogs te zag med kyi 'bras bu thob pa ma yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-1: da lta byang chub kyi go 'bang gsungs pa la rten 'brel la mi ltos she na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-2: rgyal po'i khab kyi klu sha li la sogs pa'i skye bo dag gis smras pa'i rang byung zhes bya ba de don dam pa zhes smra rung ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-3: brtse ba chen pos bdag rmongs te 'khyams pa 'di 'byed du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-5: da lta yang grong khyer gyi a'a dznya dha ti dang myos pa'i rang bzhin gyi rten 'brel 'gag nas sangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-6: myos pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin rang gi ngang gis byung la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-7: rten 'brel dang rang byung ba'i tshul 'dar zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-9: a'adzny'a ta ti'i mgo rang la yod bzhin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-10: gzhi nas yod bzhin pa med bzhin pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-11: 'di la rten 'brel gyi rgyu ci las mgo la skrag nas myos te bros /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-12: gal te yod bzhin pa'i mgo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-13: rten 'brel gyis myos pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-14: ci'i phyir rten 'brel gyi dbang gis rang byung mi 'dor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-15: de'i mgo ma dor bzhin du rgyu mtshan med par myos nas skrag pa bskyed na yang 'pho ba dang 'gyur ba gtan nas med do; ;rten 'brel la ci ltos te rang myos pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-16: lhan skyes su myos nas skrag pa'i gnas yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:458b-17: myos pa'i sngon du myos pa de gang du sbas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-0: @459a *// mgo la ci yang ma byung ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-2: gal te tshul de rig nas myos te bros pa yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-4: rang byung ba zhes smra ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-6: de'i phyir bdag gis 'brel pa rnam gsum dang bral ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-7: byang chub kyi sems kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-8: byang chub kyi sems bskyed na skye ba dang 'gag pa'i sems 'gag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-11: skye ba dang 'gag pa kho na smras pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-12: skye ba dang 'gag pa rnam par dag na rtsol ba bya dgos pa'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-13: gal te 'di ltar rang skye ba'i gnas yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-14: rang sems bskyed nas skye ba dang 'gag pa'i sems 'gag go zhes gal rigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-15: 'di nyid skye ba dang 'gag pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-16: skye 'gag med pa nyid kyis rang byung zhes btags par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-18: 'jig rten gyi gzugs thams cad 'phrad cing ltos nas gcig tu gyur pa la 'phrad cing ltos pa ma yin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-19: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-20: rang byung ba'i rang bzhin dang rang byung ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-21: 'phrad cing ltos pa dang 'phrad cing ltos pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-22: 'phrad cing ltos pa dang rang byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad dang 'bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459a-23: 'bral ba dang 'phrad pa thams cad ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-0: tshig 'di gdod rtsed @459b mo'i tshig ma yin par chos zhes bya bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-1: byang chub myang 'das da dung thag ring ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-2: khyod gal te bskal pa mang por brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad nas mngon du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi rmad du byung ba'i lugs mi brjed par bzung nas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshad du gyur kyang rtsed mo'i tshig tsam du zad de nyid la phan par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-3: khyod rten 'brel dang rang byung ba'i tshul smras pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-4: shin tu gsal bas 'jig rten na khyod la mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog ces bsngags shing bskal pa mang por thos pa'i stobs kyis bslab cing sbyangs pa lhag par gyur na yang bu mo ma tanggi'i 'jigs pa las thar par ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis bu mo ma tanggi'i sems kyi 'dod chags kyi me skad cig la bcil nas phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras bu thob cing bdag gi bstan pa la brtson 'grus kyis nan tan mthar phyin pa grub ste 'dod chags kyi rgyun bskams nas khyod rnam par thar pa la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:459b-7: khyod bskal pa'i snyed du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zab cing phra la rmad du byung ba'i lugs bkod pa mi brjed par bzung ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-0: nyin gcig gi zag med kyi las la nan tan du byas te 'jig rten gyi chags pa dang @460a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-1: sdang pa'i sdug bsngal las ring du gyur pa la bsgrun du med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-2: da lta yang bu mo ma ta nggi thog ma nas 'dod chags can yin pa la rig sngags kyis de'i 'dod chags 'gags nas da lta bstan pa la dge slong ma rang bzhin can zhes bya bar btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-3: sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig tu skye ba snga ma'i rgyu rigs nas skye ba rnams su 'dod pa dang sred pa'i 'bras bu sdig pa'i 'bras bu myong zhes rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis zag med kyi dge ba la brtson par byas pas la la bcings la las grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-4: la la lung bstan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-5: 'di la ci'i phyir rang nyid bslus te lta ba dang nyan pa'i don la 'jog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-6: kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos ma thag tu the tshom dang rmongs pa thams cad sangs nas sems kyi yang dag pa'i rang bzhin rig ste lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa thob cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-7: sngar ma thos pa'i chos thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-8: zhes dad pa'i shugs kyis mchim byung ste yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gus pas 'dud cing thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-9: mnyam pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460a-10: rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-0: bdag cag gi sems thabs mkhas @460b kyis phyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-1: 'di lta bu rten 'brel rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas thabs mkhas kyis bstan cing bslabs nas rmongs shing bying ba'i sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las drangs shing bsgral lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-3: da lta bdag cag chos kyi dbyangs 'di dag thos ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rmad du byung ba'i sems gsal rig phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag cing rmad du byung ba rin po che'i bkod pa'i rgyal po'i zhing khams chud par shes pa na de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang mang du thos pa tsam gyis mi pha na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-4: nan tan du sgom pa la bsgrun du med ces gdams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-6: da lta bdag cag lam du 'gro ba dag la go bur du lha'i rgyal pos khang pa bzang po stsal ba ltar khang bzang rnyed na yang gdon mi za bar sgo rnyed pa na gdod 'jug tu yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-7: bdag cag don du gnyer ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas brtse ba chen po sa mi 'dor bar 'dus pa 'di'i rmongs pa'i skye bo thams cad la theg pa dman pa spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhag ma med pa'i myang 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:460b-9: rtsa ba'i sems bskyed pa'i lam stsal zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-0: yang slob pa rnams gang nas sngon gyi bag chags dang 'brel ba'i @461a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-1: sems zad cing dag nas gzungs thob ste sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mdzad du gsol zhes yan lag lngas sa la gtugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-2: 'khor 'dus pa thams cad sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi brtsa ba chen po'i bka' mnyan zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa'i nang gi byang chub kyi sems la dbang ma thob pa'i nyan thos dang rang rgyal rnams brtse bas gzigs nas slad mar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi phyir du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-4: bla na med pa'i theg pa'i brtson 'grus mchog gis bsgrub pa'i lam 'byed pa'i slad du kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-5: khyed cag snying thag pa nas sems bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog la sgyid mi lag na thog mar bskyed pa'i sems la rtsa ba'i don gnyis gsal bar mthong bar bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461a-6: rtsa ba'i don gnyis po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-0: khyed cag gal te nyan thos kyi bslab pa dor nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob par 'dod na rgyu'i dus kyi sems bskyed dang @461b 'bras bu'i dus kyi byang chub 'dra 'am mi 'dra zhib par brtag rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-2: gal te skye 'gag dang bcas pa'i sems kyis rtsa ba byas nas brtson pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skye 'gag med pa'i thag pa tshol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-5: de'i phyir khyod kyis brtag nas gsal bar bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-6: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi skye rung gi chos sna tshogs pa thams cad skye zhing 'jig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-8: khyod 'jig rten gyi skye rung gi chos rnams la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-9: de dag las gang mi 'jig pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-10: de ltar smras kyang nam mkha' stong pa zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-11: zhes sngon chad thos pa gtan nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-14: gtan nas skye rung ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-15: 'di'i phyir thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du gtan nas zhig cing zad pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-16: khyod kyi lus kyi srab ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-24: bzhi po 'dis bcings pa'i tshe khyod kyi rnam par dag pa'i sems rmad du byung ba char bgos nas mthong ba dang thos pa dang rig pa dang dpyod pa skyes nas thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du rnyog pa lnga byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:461b-30: rdul dang bye ma la sogs pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-0: de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gtan @462a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-1: nas mthun pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-2: 'ga' zhig gis sa rdul de dag blangs nas chu la btab na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-3: sa de sgrib thogs kyi rang bzhin 'dor zhing chu dvangs pa dang bral nas kha dog dang gzugs 'gyur ba la rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-4: khyed cag gi rnyog pa lnga po yang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-6: khyod nam mkha' stong pas phyogs bcur khyab pa la bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-7: stong pa'i snang ba 'byed par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-9: snang ba la shes pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-10: phan tshun 'dres nas rdzun par skyes pa 'di dang po dus kyi rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-11: khyod kyi lus da lta 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus nas lus su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-12: mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa rnams las sna tshogs kyi dbang gis khyod la bkag cing sgrib nas chu me rlung sa rnams kyis glo bur glo bur du khyod kyi shes rig de phan tshun 'dres nas rdzun par skyes pa 'di gnyis pa lta ba'i rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-13: yang khyod kyi sems kyi 'dzin pa dang shes pa dang smra ba dang slob pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-14: shes rig gi rang bzhin las byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-16: yul rnam pa drug lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-17: yul dang bral na gzugs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-18: tshor ba dang bral na rang bzhin med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-19: phan tshun 'dres nas rdzun par skyes pa 'di gsum pa nyon mongs kyi rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462a-20: yang khyod kyi snga dro phyi dro skye 'gag rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-0: 'jig rten du @462b bzhag ces smra ba la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-1: las kyi dbang gis rgyun du de dang de dag tu rim gyis 'pho bzhin du phan tshun du 'dres nas rdzun par skyes pa 'di bzhi ba sems can gyi rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-2: khyed cag gi mthong ba dang thos pa dag gdod ma nas rang bzhin med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-3: yul thams cad la sgrib cing brgal nas rgyu med par tha dad du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-4: rang bzhin gyi nang du phan tshun du shes la longs spyod pa'i tshe phan tshun du 'gal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-5: 'dra ba dang 'dra ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid mtshang zhing phan tshun 'dres nas rdzun par skyes pa 'di lnga pa tshe'i rnyog pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-7: khyod da lta mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang rig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag dang gtsang pa zhes bya ba'i don dang legs par bstun no zha na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-9: thog mar 'chi ba dang skye ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu phye nas skye 'gag med pa'i yongs grub dag cing dvangs la g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin la brten nas dag cing dvangs pas rdzun pa'i skye 'gag de bzlog par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:462b-10: gdod ma'i rig pa bzlog nas gdod ma'i gsal rig skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin thob pas rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi sems su gyur nas 'bras bu'i mthar thug par sbyong zhing mngon du byas nas yongs su sgrubs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-0: chu'i rnyog pa sel ba bzhin du snod gtsang mar bzhag nas zab cing dvangs pa mi g-yo ba'i phyir sa rdul rnams rang bzhin gyi 'og tu bying @463a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-1: zhing chu dvangs pa mig sngar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-2: 'di la yul gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa thog mar mgo non pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-3: 'dam de bsal nas chu tsam du gyur pa na 'di la rtsa ba'i ma rig pa gtan nas rgyun chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-5: gsal ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur zhing skyes pa la nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa zhes mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-6: thams cad myang 'das kyi dvangs shing gsal ba rmad du byung ba'i yon tan dang mthun par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-8: khyed cag gdon mi za bar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang sems kyi theg pa la spro zhing brtan pas rol te bden pa'i dngos po can gyi gzugs rnam par spong ngo zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-9: nyon mongs pa'i rnam rtog gi rtsa ba zhib tu brtag par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-10: 'dir thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du las 'phel nas rim gyis 'di lta bur gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-13: khyod byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-14: gal te nyon mongs pa'i rnam rtog gi rtsa ba zhib tu ma dpyad na rdzun pa 'khrul pa'i dbang po dang yul gang du phyin ci log tu gyur pa shes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-15: gnas mi shes pa la ji ltar na zad cing dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-17: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi 'ching ba 'grol ba'i skye bo la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463a-18: bcing ba mi mthong na 'grol ba ji ltar shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-0: khyod @463b kyis stong pa la gsil zhing bshig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-1: zhes pa gtan nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-4: kha dog dang gzugs ma yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-5: 'ching ba dang dgrol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-6: da lta khyod kyi mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-11: yid de rkun po drug gis sna drangs te khyim gyi nor 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-12: de'i phyir thog ma med pa nas sems can thams cad 'jig rten du bcings pas snod kyi 'jig rten las ji ltar yang thar par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-14: ci'i phyir sems can thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams zhes brjod ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-18: 'khor zhing mi gnas pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-21: khyod kyis da lta shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-38: dus kyis phye na gsum mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-39: gang zhig sems can thams cad rdzun pas bslus nas gzugs grub ste de las rim par 'khor nas dus nam yang 'dzad pa'i mtha' med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-40: khams 'di'i rang bzhin phyogs bcu yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:463b-42: gsal bar byed na nus mod kyang 'jig rten gyi shar nub lho byang tsam ngos zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-2: dbus na gnas pa'i yul med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-3: bzhi po 'di'i grangs cis kyang mi 'chug pa'i phyir 'dis 'jig rten dang sbyar na gsum tshan bzhi ru byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-4: bzhi tshan gsum du byas pa na yang bcu gnyis las mi 'da'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-5: yang rgyas par bsgyur nas rnam grangs gsum bsnan te gcig bcu brgya stong gi bar thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du mdor bsdus nas dbang po drug gi nang du ngo skal gyi longs spyod pa po dang spyad bya stong nyis brgya re yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-7: khyod kyis 'di'i yul mang nyung phye nas zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-8: da lta yang mig gis blta ba dang gtad pa na rgyab kyi yul mi mthong zhing mdun gyi yul mthong ba'i phyir mdun gyi yul sna tshogs thams cad mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-9: rgyab kyi yul sna tshogs gtan nas mi mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-10: g-yas g-yon gyi yul la cha gsum gnyis tsam mthong ba der sleb tu rung ba'i longs spyod pa po dang spyad bya thams cad 'dril na mi ldang ba'i phyir cha gsum longs spyod kyi cha gcig longs mi spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-11: de'i phyir mig gcig pu la longs spyod pa po dang longs spyad bya brgyad brgya yod ces bya bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-12: rna bas khyab par mnyan pa na phyogs bcu'i sgra thos par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-13: ring ba dang nye bar grags pa dag thos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464a-14: wal ler gnas na mtha' dang mu med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-0: de'i phyir rna ba'i dbang po la longs spyod pa po dang @464b longs spyad bya stong phrag gcig dang nyis brgya tshang bar shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-1: snas dri snom pa na dbugs 'byung rdub kyis tshor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-2: dbugs 'byung rngub gnyis kyi bar du gzhan med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-3: sna'i dbang po nges par na bya ba'i cha gsum las gcig gis dman pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-4: de'i phyir sna'i dbang po nyid la longs spyad bya dang spyod byed brgyad brgya yod ces shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-5: lces smra ba'i tshe 'khor ba dang myang 'das kyi tshul rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis thams cad smra bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-6: smra ba la tshad yod kyi gnas lugs la tshad med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-7: de'i phyir lce'i dbang po nyid la longs spyad bya dang spyod byed stong nyis brgya yod ces shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-8: lus kyis reg bya tshor ba'i tshe reg bya yid du 'ong mi 'ong shes par nus shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-9: 'phrad pa'i tshe shes par nus la bral ba'i tshe shes par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-10: bral ba na gcig pu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-11: phrad pa na zung du 'gyur ba'i phyir lus kyi dbang po nges par na bya ba'i cha gsum las gcig gis dman pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-12: de'i phyir lus nyid la longs spyad bu dang spyod byed brgyad brgya yod ces shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:464b-13: sems nang du gnas pa'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dang so so skye bo dang 'phags pa sogs ma lus pa der chud cing sems kyis de dag thams cad la khyab par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-1: yid kyi dbang po nyid la longs spyad bya spyod byed stong nyis brgya tshang bar shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-3: khyod da lta skye 'chi dang 'dod pa'i rgyun las phyir phyogs te rgyun de lugs ldog tu 'gags nas skye 'gag med pa'i gnas su phyin par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-4: dbang po drug po 'di dag gi longs spyod gang mthun la gang mi mthun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-5: gang zab la gang mi zab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-6: gang rang byung la gang rang byung ma yin pa'i tshul dpyad cing nges par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-7: gal te 'di dag las rang byung gi ye shes kyi rtsa ba rtogs nas thog ma med pa'i 'khrul snang gi las kyi rgyu ba bzlog nas rang byung gi ye shes kyis 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-8: rang byung gi ye shes ma yin pas 'gro ba la zhag dang bskal pa'i khyad par yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-9: ngas da lta dbang po drug gi gsal zhing dvangs pa'i rtsa ba longs spyod byed dang spyad bya'i tshad dang grangs tshang zhing rgyas par gsungs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-11: khyod rang nyid kyi 'dod pas gang nas 'jug pa'i sgo tshol cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-12: ngas gsal bar bshad de khyod mngon par gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-13: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang khams bco brgyad las gang yang rung ba gcig gi steng nas sbyangs te thams cad mtshungs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465a-14: de dag la dman mchog med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-0: khyod nyid blo dman pas @465b de'i nang gi rang byung gi ye shes la dbang thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ngas khyod la gsal bar bshad nas khyod zab mo'i lam gcig pur btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-1: mi bslu ba'i gnas gcig tu zhugs na; dbang po drug gi shes pa de dag skad cig la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-2: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-5: rgyun las ldog pa'i lam zab mo gcig pur zhugs na de ma thag tu dbang po drug rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-7: khyod da lta rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas khams gsum gyi mthong spang rtog pa zad kyang dbang po la gnas pa'i thog ma med pa'i 'khrul pa'i bag chags ma rtogs pas bag chags de sbyangs pas gdod 'gag par 'gyur ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-8: de'i nang du skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gyur ba dang 'gag pa'i cha dang grangs dag yod pa la lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-10: dbang po drug bo gcig yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-14: rna bas ci'i phyir mi mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-15: mig gis ci'i phyir mi thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-17: rkang pas ci'i phyir mi smra; gal te dbang po drug tha dang pa drug yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-18: da lta yang 'dus pa 'di'i nang du ngas khyod la chos zab mo gsal bar bshad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:465b-19: khyod kyi dbang po drug bo gang gis len par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-1: bdag gis rna bas thos par byed lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-3: khyod kyi rna bas thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-4: lus dang kha la ltos ci dgos kyang khas don 'dri zhing lus kyis gus pas len par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-5: de'i phyir 'di la gcig nyid ma yin gyi drug la ltos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-6: drug ma yin gyi gcig nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-7: mthar thug ni; khyod kyi dbang po dag gcig dang drug ma yin par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-9: dbang po de dag gcig ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-11: thog ma med pa nas log par 'khyams shing rmongs pas rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las gcig dang drug ces pa'i don 'di khyod kyis shes par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-12: khyod rgyun zhugs yin pa'i phyir drug po 'di zad na yang gcig nyid ma spangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-13: da ltar yang nam mkha' stong pa dang snod kyi dngos po 'dres pas snod kyi gzugs tha dad pa'i dbang gis stong pa yang tha dad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-14: snod kyi dngos po bsal nas stong pa la ba ltas na stong pa gcig nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-15: nam mkha' stong pa khyod kyi rang dbang du tha dad dang tha mi dad du 'byed par mi nus pa la yang gcig gam gcig ma yin pa zhes brjod du med pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466a-16: khyod kyi longs spyod byed dbang po drug gsal bar shes pa yang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-0: snang ba dang mun pa gnyis kyi gzugs phan tshun du rnam pa gsal ba las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin @466b der dvangs rkyen las mthong ba gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-1: mthong ba'i rang bzhin gzugs la gtad pa las gzugs mthong zhing dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-2: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi la brten nas mig gi dngos po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-3: rgun 'brum lta bu dbang yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis gzugs la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-4: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba rnam pa gnyis phan tshun du 'phrad pa las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin der dvangs rkyen las thos pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-5: thos pa'i rang bzhin sgra la gtad pa las dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-6: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi la brten nas rna ba'i dngos po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-7: lo ma gsar pa 'khril ba lta bu dbang po yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis sgra la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-8: 'byed pa dang 'gag pa rnam pa gnyis phan tshun du 'phrad pa las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin der dvangs rkyen las snom pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-9: snom pa'i rang bzhin dri la gtad pa las dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-10: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi la brten nas sna'i dngos po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:466b-11: sder mo gnyis thur du gshibs pa lta bu dbang po yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis dri la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-0: ro mi bro ba dang ro bro ba rnam pa gnyis phan tshun du 'phrad pa las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin der dvangs rkyen las ro bro ba gsal @467a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-2: ro bro ba'i rang bzhin ro la gtad pa las dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-3: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi la brten nas lce'i dngos po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-4: zla ba phyed pa lta bu dbang po yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis ro la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-5: reg pa dang 'bral ba rnam pa gnyis phan tshun du 'phrad pa las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin der dvangs rkyen las reg pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-6: reg pa'i rang bzhin reg bya la gtad pa las dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-7: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi la brten nas lus kyi dngos po zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-8: zom rnga lta bu dbang po yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis reg bya la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-9: skye ba dang 'gag pa rnam pa gnyis phan tshun du bstud pa las rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin der dvangs rkyen las yid gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-10: yid kyi rang bzhin chos la gtad pa las chos nye bar bsdus nas dbang por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-11: dbang po'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 'byung pa chen po bzhi la brten nas sems pa'i yid ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467a-12: khyim dben pa'i nang du bltas pa lta bu dbang po yul gzhan bzhi'i dbang gis chos la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-0: dbang bo drug po 'di gsal zhing rig pa ma rig pas bslad pa las gsal ba'i rang bzhin sgrib ste yul @467b rdzun pa la phyogs pa las spros pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-1: de'i phyir de lta khyod snang mun dang bral na mthong ba'i dngos po med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-2: g-yo mi g-yo dang bral na thos pa'i dngos po med par 'gyur 'byed 'gag dang bral na snom pa'i dngos po med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-3: ro bro mi bro med na myong ba'i dngos po med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-4: 'bral reg med na reg pa'i dngos po med par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-5: skye 'gag med na 'du shes pa gang la brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-11: snang mun la sogs pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi dngos po'i gzugs kyi dbang du mi gtong bar dbang po gang yang rung ba gcig gsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-12: 'khrul ba'i snang ba dang bral nas ma rig pa bcom /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-13: de ma thag tu slar yang gdod ma'i sems gsal rig gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-14: gsal rig gi rang bzhin gsal bas yul lnga'i bag chags dag pa'i mthus dri ma thams cad dag nas mdun gyi yul lam ltos par shes pa mthong ba 'byung bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-15: 'di la gsal rig dbang po'i dbang gis mi 'gro yang dbang po'i rkyen gyis gsal rig mngon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-16: 'di nas dbang po drug yul phan tshun la dbye ba med par longs spyod par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-19: da lta 'dus pa 'di'i nang du ma 'gag pa mig med kyang gzugs mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:467b-20: klu'i rgyal po nye dga' rna ba med kyang sgra thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-0: @468a *// gangg'a'i lha mo sna med kyang dri tshor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-1: ba glang bdag lce rnam pa gzhan du yod kyang ro myong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-2: lha sh'u n+ya ta lus med kyang reg bya tshor zhing sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur te skad cig la mthong bar 'gyur yang rlung dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'od dang bral ma thag lus med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-3: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang zhi ba la gnas pa'i nyan thos rnams las 'dus pa 'di'i nang du 'od srung chen po lta bu yid kyi dbang po 'gags nas yun ring du lon yang gsal rig gis gsal bar shes pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-4: rtog cing sems pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-6: da lta khyod gal te dbang po thams cad bsal na nang gi gsal rig mngon du 'gyur te phyi'i yul dang snod kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs pa 'di dag 'gyur ba dang skye ba'i gzugs chu khol mos 'khyags pa bzhu ba ltar sems kyi skad cig la gnas gyur te bla na med pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-8: da lta yang 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag blta bya mig gis mthong la gal te myur du btsums na mun pa'i gzugs mdun du mngon par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468a-9: dbang po drug po mi gsal zhing mun par 'gyur la mgo nas rkang pa'i bar yang 'di nyid dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-0: des skye bo 'ga' zhi ga la lags pas phyi nas nyug na ji ltar mi mthong yang mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du rnam par rig pa tsam @468b du 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-1: mthong ba snang ba las byung ba yin na mun pa la mi mthong bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-2: snang ba la mi brten par rang byung ba yin na mun pas gzugs sna tshogs la ring du sgrib par mi nus pa'i phyir dbang po dang yul dag pas gsal rig ji ltar rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-3: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-4: bcom ldan 'das; da lta yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar thog ma'i rnam par rig pa'i sems kyi rgyun tshol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-5: 'bras bu'i sa dang ming dang grangs mthun pa zhig 'byung rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-7: 'bras bu'i sa la byang chub dang myang 'das dang de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang dri ma med pa'i shes pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stong pa nyid dang me long lta bu'i ye shes te rnam pa 'di bdun gyi ming tha dad kyang rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa rang bzhin gyis gtan du gnas pa rin po che rdo rje rgyal po ltar sra zhing brtan la gzhom du med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-8: gal te 'di'i mthong ba dang snang ba dang mun pa dang g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba dang thogs pa dang thogs pa med pa dang bral na gtan nas rang bzhin med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:468b-11: mdun gyi yul dang bral na ci yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-0: ji ltar na gtan nas chad pa dang 'gag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu nyams su blangs nas de bzhin @469a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-1: gshegs pa'i rtag brtan gyi 'bras bu bdun 'thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-3: gal te snang ba dang mun pa dang bral na mthong ba gtan nas med par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-4: mdun gyi yul med na dran rtog gi rang bzhin rang gi ngang gis 'gag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-5: snga phyi phan tshun du zhib tu brtag cing btsal na gdod ma nas bdag gi sems dang sems las byung ba yang med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-6: 'di la gang gis rgyu byas nas bla na med pa'i rig pa tshol bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas zab cing phra la rdzogs shing dvangs pa brtan pa zhes bka' stsal na; tshig 'di las brgal nas 'das na rtsed mo'i tshig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-8: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la yang dag pa zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-9: brtse ba chen pos bdag gi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal du gsol zhes gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-11: khyod mang du thos pa la bslab kyang zag pa thams cad ma bsal zhing sems kyis phyin ci log gi rgyu shes pa yin pa la phyin ci log mngon sum du yod pa gtan nas ngo ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-12: khyod nyid kyis zhe thag pa nas bden pa'i don du yid ches sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469a-13: ji ltar ngas da lta 'jig rten pa'i don phal pa la brten nas khyod kyi the tshom bsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-0: zhes bka' stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pas sgra gcan 'dzin la gandi lan gcig brdung du @469b bcug nas kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-1: khyod kyis da lta thos sam ma thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-2: kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis bdag cag thams cad kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-3: zhes gsol to; ;gandi'i sgra yal ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-4: da lta thos sam ma thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-5: kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis ma thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-7: de'i tshe sgra gcan 'dzin gyis slar yang gcig brdung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-9: khyed cag gis da lta thos sam ma thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-10: kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-13: khyed cag gis ji ltar thos la ji ltar ma thos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-14: kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-15: gandi'i sgra grags pa na thos la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-16: brdungs nas ring zhig nas sgra yal ba na gtan nas ma thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas yang sgra gcan 'dzin la bka' stsal te gandi brdung du bcug nas kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-19: khyod kyis sgra yod ces smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-21: kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis sgra yod ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-22: yud tsam song nas sgra yal ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:469b-23: khyed cag da lta sgra yod ces smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-1: bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pas sgra med ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-2: cung zad song nas sgra gcan 'dzin gyis yang gandi brdung ba na bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-3: khyed cag da lta sgra yod ces smra'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-5: kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis sgra yod ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-6: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-7: khyod ci'i phyir sgra yod ces smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-8: ci'i phyir sgra med ces smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-9: kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa; gandi'i sgra grags pa na sgra yod ces smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-10: brdungs te ring zhig song nas sgra yal ba na sgra med ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-13: khyed cag da lta ci'i phyir rang tshig gis rang nyid 'khrul par byed cing smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-15: kun dga' bo la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-16: da lta ci'i phyir bdag cag tshig 'khrul par smra zhes bka' stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-18: ngas khyed cag la thos sam zhes dris pa la khyed cag thams cad thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470a-20: yang khyed cag la sgra yod dam zhes dris pa la khyed cag thams cad sgra yod ces smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-0: thos so @470b sgra yod ces pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-1: lan gsol ba la nges pa ma mchis par snang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-2: 'di ltar yin bzhin du ci'i phyir rang tshig ma 'khrul zhes smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-4: sgra yal zhing med pa na khyed cag mi thos zhes smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-5: gal te nges par mi thos na thos pas rang bzhin 'gag ma thag tu shing skam dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-6: slar yang gandi'i sgra grags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-7: khyed cag gis ji ltar shes; yod par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-8: med par shes pa yul sgra nyid las yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-9: glo bur du med par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-10: glo bur du yod par gyur pa thos pa'i rang bzhin de ci'i phyir khyed cag gis yod ces pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-13: med pa shes pa po su zhig yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-15: sgra de thos pa nyid las byung ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-16: rang nyid skyes pa dang 'gag pa yod par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-17: khyed cag gis thos pa'i phyir gdod sgra skyes pa dang 'gag par gyur nas khyed cag gi thos pa'i rang bzhin yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-18: med pa la thug pa ni; ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-19: khyod phyir zhing phyin ci log gi blos sgra la rmongs nas thos btsam zhig gi mtshan mar bzung nas 'khor zhing 'khyams te rtag pa la chad par 'dzin pa la smad pa'i gnas ci yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:470b-20: ji ltar yang g-yo mi g-yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-0: 'byed pa dang stong pa sogs thams cad dang bral nas thos pa la rang bzhin med ces smra bar mi @471a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-3: mi gnyid 'thug po can dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-4: khri'i steng du gnyid kyis log pa la khyim der skye bo 'ga' zhig gis sprugs pa dang 'bru gtun tu brdung ba na mi de'i rmi lam du sprug pa dang brdung ba'i sgra thos nas gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'ong ste rnga brdung ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-5: 'on te gandi brdung ngam snyam nas rmi lam la gandi las shing dang rdo ltar sgra grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-6: zhes glo bur du yar nas sad pa'i tshe brdung ba'i sgra yin par nges nas nang mi la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-7: nga gnyid log pa'i skabs sgra 'di rnga'i sgra snyam du 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-9: mi 'di'i rmi lam gal te g-yo mi g-yo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-11: thogs bcas thogs med bsam pa'i gnas yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-12: de ji ltar gnyid log kyang thos pa'i rang bzhin nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-13: khyod shi nas srog 'gag na yang rang bzhin 'di ci'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig zhig nas 'gag par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-14: sems can thams cad thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du gzugs sgra dang ma bral bar rtog pa thams cad 'khor mar brgyud nas so sor 'byed par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471a-15: rang bzhin rnam dag rmad du byung ba gtan du gnas pa la rtag pa'i gnas kyi rjes su mi 'brang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-0: skye 'gag gi dbang gis rjes su 'brang bzhin pa'i phyir de las rim pa rim par bgos pa'i bag chags kyis 'gyur @471b nas 'khor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-1: gal te skye 'gag spangs nas rtag tu bden pa nyid la gzhol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-2: gsal rig mngon sum du gyur te dbang po'i yul can gyi shes rig yud tsam zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-3: 'du shes kyi gzugs la yul zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-4: rnam par shes pa'i ma rig pa la dri ma zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-5: 'di gnyis dang rab tu bral na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-6: de ma thag tu khyod kyi chos kyi mi rdul dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-7: 'di la bla na med pa'i gsal rig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'grub pa'i tshul yod dam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang bsgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-10: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-11: bam po lnga ba; kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas don de nyid ji ltar bshad kyang da lta 'jig rten pa dag mdud pa 'grol ba la bltas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-14: gal te des mdud pa de thog mar ji ltar mdud pa'i tshul ma shes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-15: mi des ji ltar byas kyang 'grol mi nus snyam du bdag sems lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-16: bcom ldan 'das bdag dang 'khor 'dus pa'i nyan thos slob pa dag kyang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:471b-17: thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du kun tu rmongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig skye zhing 'gag bzhin pa yin pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-0: @472a *// 'di lta bu'i mang du thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa na rab tu byung ba zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-1: nyin res bar du chod pa'i rims ldang dub pa'i nad kyis btab pa dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-2: snying rje chen pos bdag cag 'dam du bying ba rnams la thugs rjes gzigs nas da lta bdag cag gi lus sems gnyis ji ltar bcings pa dang gang nas bkrol ba bstan nas slad ma'i sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor bar 'khor ba las grol te srid pa gsum du mi ltung bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-3: dge 'dun 'dus pa thams cad yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te mig nas mchi ma 'khrug bzhin du snying nas gus pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i legs par bshad pa nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-4: de'i che bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang 'khor 'dus pa'i slob pa rnams la brtse bas bskyangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-5: yang slad ma'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i rgyu dang phyi rabs kyi mig tu bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-6: zhes dzambu chu bo'i gser lta bu'i phyag gis kun dga' bo'i mgo la byug pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472a-7: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams drug tu 'ur zhing g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-0: rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang rang gi gtsug tor gyi nor bu las 'od @472b zer 'phros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-1: 'od zer de dag dus gcig tu 'jig rten so so nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor la thim pas 'khor 'dus pa de dag sngar ma mthong ba'i ngo mtshar ba gsar du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-2: de nas kun dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-3: 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thos par phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbyangs gcig gis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-6: kun tu rmongs pa dang lhan cig tu skye bzhin par skye zhing 'gag pa'i 'khor bar 'khor ba'i 'ching ba'i rtsa ba shes par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-7: khyod kyi dbang po drug nyid las dngos po gzhan gtan nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-8: yang khyed bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyis myur du zhi bde'i rnam par grol ba la bkod nas mi 'gyur ba'i zhi ba dam pa rtag pa'i tshul shes par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-9: yang khyod kyi dbang po drug po nyid yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-10: dngos po gzhan gtan ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-11: zhes bka' stsal to; ;kun dga' bos ji ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di lta bu thos kyang gsal bar khong du ma chud pas phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-12: bdag skye 'gag gi 'khor bar 'khor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-13: rmad du byung ba'i zhi ba dang bde ba rtag pa'i gnas thob par byed pa'i rgyu dbang po drug kho na yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:472b-14: dngos po gzhan gtan ma yin zhes bka' stsal pa ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-0: @473a *// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-1: dbang po dang yul rtsa ba gcig cing 'ching ba dang grol ba gnyis tha dad pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-2: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rdzun pa nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-4: yul las 'du shes 'byung zhing dbang po'i rkyen gyis rnam pa skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-5: gzugs dang mthong ba la rang bzhin med cing phan tshun brten nas skyes pa 'dam bu'i khyim bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-6: 'di'i slad du khyod kyis da lta shes mthong la 'du shes na ma rig pa'i rtsa bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-7: shas mthong la mthong ba med nas de nyid myang 'das zag pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i gtsang bar 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-8: de'i 'di'i nang du dngos po ji ltar chud par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis slar yang don 'di gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-10: dam pa'i don du ngo bos stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-11: brten nas 'byung phyir sgyu ma bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-12: dngos po med phyir skye 'gag bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-13: bde na med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-14: rdzun pa smra bas bden pa gsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-15: bden dang rdzun pa gnyis ka rdzun //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-16: bden pa ma yin bden med min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-17: ji ltar shes dang shes byar brjod de dag par na'ang bden med phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-18: phan tshun brten pa'i 'dam bu bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-19: bcings dang 'grol ba rgyu gcig nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473a-20: skye 'phags so sor lam yod min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-0: khyod kyis ltos 'brel @473b rang bzhin soms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-1: rang bzhin stong dang mi stong min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-2: rmongs shing bsgribs pa ma rig ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-3: de nyid sangs ma thag tu grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-4: 'ching ba rim gyis grol ba yis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-5: drug po grol bas gcig kyang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-6: dbang po btsal bas mngon shes 'grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-7: nang don la zhugs rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-8: kun gzhi'i rnam shes zab cing phra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-9: sa bon chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-10: bden rdzun log par rtog 'gyur zhes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-11: rtag tu ngas ni ma bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-12: sems kyis sems nyid rtogs pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-13: sgyu ma min yang sgyu ma'i chos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-14: ma rtogs sgyu ma yang ni med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-15: sgyu ma min yang mi skye na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-16: sgyu ma'i chos rnams ga la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-17: 'di ming pad dkar dam pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-18: rdo rje rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-19: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-20: yud kyis mi slob lam las 'da'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-21: 'di nyid dam chos mngon pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-22: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-23: lam gcig mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-24: de nas kun dga' bo dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i brtse bas rjes su bstan pa slar yang tshigs su bcad pa sdeb legs shing snyan la don gsal ba thos pas blo gros kyi mig gsal par phye ste sngar ma thos pa'i don thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-25: zhes ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:473b-26: kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-1: lta sangs rgyas kyi 'gog pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i mthus rang bzhin rnam par dag cing rmad du byung ba rtag cing bden pa'i don can gyi chos kyi tshig thos kyang mdud pa drug po grol bas gcig kyang med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-2: slar yang 'grol ba dang mdud pa'i rim pa dag gi don da dung blor ma chud lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-3: brtse ba chen pos rjes su bskyangs te 'khor 'dus pa 'di dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-4: yang phyi ma'i dus kyi skye bo rnams la dgongs te chos kyi dbyangs kyis bdag cag gi dri ma 'khrud par mdzad du gsol; de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas sengge'i khri la na bza'i chos gos bla 'og rnams legs par bcos shing bsdus te sku la nye bar bcar ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu la phyag brkyang nas 'thab bral gyi lhas phul ba'i dar blangs te 'khor 'dus pa'i mig sngar mdud pa gcig por nas kun dga' bo la bstan te bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-5: 'di'i ming ci; kun dga' ba dang bcas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-6: 'di la mdud pa zhes bya lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i der slar yang mdud nas kun dga' bo la 'dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474a-9: kun dga' bo dang bcas 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-0: 'di la @474b mdud pa nyid ces bya lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-1: 'di bzhin du rim pas lha'i dar lan drug gi bar du mdud nas mdud pa rnams phyag tu bsnams te kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-2: 'di dag gi ming ci; kun dga' bo dang bcas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis sngar ltar 'di dag mdud pa nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-3: zhes lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-5: ngas thog mar lha'i dar la mdud pa bor bar khyed cag gis mdud pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-7: lha'i dar 'di thog par gcig yin pa la gnyis pa dang gsum pa la khyed cag ci'i phyir yang mdud pa zhes brjod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-8: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-10: rin po che lha'i dar 'di snal ma 'thag nas bsgrub pa na thog mar dngos po gcig yin kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mdud pa gcig bor na gcig ces bya la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-11: gal te mdud pa brgya bor na yang mthar brgya nyid do snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-12: yang 'dir mdud pa drug por ba mthar bdun du mi longs lngar mi gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pas ci'i phyir thog ma'i mdud pa gcig pa btsi la mdud pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa mi brtsi lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:474b-14: lha'i dar 'di don du gcig nyid yin par khyod kyis shes pa de bzhin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-0: @475a *// ngas mdud pa drug por bas drug ces bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-1: khyod kyis zhib tu dpyod la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-2: lha 'ki dar dngos po gcig nyid la mdud pa'i dbang gis du mar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-4: thog mar bor ba'i mdud pa la dang po zhes bya la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-5: de zhin du mdud pa drug gi bar du yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-6: ngas da lta mdud pa drug pa la dang po zhes brjod na rung ngam zhes bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-9: gal te drug pa yod bzhin du drug pa 'di la dang po zhes brjod mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-10: bdag tshe rabs mang bor blo bros kyi mthus ji ltar dpyad kyang mdud pa drug po 'di'i ming gzhan du byed par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-13: mdud pa drug po 'dra ba min zhing rtsa ba'i rgyu la legs par brtags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-14: lha'i dar gcig la mdud pa drug bor ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-15: phan tshun 'chol na gtan du mi rung ba'i phyir khyod kyi dbang po drug kyang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-16: gcig nyid las nges par du mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475a-18: khyod mdud pa drug mi 'dod cing mdud pa gcig bya bar 'dod na ji ltar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-0: gal te mdud pa drug yod na yon min gyi rtsod pa ldang la de las @475b mdud pa 'di mdud pa de ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-1: mdud pa de mdud pa 'di ma yin zhes smra pa dag 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas de ring mdud pa thams cad bkrol nas med par gyur pa na 'di dang de zhes byar med pa'i phyir gcig ces kyang bya bar mi rigs pa la ji ltar na drug tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-4: drug bkrol ba na gcig kyang med ces pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-6: khyod kyi thog ma med pa nas sems kyi rang bzhin rlom zhing g-yengs pas 'du shes dang mthong ba rdzun pa skye zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-7: skyes nas mi 'gyur par nyon mongs te yul mngon du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-9: mig 'bras ngal gyi bar du gtad nas bltas na gsal rig las rgyu med par ra ri 'byung ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad dang ri klung sa gzhi dang skye 'chi dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyang rlom zhing nyon mo nges te phyin ci log gi rnam pa skye ba las gzhan med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-11: nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul pa'i 'di mdud pa dang 'dra ba lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-12: 'di ji ltar 'grol zhing sel bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gis lha'i dar de de nas g-yon phyogs su drangs nas kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:475b-14: 'di 'grol ba yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-1: so; ;yang phyogs gis g-yas su drangs nas slar yang kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-2: 'di grol ba yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-7: ngas da lta phyag gis g-yas g-yon du drangs kyang ma grol na; khyod kyis thabs gang gis 'grol bar nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-8: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-10: mdud pa'i dkyil nas dkrol nas de ma thag tu grol nas so sor phyed par 'gyur lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-14: gal te bkrol nas sems bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-15: mdud pa'i dkyil nas rtsom par rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-17: ngas sangs rgyas kyi chos rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ba yin zhes gsungs pa ni /
