K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-18: 'jig rten gyi 'phrad pa dang ltos pa'i gzugs rags pa bstan pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gsal bar phye nas de brten pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu gang dang rjes su 'phrel nas ji ltar 'byung ba'i tshul thams cad kyis byung ba shes zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-0: de bzhin du gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pha @476b rol la thug gi bar du char gyi thigs pa gcig tshun chad kyi grangs kyang shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-1: da lta 'dir thang shing drang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-2: shing tshe ma can 'khyog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-4: bya rog nag pra la sogs pa'i dngos po sna tshogs pa'i thog ma'i rgyu thams cad kyang shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-6: khyod kyis dbang po drug las gang 'dod pa zhig bzung la ltos shig gal te dbang po'i mdud pa bsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-7: yul dang gzugs rang nyid 'gags nas rdzun pa thams cad nub cing bzhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bden pa mi rnyed pa'i tshul yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-9: ngas da lta khyod la dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-10: 'thab bral gyi lha'i dar 'di la de lta mdud pa drug bor dus gcig la thams cad 'grol bar byed snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-11: de ltar nus sam zhes bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-15: mdud pa 'di rnams thog mar rim gyis mdud pa'i phyir da lta'ang rim gyis bkrol bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-16: mdud pa'i 'di drug gzugs 'dra yang mnyam du mdud pa yin pa'i phyir mdud pa'i 'grol ba na ji ltar gcig car 'grol bar nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:476b-18: dbang po drug grol zhing sel ba yang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-0: dbang po 'di grol ma thag tu thog mar gang zag gi stong pa nyid rnyed cing stong pa'i rang bzhin @477a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-1: kun nas gsal bar 'gyur ba chos las rnam par grol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-2: chos las rnam par grol bas stong pa nyid gnyis su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i skye ba med pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-5: de ltar kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gsal rig mngon par rdzogs par phye nas bstan pa'i bka' drin gyis the tshom dang rmongs pa sangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-6: de 'tshe thal mo sbyar zhing zhabs la phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-7: da lta bdag cag gi lus sems rnyog pa med cing tshad med pa'i dga' ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-8: mdud pa drug grol bas gcig kyang med par 'gyur ba'i don ji tsam du rtogs lags kyang mngon par byang chub pa'i rtsa ba ma shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-10: bdag cag lta bu'i skye bo rab tu 'khyams nas bskal pa ji snyed kyi bar du dpung gnyen med par dva phrug lta bur gyur nas ji zhig ltar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyed dur gyur lags shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-11: 'di nyid mas bor ba'i byis pa chung du brtse ldan gyi ma nyid dang 'phrad pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477a-12: yang 'dus pa 'di dang 'phrad nas la mthob par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-0: ji ltar thos pa'i gsang ba'i gdams ngag gi @477b don 'di yang thog ma nyid nas rang la yod pa rtogs par gyur pa lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-1: gzhan du na rtsa ba nas ma thos pa dang khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-2: snying rje chen pos nye bar dgongs te bdag la rmad du byung ba'i zab mo bstan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsal ba mthar thug pa gsal zhing rgyas la rdzogs par bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsol nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal te phyir rang gnas su 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-3: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-4: zag pa thams cad dang bral ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-5: khyed cag lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-6: dgra bcom pa rnams pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas mi slob par gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-7: ngas da lta khyed cag la dri bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-8: dang por sems bskyed nas khams bco brgyad las gang zhig rtogs nas mngon par byang chub pas yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-9: thabs la mkhas pa gang gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:477b-10: koo di n+ya la sogs pa'i lnga sde stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ri dvags kyi nags dang bya ga la dan ka'i tshal na zhugs pa'i tshe thog mar bdud rtsi brnyes pa mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i @478a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-1: gsung dbyangs la brten nas bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs shing de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong rnams la dris pa na bdag gis thog mar rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la kun shes zhes bya bar ming du stsal zhing bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-4: dbyangs rmad du byung ba zab mo dang ldan pa'i phyir bdag gsung dbyangs la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-6: bdag ltar na gsung dbyangs mchog las byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-7: nye sde stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-8: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thog mar bdud rtsi brnyes pa mthong zhing mi sdug pa'i gzugs la yid byung nas gzugs kyi rang bzhin rtog ste mi gtsang ba nas keng rus dang rdul gyi bar du brtags nas stong par gyur pa'i rjes su stong pa dang gzugs kyi dmigs pa dag nas mi slob pa'i go 'phang thob pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-9: nye sde zhes bya bar ming du stsal zhing bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478a-10: yul gzugs kyi dmigs pa dag nas rmad du byung ba'i gzugs kyi gsang ba zab mo rdzogs pas gzugs kyi rnam pa la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon @478b bar byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-1: bdag ltar na gzugs las byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu spos kyi rgyan zhes bya ba stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-3: bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas dngos po'i gzugs thams cad la legs par rtogs shig ces bka' stsal pa thos pas de'i tshe bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gnang ba gsol nas dpen par mnyam par gzhag pa'i tshe dge slong dag gis dri bzang po'i aa ka ru bsreg pa mthong nas spos kyi dri snar phog ma thag tu bdag gis dri 'di la brtags pa na shing ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-7: song ba na brten pa'i gnas med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-8: 'ong ba na skyes pa'i khungs med pas rtog pa sel nas zag pa med pa mngon du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la spos kyi rgyan zhes bya bar ming du stsal nas bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-9: yul gyi dri 'phral du 'gag nas dri'i gsang ba zab mo rmad du byung ba rdzogs pas bdag spos kyi dri la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-11: bdag ltar na spos kyi dri las byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:478b-12: sman gyi rgyal po dang sman gyi bla ma zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po'i sras gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-0: 'khor 'dus pa'i tshangs rigs lha lnga brgya dang bcas ba stan @479a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-1: las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-2: bdag cag bskal pa thog ma med pa nas 'jig rten gyi sman gyi bla mar gyur te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 'di'i rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-5: rdo rnams kyi ro myangs nas ming dang grangs chig 'bum brgyad stong yod pa dag gi ro kha ba skyur ba lan tshva ba ro mi bro ba mngar ba tsha ba la sogs pa'i ro thams cad brtag cing shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-8: bsgyur zhing 'chos pa la sogs pa'i tsha par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-11: dug med pa thams cad kyang shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur ba'i tshe ro'i rang bzhin stong pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-13: stong pa ma yin pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-14: lus dang sems las byung ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-15: lus dang sems las bral ba ma yin zhes mngon par rtogs nas ro'i rang bzhin la so sor rtog pas khong du chud pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin gyis nged cag spun gnyis la byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479a-16: sman gyi bla ma zhes bya bar ming du stsal zhing bsngags pa mdzad pa la brten nas da lta 'khor 'dus pa 'dir chos kyi rgyal po'i sras su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-0: ro las mngon par byang chub nas byang chub sems dpar gyur @479b to; ;de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-1: bdag ltar na ro'i rang bzhin las byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-2: bzang skyong 'khor skyes bu chen po bcu drug po dang bcas pa thams cad stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-3: bdag cag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po las thos te khyim nas byung lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-4: rab tu byung ba rnams dang lhan cig tu khang bar zhugs nas khrus byed pa na glo bur du chu'i rkyen gyis dri ma bkrus pa yang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-5: lus bkrus pa yang ma yin zhes rtogs nas de dag gi bar nas dngos po'i mtshan ma zhi bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-6: sngon gyi bag chags ma brjed pa'i stobs kyis da lta de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung nas bdag mi slob pa'i gnas la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa des bzang skyong zhes bya bar ming du stsal zhing rmad du byung ba'i reg bya mngon du gyur te rgyal ba'i sras kyi gnas thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-9: bdag ltar na reg bya las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:479b-12: dge slong ma gser mdog ma la sogs pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-0: bdag 'das pa'i bskal pa dag gi snga rol tu 'jig rten @480a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-1: 'dir sangs rgyas byon pa mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-3: nyi zla'i sgron me zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-4: bdag gis bsnyen bkur zhing chos mnyan te sgrub pa la bslab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sku gdung la mchod cing mar me rgyun mi 'chad par phul nas gser btso mas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la byugs pas de nas bzung ste skye ba thams cad du lus kun nas gser btso ma'i kha dog ltar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-6: dge slong ma gser mdog ma la sogs pa 'di dag bdag gi nye dur gyur nas dus gcig tu sems bskyed pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-7: bdag 'jig rten gyi yul drug gi zag pa la brtags nas stong pa'i dbyings su zhi ba la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-8: 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug gi mthus lus sems bskal pa brgya stong du gnas kyang se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi yun dang mnyam par byed nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-9: bdag stong pa nyid kyi chos la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-11: rmad du byung ba'i chos mngon du byas nas zag pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480a-13: bdag ltar na chos kyi rang bzhin las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-1: ma 'gag pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-2: bdag thog mar khyim nas byung ba'i skabs gnyid shin tu 'thug pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la phyugs dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-3: zhes smad pas bdag gis de thos nas yi mug cing 'gyod nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gnyid ma log pas mig gnyis 'grib ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsal mthong rnam par rol pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bstan pa la brten nas mig la ma ltos par phyogs bcu po shin tu gsal bar cung zad kyang ma lus par mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-5: lag mthil gyi shing thog mthong ba dang 'dra bar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgra bcom pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-7: bdag ltar na mthong ba las log ste gdod ma'i rang bzhin la reg pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:480b-9: lam phran bstan stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-0: bdag klog pa'i tshig gzung mi nus par ma zad mang du thos pa'i rang bzhin dang mi ldan pas thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrad cing chos mnyan nas rab tu byung ba'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs @481a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-1: pas gdams pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bzung nas zhag brgya'i bar du tshig snga ma bzung na phyi ma brjed cing tshig phyi ma bzung na snga ma brjed par gyur pa na bdag dbang po shin tu rtul ba la brtse bar dgongs te drang por 'dug tu bcu gnas dbugs 'byung rdub grongs shig ces bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-2: bdag de'i tshe dbugs shin tu phra mo'i mthar thug gi bar du brtags pa na skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-5: 'gag pa'i bya ba thams cad yud tsam du mngon par rtogs nas sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing zag pa zad nas dgra bcom par gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'dug bzhin du bdag la mi slob pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-7: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-8: bdag ltar na 'byung 'jug las log ste stong pa la reg pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-10: ba lang bdag stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481a-11: bdag 'das pa'i bskal par 'jig rten du dge sbyod la 'phya zhing smod pa'i ngag gi nyes pa bsags pas tshe rabs mang por ba lang ltar skyugs bldad bya dgos pa'i skyon dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la gcig tu rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi snying po'i chos kyi sgo la @481b brtson par gyis shig ces gdams shing bka' stsal pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-1: bdag sems kyi rtog pa zhi nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-2: ro la rtog pa'i 'du shes lus ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-3: dngos po ma yin zhes rtogs nas bsam pa tsam gyi mod la 'jig rten gyi zag pa thams cad zad nas nang du lus sems grol zhing phyi 'jig rten gyi rtog pa spangs nas srid pa gsum las ring du grol ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-4: 'dab chags rgya las thar pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-5: rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dag nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag cing dgra bcom par gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la mi slob pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-6: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-7: bdag ltar na ro las log nas gsal rig la reg pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-9: pi linda'i bu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-10: bdag thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su lam du 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:481b-11: snyam du sems pa na de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten la bde bar ma 'dzin ces yang yang bka' stsal pa rgyun du thos nas grong khyer du bsod snyoms la phyin cing chos la sems pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-0: mtshor bar lam du gnas pa'i dug gi tsher ma rkang pa la zug pas lus thams cad la zag rdu byung ba na bdag la tshor ba yod pa'i dbang gis 'di @482a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-1: ltar shin tu gzir ba shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-2: tshor bas ji ltar gzir ba tshor na yang tshor ba'i rang bzhin gsal rig la gzir ba med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-3: zug rdu'i tshor ba med ces bsam nas bdag yang dang yang du zhib tu brtag pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-4: lus 'di la tshor ba gnyis yod dam zhes sems pa la brtson pas ring bor ma lon par glo bur du lus sems dben par gyur te zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi mjug tu zag pa thams cad zad nas dgra bcom par gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la mi slob pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-6: bdag ltar na tshor ba rnam par dag cing lus spangs pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-8: rab 'byor stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482a-9: bdag bskal pa mang po'i dus nas sems kyi sgrib pa med pa thob cing skye ba mang por lus blangs pa dran pa na gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam zhing thog mar ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe stong zhing dben par shes shing de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i bar du yang stong pa'i rang bzhin du mthong bas sems can thams cad kyang stong pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba la dgod par bya'o snyam lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas gsal @482b rig don dam pa'i de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa'i bka' drin la brten nas stong pa'i rang bzhin gsal rig mngon du gyur te dgra bcom par gyur nas skad cig tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho lta bu'i gsal rig stong pa nyid kyi dgongs pa mngon du gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang spyod yul mnyam par gyur pas mi slob pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-1: stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol nas bdag bla na med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-3: bdag ltar na gzugs sna tshogs pa la gzugs 'gag pa dang 'gag par bya ba thams cad zad nas chos kyi dmigs pa las log ste stong pa la zhugs pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-5: sh'a ri'i bu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:482b-6: bdag bskal pa mang po'i dus nas sems kyi mthong ba rnam par dag cing skye ba mang por lus blangs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam par 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba la gcig tu bltas pa na mngon sum du mthong nas sgrib thogs gtan nas med cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-0: bdag lam du 'od srung mched mnyam du 'gro ba dang 'phrad nas bdag dang rten cing 'brel pa'i tshul rgyas par gleng ba na blo sad nas rtogs @483a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-1: pa mtha' yas par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-2: mthong ba dang rig pa rnam par dag nas bsnyengs pa dang bral bas dgra bcom par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung las skyes pa'i sras kyi thu bor gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-5: bdag ltar na sems kyi mthong ba las ye shes spros te 'du shes kyi gnas lugs rtogs pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-7: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-8: bdag thog ma nas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-9: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rang gi slob ma byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la slobs shig ces gdams pa na bdag gi ming 'di las de ltar du btags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-10: bdag rtogs shing thos pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes dang mthong ba'i khyad par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483a-11: de lta gal te zhing gzhan gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol gyi sems can gcig la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa gsal bar byed snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-0: bdag de'i tshe glang po che mche ba drug pa la zhon nas lus stong phrag brgyar sprul @483b te so so'i thad du phyin nas de ji tsam du sgrib pa stug por gyur nas bdag ma mthong yang des ma tshor bzhin du de'i mgo la byug cing srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-1: bde legs su byas nas don 'grub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-3: bdag 'di snyam du rtsa ba'i rgyu rtogs shing thos pa mngon du byas nas so sor 'byed pa la dbang thob pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-5: gcung dga' bo stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-6: bdag thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung nas chos la zhugs shing tshul khrims bsrungs kyang ting nge 'dzin las yengs shing g-yo bas zag pa zad par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang gsus po che gnyis la sna'i rtse mor kha dog dkar po sgoms shig ces gdams pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:483b-8: bdag gis thog mar nges par brtag cing zhag bdun phrag gsum 'das nas sna bug gi rlung 'byung 'jug du ba dang 'dra bar gyur pa mthong nas nang du lus sems gsal zhing 'jig rten thams cad rtogs nas thams cad gsal stong du gyur bas bee d'urya ltar gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-0: du ba'i rnam pa rim gyis yal nas sna'i dbugs dkar por gyur pa'i rjes su blo sad cing zag pa zad de 'byung 'jug gi dbugs 'od du gyur nas phyogs bcu gsal bar gyur cing dgra bcom @484a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la nges par byang chub 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-5: bdag gis ring du dbugs sbyangs pas rig pa skyes te gsal bar rdzogs shing zag pa zad pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-7: byams ma'i bu gang po stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-8: bdag bskal pa shin tu ring po nas spobs pa thogs pa med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-9: sdug bsngal ba dang stong pa'i tshul 'chad cing yang dag pa'i gnas lugs mngon par rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-10: de bzhin du gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba zab mo'i chos kyi sgo ji snyed pa tshogs kyi dbus su shin tu gsal bar phye ste ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag spobs pa phun sum tshogs par mkhyen nas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par sgrogs shig ces bka' stsal pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te rgyal ba'i mdzad pa bsgrubs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-13: sengge'i sgra sgrog pa lta bur chos smra ba la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos smra ba bla na med pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon @484b par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-1: bdag chos kyi sgras bdud bcom zhing zag pa zad pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-3: nye bar 'khor stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-4: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas grong khyer las byung ste rab tu byung nas de bzhin gshegs pas lo drug dka' ba spyad cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-5: de bzhin gshegs pas bdud bcom zhing mu stegs btul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-6: 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang chags pa'i zag pa thams cad las grol ba yang mngon sum du mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas stsal ba'i tshul khrims nod nas rtsa ba'i brtul zhugs sum stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-8: yan lag gi brtul zhugs khri phrag brgyad kyi bar du rnam par dag cing lus sems dben pa thob nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-9: bdag tshogs kyi nang du mchog tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi sems mkhyen nas tshul khrims srung zhing lus sdom thams cad kyi nang nas bdag la bla na med pa zhes bsngags pa mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:484b-11: bdag lus sbyangs pa'i lus la dbang thob cing rim gyis sems sbyangs nas sems thogs pa med par gyur pa'i rjes su lus sems thams cad don yod par gyur pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-1: po stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-2: bdag thog mar bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing lam du phyin pas lteng rgyas 'od srung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-4: chu klung 'od srung gsum dang 'phrad nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don zab mo rgya cher gleng bas bdag de ma thag tu spro ba bskyed nas ches shin tu gting dpog par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la snam sbyar stsal pa lus la gyon ma thag tu skra dang kha spu rang byi bar gyur to; ;bdag phyogs bcur chags thogs med par 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon du gyur pa rnams kyi mchog ces lung bstan cing dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-7: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan pa gsal zhing rnam par dag pa la dbang zhing 'jigs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-10: bdag ltar na sems dmigs pa la phyir log nas sems 'od gsal bar gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485a-11: chu'i rnyog pa dvangs pa ltar rim gyis dvangs par gyur pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-0: khro bo au tstshushma de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar zhing zhabs la phyag 'tshal @485b nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-1: bskal pa shin tu ring po'i gnas skabs dran pa na bdag chags pas bcings pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byon pa dang 'phrad nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'dod chags can gyi skye bo'i 'dod chags me dpung dang 'dra zhes bka' stsal nas bdag la lhu tshigs brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-4: sna tshogs pa'i tsha grang gi dbugs la rtogs shing ces gdams pa la sems 'od gsal ba nang du bsdus pas chags pa'i sems zhi na ye shes kyi mer gyur pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la khro bo rdo rje'i me zhes btags shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-6: bdag me'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu la brten nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-7: bdag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub mngon du mdzad pa na bdag stobs po cher gyur nas bdud kyi dpung bcom zhing 'dul bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:485b-10: bdag lus sems kyi dro ba'i reg bya la yang dag par brtags pas sgrib thogs med par gyur nas zag pa thams cad zad cing sems rin po che'i me lce 'bar te bla na med pa'i rig pa'i mthar thug pa la byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi @486a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-1: zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-2: sngar gyi gnas skabs dran pa na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od 'jig rten du byon pa'i tshe bdag dge slong du gyur nas lam po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-4: 'phrang dog po la sogs pa rta dang shing rta bgrod dka' ba'i gnas thams cad bdag gis snyoms par bcos shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-7: sa dang bye ma lcar ba sogs bya ba 'di lta bu 'bad pas brtson bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa 'jig rten du byon pa dag 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-8: skye bo 'ga' zhig tshong 'dus kyi sa ra gzhan gyis yo byad 'khyer du bcug pa na de'i yod byad 'dong pa'i gnas su bskyal nas bzhag ma thag tu phyir ldog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-9: de las gla rngan len par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob 'jig rten du byon pa'i dus su 'jig rten du mu ge rgyun du byung bas bdag gis gzhan gyi yo byad 'khyer ba na thag nye ring mi brtsi bar pa na re re len par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486a-11: gzhan yang phyugs dang shing rta 'dam du bying ba na bdag gi sgyu rtsal gyi mthus 'khor lo 'dren zhing sdug bsngal las thar par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-0: de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te zhal zas bstabs pa na bdag lam srang 'chos shing de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor @486b bcas pa sgug cing bsngad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob byon nas phyag bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste bdag la sems kyis snyoms par byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-2: 'jig rten gyis thams cad snyoms par byas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-3: zhes gdams shing bka' stsal pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-4: bdag de ma thag tu blo sad nas lus kyi rdul phra mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo gtan nas khyad par med par rtogs nas rdul phra mo'i rang bzhin phan tshun mi reg par ma zad mtshon gyis kyang reg tu med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-6: skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob nas dgra bcom par gyur te da lta bdag rigs sad nas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos padma dkar po las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bka' stsal pa thos nas thog mar khong du chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-8: bdag gis 'jig rten gyi phyi nang gi rdul rnam pa gnyis khyad par gtan nas med par gdod ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-9: rdzun pa las byung ba'i rdul yin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:486b-10: rdul de zad pa na ye shes rdzogs nas bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-0: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal @487a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-2: bdag gis sngon gyi gnas dran pa na bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon pa na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chu la dmigs pa'i sgo nas ting nge 'dzin la zhugs shig ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-3: de'i phyir bdag lus kyi chu'i khams la so sor rtog cing sgom pas gtan la phab nas dang po mchil snabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-4: de nas khu khrag dang bshang gci la thug gi bar du lus kyi nang gi chu'i bdag nyid du gyur pa ni; 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i zhing gi rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-5: bdag de'i tshe thog mar 'di nyid bsgoms pas chu'i rang bzhin kho na mthong yang lus kyi khams zad par ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-6: dge slong du gyur pa'i tshe spyil bur bsam gtan sgom pa'i tshe bdag gi slob ma gcig gis skar khung nas nang du bltas pa na khyim chus gang ba mthong zhing gzhan ci yang ma mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-7: de byis pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pas chu'i nang du gyo dum bsgyur bas chu la sgra phyung ste phyi mig blta bzhin du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487a-8: bdag ting nge 'dzin las langs pa na de ma thag tu snying ga na zhing ji ltar sh'a ri'i bu gnod byed kyi 'dres gtse ba lta bur gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-0: bdag gis nan tan du @487b bsam pa na bdag da lta dgra bcom pa'i go 'phang thob nas na ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba la ci'i phyir snying ga glo bur du na bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-1: ci ste go 'phang las nyams pa yin nam snyam du brtag cing bsam pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-2: slob bu byis pa de bdag gi gam du 'ongs nas sngar gyi tshul de smras pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-3: bdag gis de la khyod kyis slad nas chu de mthong ba na sgo phye nas chu'i nang du zhugs la gyo dum de sol cig ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-4: des kyang ji ltar smras pa bzhin mnyan te phyis bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-5: des chu de nyid kyi nang du gyo dum gcig yod pa mthong nas sgo phye zhing gyo dum blangs nas bsal bas phyis bsam gtan nas langs pa na sngar ltar nad med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-6: de nas bzung ste de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-7: 'phrad cing de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i dbang phyug rgyal po mngon par mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho'i dus su gdod lus kyi khams nub par gyur cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-8: phyogs bcu'i spos kyi rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin du 'dres nas nges par stong pa'i rang bzhin mngon du gyur nas gnyis su med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar nges pa'i gzhon nur gyur pa zhes ming thob nas byang chub sems dpar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:487b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-0: bdag chu'i rang bzhin gcig pu la so sor rtog cing bsgoms pas skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa tho @488a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-1: nas byang chub kyi go 'phang mngon du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-3: chos kyi rgyal pa'i sras bee d'urya'i 'od ces pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-4: bdag sngon gyi gnas dran pa na bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-5: des byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdod ma'i gsal rig gsal bar bstan te phyi 'jig rten dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-6: nang sems can gyi lus thams cad rdzun pa'i 'brel gyi rlung gi stobs kyis 'khor ba'i tshul rtogs shig ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-7: bdag gis de'i tshe 'jig rten chags pa'i tshul la brtags nas 'jig rten gyi 'pho zhing 'gyur ba la rtog cing lus kyi g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la rtog la sems kyi rtog pa rgyu ba la yang brtags pas g-yo ba sna tshogs pa dag gnyis su med cing ro gcig tu mthong nas dbyer med par gyur pa de'i tshe g-yo ba'i rang bzhin 'di dag thog mar gang nas 'od ba'i gnas med cing mthar gang du 'gro ba'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488a-8: phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed kyi sems can phyin ci log gis bcings pa rnams rdzun pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-0: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad snod gcig gi @488b nang du tshogs pa'i sprang bu sgra 'byin cing go sa chung ngu zhig tu 'khrug cing 'thobs pa ltar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrad ma thag tu ring por ma thogs par skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob nas de'i tshe blo sad nas shar phyogs mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing khams mthong zhing chos kyi rgyal po'i sras su gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-2: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur nas lus dang sems 'od gsal zhing kun tu khyab ste thogs pa med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-4: bdag rlung gi stobs kyis brten pa'i gnas med ces brtag cing bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems rtogs shing ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang mthun pa'i gsal rig mngon du gyur pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-6: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-7: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du mtha' med pa'i lus bsgrubs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:488b-8: de'i tshe bdag gis lag tu yid bzhin gyi nor du bzhi bzung ste phyogs bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis gsal bar byas te nam mkha'i rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-0: de nas bdag gi yid las me long zhig byung ste de @489a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-1: las 'od zer rmad du byung ba rnam pa bcu phyogs bcu'i ri 'phros nas nam mkha'i mtha'i bar du khyab par gyur te gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa'i me long gi nang du btsud cing bdag gi lus la zhugs nas lus nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar phan tshun sgreb thogs med cing bdag nyid rdul phra rab snying kyi 'jig rten du song ste sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-2: bdag gis 'byung ba bzhi la brtag pa na brten pa'i gnas mi rnyed cing 'du shes phyin ci log gis btags pa tsam du zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-3: yang dag par na nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong zhing mnyam pa nyid las rigs skyes nas skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-5: bdag nam mkha' mtha' med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas stobs rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489a-7: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-0: bdag sngon gyi gnas dran pa na 'das pa'i bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid zla'i sgron me zhes bya ba 'jig @489b rtan du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-1: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rjes su rab tu byung yang sngon 'jig rten gyi rigs dang gags pa mtho ba la dga' zhing 'grogs 'dris bya ba la 'dun pa lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-2: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas sems rnam par shes pa la rtse gcig tu dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par zhog ces gdams pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-3: bskal ba mang por ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyis gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur te 'jig rten gyi grags pa don gnyer gyi blo dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'jig rten du byon pa na bdag gdod bla na med pa'i gsal rig gi rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas stong pa yang ma dmigs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing dag pa dang ma dag pa la sogs pa thams cad sems kyi rnam 'phrul las byung bar rtegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-7: bdag gis sems kyi rnam par shes pa nyid las 'di ltar gyur pa mngon du rtogs nas rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa byon zhing gshegs par rtogs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su zhing 'dir bdag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par da lta lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:489b-8: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-0: bdag phyogs bcu'i rnam par shes @490a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-1: pa tsam gyi de kho na nyid la so sor rtogs pas rnam par shes pa'i gsal rig don dam pa'i yongs grub mngon du gyur cing gzhan dbang dang kun btags kyi 'dzin pa ring du spangs nas skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-3: chos kyi rgyal po'i sras mthu chen thob 'khor byang chub sems dpa' lnga bcu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-4: bdag sngon gyi gnas dran pa na 'das pa'i bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-5: de nas bskal pa gcig po de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis rim par byon par gyur to; ;de dag las tha ma'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo ma shig ces gdams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-8: skye bo 'ga' zhig las gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-9: rtag tu dran pa dang ldan zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-11: brjed ngas che ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-12: skye bo de gnyis skabs la lar 'phrad; skabs la lar mi 'phrad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490a-14: skabs la lar mi mthong ba dang 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-0: gal te de gnyis gcig gis gcig dran par gyur na phyogs gnyis ka phan @490b tshun dran pa'i 'bral ba dam pas de nas skye ba nas skye bar lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-1: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems can thams cad la dgongs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-2: mas bu dran pa ltar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-3: gal te bu des ma yal bar dor na ma des bu dran kyang dgongs pa ci /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-4: bus ma de dran pa yang ji ltar mas bu dran pa ltar 'gyur na; ma dang bu gnyis skye ba nas skye bar ring du 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-5: gal te sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis sangs rgyas dran zhing sems pa na 'phral dang yun du gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-6: sangs rgyas dang mi ring bar gyur na thabs la mkhan pa gzhan mi dgos par rang nyid blo sad nas dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i mi'i lus las dri zhim po 'byung ba dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de la spos kyi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-7: bdag thog mar lam la slob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems kyi skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-8: da lta 'jig rten 'di'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i skye bo rnams kyang dag pa'i zhing du brtse bas drangs te de ro spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:490b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-0: bdag la dmigs kyis phye ste @491a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-1: gzung bar bya ba med kyi dbang po drug bsdus te gsal rig gi rgyun nyid la mnyam par bzhag nas ting nge 'dzin thob pa las byang chub pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-5: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-7: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-9: bdag sngon gyi gnas dran pa na 'das pa'i bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-10: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la thos pa'i sgo nas sems shing sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyis shig ces gdams pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-11: thos pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag pa'i don la zhugs pas yul dang bral bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-12: yul rnam par dag nas zhi ba'i rjes su g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i gzugs gnyis gtan nas skyes bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491a-13: de bzhin du blo rim gyis 'phel nas thos pa dang thos par bya ba zad par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-0: @491b thos pa zad nas de tsam du ma zad kyi rig pa dang rig par bya ba yang stong par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-1: stong pa nyid rig pa'i blo mthar thug pa'i rjes su stong pa dang stong par bya ba zhi bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-2: skye ba dang 'gag pa zhi ba'i rjes su zhi ba rang nyid mngon du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-3: 'di la de ma thag tu sring pa dang zhi ba las 'das nas phyogs bcu gsal rig gi rang bzhin du gyur te rmad du byung ba rnam pa gnyis thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-5: yar phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar snying rje'i stobs dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-7: mar phyogs bcu'i rigs drug gi 'gro ba sna tshogs dang lhan cig tu thugs rjes dgongs par gsol ba 'debs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:491b-9: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs bsnyen bkur bas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bka' drin gyis bdag la sgyu ma lta bur thos pa'i sgo nas zhugs shing thos pa bzhin sgom pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par gdams pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar snying rje'i stobs dang ldan par gyur pa'i phyir bdag gang la gang 'dul ba'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgrubs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rol zhing spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas zag @492a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-1: pa med pa'i gnas sgom pa la rtogs pa mchog thams cad mngon du gyur pa na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-2: slob pa gang dag lus sems dben pas gsal zhing mi rtog pa mngon du gyur cing 'phags pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa la mngon du phyogs pa na bdag de'i mdun du rang rgyal bse ru lta bu'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-3: gang dag rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis 'gag cing de'i 'brel pa chad nas don dam pa'i rang bzhin mchog tu gsal ba la mngon du phyogs pa na bdag de'i mdun du rang rgyal gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-4: slob pa gang dag bden bzhi'i stong nyid rtogs nas lam sgom zhing 'gog pa thob ste don dam pa'i rang bzhin gsal ba la mngon du phyogs pa na bdag de'i mdun du nyan thos kyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492a-5: sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i sems mngon du rtogs nas 'dod chags kyi yul dang mi 'grogs par lus 'od gsal bar 'gyur bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492b-0: sems can gang @492b dag lha'i rgyal por gyur nas lha'i gtso bo byed par 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du brgya byin gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492b-1: sems can gang dag rang dbang can du gyur nas phyogs bcur gang 'dod du 'gro bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du nye dbang gi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492b-2: sems can gang dag rang dbang can du gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do; ;sems can gang dag lha dang 'byung po'i gtso bor gyur nas 'jig rten thams cad skyong bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du lha'i sde dpon chen po'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492b-3: sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi gtso bor gyur nas sems can thams cad skyong bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du rgyal chen bzhi'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:492b-4: sems can gang dag lha'i gnas su skyes nas lha dang 'byung po bkol bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du rgyal chen ris bzhi pa'i lha'i bu'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493a-0: sems can gang dag mi'i rgyal por 'gyur bar 'dod na @493a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493a-1: bdag de'i mdun du mi'i rgyal po'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493a-2: sems can gang dag rigs mthon por skyes nas 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag gi bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du rgyal rigs kyi skye bo'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493a-3: sems can gang dag rig byed smra ba la mkhas shing lus bde bar gnas pa zhig tu 'gyur bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du blon po chen po'i rigs can gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493a-4: sems can gang dag rgyal khams bde ba'i thabs sgrub pa dang mtha'i bya ba dag gtan la 'bebs par 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du sna chen po la gtogs pa'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do; ;sems can gang dag rtsis kyi rig byed slob pa la dga' ba dang lus srung zhing gso bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du bram de'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-0: gang dag skyes pa las rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims gtsang ma srung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dge slong gi gzugs su sprul @493b te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-1: gang dag bud med las rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims gtsang ma srung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dge slong ma'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-2: gang dag skyes pa las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga srung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dge bsnyen gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-3: gang dag bud med las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga len par 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-4: bud med gang dag bud med kyi nang khrims gtso bor bzung nas khyim dang nang ma skyong bdag yod na bdag de'i mdun du rgyal yum dang btsun mo dam pa dang bkur 'os kyi btsun mo dang khyim bdag mo che ba'i rigs can gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:493b-5: sems can gang dag gzhon nu'i lang tsho las mi nyams par 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du gzhon nu'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-0: bu mo gang dag las rang gi lus gces par srung zhing tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pa don du mi gnyer bdag yod na bdag de'i mdun du gzhon nu ma'i gzugs su @494a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-1: sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-2: lha gang dag lha'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag lha'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-3: klu gang dag klu'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag klu'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-4: gnod sbyin gang dag gnod sbyin gyi rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-5: dri za gang dag de'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du dri za'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-6: lha ma yin gang dag de'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du lha ma yin gyi gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-7: mi'am ci gang dag de'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du mi'am ci'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494a-8: lto 'phye chen po gang dag de'i rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de'i mdun du lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su sprul te de la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494b-0: skye bo gang dag mi lus nyid mi 'dor bar 'dod na bdag @494b de'i mdun du mi'i gzugs su sprul te de dag la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494b-1: mi ma yin pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang 'du shes dang 'du shes med pa gang dag rang rang gi rigs las 'byung bar 'dod na bdag de dag gi mdun du de dag dang mthun par sprul te de dag la chos bstan nas phan pa sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494b-2: 'di la rmad du byung zhing rnam par dag pa 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i gang la gang 'dul ba'i 'phrin las sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494b-4: thos pa dang thos pa'i don bsam pa'i sgo nas sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'bad rtsol med par lhun gyis grub pa'i mthu phul du byung ba las grub lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:494b-6: thos pa dang thos pa'i don bsam pa'i sgo nas sbyangs pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bad rtsol med par lhun gyis grub pa'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can thams cad dang lhan cig tu gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la bdag gi lus dang yid las mi 'jigs pa'i yon tan bcu bzhi thob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495a-0: bdag phyi rol gyi sgra la mi gzhol pa nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i sems can sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dag so sos bdag gi ming smos pa tsam gyis bdag gis thos shing de dag de ma thag tu grol bar byed @495a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495a-2: shes pa mthong pa phyir bsdus pa nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad me chen po'i nang du chud na yang mes mi 'tshog par byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495a-4: blta ba dang mnyam pa phyir bsdus pa nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad chu bo chen pos khyer na yang chur mi 'bying bar byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495a-6: phyin ci log gi sems rgyun 'chad cing gsod pa dang 'tshe ba'i sems med pa nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad 'dre gnas pa'i yul du gnas na yang 'dres 'tshe bar byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495a-8: mnyan pa las phyir bsdus nas mnyan pa'i rang bzhin la zhugs pas dbang po drug po dag nas sgra dang mnyan byed mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa nyid kyis gal te sems can gang dag gsod du nye ba na ral gri dum bu dum bur chad cing chu la mtshon btab pa dang 'od la phu btab pa bzhin du lus sgul bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-0: drug pa ni; thos pa las rim gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal ba mngon du gyur pas mi gsal ba dang mun pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad la gnod sbyin dang srin po dang srul bum dang 'byung po dang sha za dang srul po la sogs pas nye bar mtho btsams par 'ong na yang mig gis blta ba @495b tsam yang mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-2: sgra'i rang bzhin rnam par dag nas mthong ba dang thos pa phyir bsdus shing yul rdzun pa dang bral ba nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad lags so dang lcags sgrog gis bcings na yang mnar mi nus par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-4: sgra'i dmigs pa zhi zhing mnyan pa'i rang bzhin la zhugs nas byams pa'i stobs kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis gal te sems can thams cad 'brog dgon pa dang g-yang kha sogs nyam nga ba'i sar phyin pa na rkun pos 'joms mi nus par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-6: thos pa las rim gyis yul dang bral nas gzugs kyis 'phrog par ma nus pa nyid kyis sems can 'dod chags can thams cad kyi 'dod chags ring du spong nus par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-7: bcu pa ni; sgra'i rang bzhin yul gyis ma gos pas dbang po dang yul mnyam pa nyid du gyur cing ltos bya ltos byed med pa nyid kyis sems can zhe sdang can thams cad zhe sdang dang 'bral nus par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:495b-9: yul gyi dmigs pa zad cing phyir bsdus nas chos kyi dbyings dang lus sems beed'u rya ltar gsal zhing sgrib thogs mad pa nyid kyis rtul zhing rmongs pa'i sgrib pa can gyi sems can thams cad gti mug dang 'bral bar byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496a-0: rnam pa rnams bsdus nas thos pa'i rang bzhin du zhugs nas chos @496a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496a-1: kyi dbyings las mi g-yo bar 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su song ste 'jig rten gyi spyod pa 'jig par yang mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496a-2: phyogs bcu thams cad du phyin nas rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i drung du chos kyi rgyal po'i sras su 'gyur bar byed nus pa'i phyir 'jig rten na bu med pa dag bu don du gnyer na bu bsod nams dang ldan zhing blo gros che ba skye bar byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496a-4: dbang po drug gi de kho na nyid mthar thug pa gsal bar mkhyen pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496a-5: gnyis su med cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de'i nang du chud pa'i me long lta bu'i ye shes su gyur cing stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por grub nas phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul zab mo gus pas nyams su blangs nas mi nyams pa'i phyir 'jig rten na bu mo 'dod na brtan cing dul la tshul bzang ba bsod nams kyi dpal dang ldan pa yid du 'ong zhing kun gyis bkur ba'i bu mo skye bar byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa na da lta bzhugs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed @496b drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs dang mnyam pa dag gis thabs la mkhas pa tha dad pas bdag nyid chos spyod cing gzhan la bstan nas lam bzang por bkri zhing 'dul ba dang sems can thams cad rang rang gi skal ba dang 'tsham par bdag nyid kyis thob pa'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu rna ba'i sgo nas mchog tu gsal bar byas pa'i rjes su lus dang sems kyi nang du shin tu rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa dag chud pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis bdag gi ming nas bos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-1: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras dag gi ming nas bos pa'i skye bo gnyis kyi phan yon dang bsod nams mnyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-3: bdag gi ming dang de dag gi ming mi mnyam pa med par gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-4: bdag gis brtson pas sbyangs pa las mngon par byang chub po thob pa las byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-6: mi 'jigs pa bcu bzhi'i stobs kyis sems can thams cad la khyab par srung zhing skyod par byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:496b-8: bdag mngon par byang chub pa thob nas bla na med pa'i lam grub pa'i phyir yang bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'bad rtsol med pa rmad du byung ba'i yon tan bzhi bde blag tu grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-0: bdag thog mar rmad du byung ba'i yang rmad du byung ba thos pa'i sems thob nas sems kyi rang bzhin thos pa dang bral @497a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-1: zhing mthong ba dang thos pa dang tshor ba dang shes pa'i bya ba so sor ma phye bar yul la 'jug pa'i rin po che gsal rig rang byung gi ye shes grub cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-2: de bzhin du bdag rmad du byung ba'i gzugs su sprul nas mtha' med pa'i gsang sngags 'chad par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-3: de las mgo gcig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-8: mgo bcu gcig pa nas mgo brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-11: mi phyed pa'i mgo brgyad khri bzhi stong can gyi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-17: lag pa bcu gnyis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-21: nyi shu nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-22: de las lag pa brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-25: lag pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-30: de las mig brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-33: rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i mig brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du sprul zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497a-37: 'ga' zhig tu shes rab kyis sems can thams cad srung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-0: @497b zhing skyob pa dang bde ba la 'god par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-2: bdag gi mnyan pa dang sems pa dbang po drug dang bral bas ji ltar skad kyi dbyangs ra bas mi 'gog par thos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su sprul nas gsang sngags kyi sgra sna tshogs pa sgrog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-3: gzugs de dang gsang sngags des sems can thams cad la 'jigs pa med par byed nus pas de dang mthun par phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag la mi 'jigs pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes grags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-5: bdag thog ma nas mngon par byang chub pa'i gsal rig rmad du byung ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la bslab cing sbyangs pas gang du phyin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad so so nas rang rang gi rin po che sogs yo byad btang nas bdag gi snying rje bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-7: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rnyed cing mthar thug pa'i don gsal bar byed pas rin po che'i yo byad kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod par byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la snyoms par gang dag bud med 'dod pa la bud med thob par byed; bu 'dod pa la bu thob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-8: ting nge 'dzin 'dod pa la ting nge 'dzin thob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:497b-9: tshe ring bar 'dod pa la tshe ring ba thob par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-0: de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po 'dod pa la mya nga @498a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-1: las 'das pa thob par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-2: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dris pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-3: bdag rna ba'i sgo nas ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par mngon du gyur cing sems la dbang thob nas nang du bsdus pas ting nge 'dzin thob cing byang chub grub pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag la mngon par byang chub bde chos kyi sgo thob nus so; ;zhes bsngags shing 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su lung bstan nas spyan ras gzigs zhes ming du stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-7: bdag gi mthong ba dang thos pa phyogs bcur rdzogs par gsal zhing de bzhin du spyan ras gzigs kyi ming yang phyogs bcur khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-8: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sengge'i khri'i steng du sku las rin po che'i 'od zer 'phros shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-9: phyogs bcu'i rgyang ring po'i rdul snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-10: gzhan yang chos kyi rgyal po'i sras byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyi bor phog pas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las rdul phra rab kyi 'jig rten gyi rdul snyed kyi rin po che'i 'od zer 'phros te de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo dang 'khor 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang dgra bcom ba'i bar du phog pas nags tshal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498a-12: rdzing bu dag las chos kyi sgra dbyangs byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-0: 'od zer phan tshun du bsnol zhing 'brel ba rin po che'i dra ba lta bur gyur nas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis sngar ma mthong ba'i ya mtshan mthong ste rdo rje lta @498b bu'i ting nge 'dzin ma lus pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-1: de'i tshe nam mkha' las rin po che sna tshogs pa'i padma sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-4: dkar po dag spel zhing rnam par bkra ba'i me tog gi char bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-5: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' bar snang rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog can du gyur te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-7: chu klung thams cad glo bur du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-8: phyogs bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-9: chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs rang grags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rgyal po'i sras 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-11: khyod da lta byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-12: dgra bcom pa mi slob pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po dag so sos smras pa'i thog ma'i thabs la mkhas pas lam grub par smras pa la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-13: thams cad kyang mngon par byang chub pa'i lam brtson pas sbyangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-15: de dag gi brtson pas sbyangs pa la nges par mchog dman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-16: snga phyi'i khyad par med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-17: ngas da lta kun dga' bo la tshul 'di ston par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-18: spyod pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag las gang zhig de'i dbang po dang 'tsham zhing rtogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:498b-19: slar yang nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su 'jig rten 'di'i sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs nas bla na med pa'i lam 'tshol ba na thabs la mkhas pa gang gis bde blag tu sgrub par byed nus zhes bka' stsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-0: chos kyi rgyal po'i sras 'jam pa'i dbyangs bcom @499a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-1: ldan 'das kyis brtse bas bka' stsal ma thag tu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-2: rnam rig rgya mtsho rang bzhin mchog tu dvangs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-3: gdod nas gsal ba'i mngon byang rmad du byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-4: snang bya'i don kun de yis gsal bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-5: snang bya mngon gyur rang bzhin bag la zha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-6: rdzun snang 'khrul pas nam mkha' stong pa byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-7: stong la brten nas 'jig rten khams rnams grub //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-8: sems kyi byed pas yul khams so sor gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-9: rnam par shes pas sems can khams rnams byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-10: stong pa rig pa mchog gi rnam 'phrul te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-11: dper na mtsho las chu bur rdol ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-12: zag bcas 'jig rten khams mang rdul snyed rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-13: thams cad stong la brten nas gnas pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-14: chu bur zhig na stong pa'ang med 'gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-15: srid pa gsum po la ni lta ci smos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-16: mthar thug rang bzhin la zhugs gnyis su med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-17: bkri byed thabs la mkhas pa'i sgo mo mang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-18: 'phags pa'i rang bzhin kun tu 'gog pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-19: 'jug ngogs tha dad kun kyang bkri ba'i thabs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-20: thog mar sems bskyed ting 'dzin la 'jug tshe //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-21: bul dang myur ba'i tshul ni 'dra ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-22: gzugs su rnam par rtog pas yul rnams 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-23: zhib tu brtag kyang rtog pa'i gting mi phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499a-24: 'di yi gting mtha' gsal bar mi nus na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-0: ji @499b ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-1: dbyangs dang brjod pa sna tshogs 'dres pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-2: ming dang tshig gi brjod pa tsam du zad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-3: gcig tu thams cad chud par mi nus phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-4: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-5: dri ni 'phrad cing ltos pa dag las shes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-6: bral bar gyur na de nas dmigs su med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-7: rtag tu shes par 'gyur ba ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-8: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-9: ro yi rang bzhin gdod nas grub ma min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-10: nges par myong ba'i tshe ma grub pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-11: de yi rig pa gcig tu mi 'gyur phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-12: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-13: reg pa reg bya'i yul las gsal bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-14: yul gyi gnas med reg ces byar mi rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-15: 'phrad dang 'bral ba'i rang bzhin mi brtan phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-16: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-17: chos zhes bya ba nang gi yul yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-18: nges par phyi yul la brten gnas yod dam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-19: gzung 'dzin ji ltar gyur kyang khyab pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-20: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-21: mthong ba'i rang bzhin phyogs bzhir 'dra na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-22: mdun gyi yul mthong rgyab kyi mthong ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-23: mthong ba phyogs gcig chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-24: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-26: bar du dbugs kyi rgyu ba gzhan mi chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-27: phan tshun 'brel nas 'jug pa ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:499b-28: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-1: bro rgyu rkyen med ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-2: tshor zhing myong ba ro las 'byung ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-3: ro 'gag na ni gang yang med pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-4: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-5: reg byed lus ni yul las gzhan ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-6: so sor rtogs pa gsal rig ma yin zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-7: gnyug mar gnas kyang rtogs par mi nus phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-8: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-9: yid kyi dbang po 'khrul ba'i sems dang 'dres //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-10: dvangs pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar nus ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-11: sems shing dran pa 'bral bar mi nus phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-12: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-13: mthong ba'i rnam shes rnam gsum yul dang 'dus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-14: gzhi la brtag na gzugs nyid min zhes bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-15: rang gi rnam pa gdod nas nges gzung med; ;ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-16: yid kyi thos pa phyogs bcu kun la khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-17: skyes pa rgyu rkyen nus pa che las 'byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-18: ji ltar byas kyang gsar bu'i blo mi 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-19: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-20: sna yi shes pa 'phral gyi dbang por 'tsham //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-21: g-yo ba'i sems nyid gnas pa'i ched du yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-22: dmigs pa gcig la gnas pa'i sems kyi rten //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-23: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-24: chos smra sgra dang brjod pa'i byed pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500a-25: bag chags smin pas don gsal rtogs par nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-0: ming dang @500b brjod pa zag med ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-1: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-2: sdom pa lus ni srung bar byed pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-3: lus las gzhan du ci zhig srung bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-4: gdod nas kun tu khyab pa ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-5: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-6: rdzu 'phrul sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-7: yul gyi chos la rtogs par ci zhig ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-8: dmigs pa'i dngos po dang ni 'bral du med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-9: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-10: gal te sa yi rang bzhin la rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-11: sra zhing 'thas la thogs pa med pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-12: 'dus shing byas pa 'phags pa'i rang bzhin min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-13: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-14: gang zhig chu yi rang bzhin la rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-15: bsam pa'i dmigs pa yang dag don ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-16: gdod ma'i rang bzhin rtog ge'i yul ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-17: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-18: gang dag me yi rang bzhin la rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-19: srid bral yang dag don la bral ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-20: gsar bu bkri ba'i thabs mkhas ma yin phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-21: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-22: gang dag rlung gi rang bzhin la rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-23: g-yo dang mi g-yo phan tshun mi ltos min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-24: ltos pa dag ni bla med ye shes min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-25: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:500b-26: gang zhig stong pa nyid la rtog pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-1: blun la gdod nas rig pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-2: de med phyir na byang chub tshul las gzhan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-3: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-4: gang dag rnam par shes pa la rtog na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-5: rnam shes brtag na rtag tu gnas ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-6: sems kyi gnas pa bden min rdzun pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-7: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-8: 'du byed thams cad rtag pa ma yin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-9: dran ba'i rang bzhin gzhi nas skye 'gag ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-10: rgyu 'bras so sor ma 'dres pa nyid phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-11: ji ltar mngon par byang chub 'grub par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-12: deng bdag bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-13: ston pa mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'dir 'khrungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-14: phyogs 'di'i yang dag bstan pa'i gzhung lugs ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-15: rnam dag bshad dang nyan pa la ni gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-16: gang dag ting 'dzin thob par 'dod pa des //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-17: nges par shos ba nyid las yang dag 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-18: sdug bsngal dang bral rnam grol thob pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-19: spyan ras gzigs de ae ma rmad du byung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-20: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-21: rdul gyi grangs mnyam sangs rgyas zhing zhugs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-22: dbang phyug chen po'i mthu dang ldan gyur pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-23: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501a-24: rmad du byung ba'i dbyangs ldan spyan ras gzigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-0: tshangs dbyangs rgya mtsho'i @501b rlabs kyi dbyangs dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-1: 'jig rten thams cad skyob cing bde bar mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-2: 'jig rten las 'das rtag pa'i gnas su bkod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-3: deng bdag de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-4: spyan ras gzigs kyis ji ltar smras pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-5: dper na mi zhig dben par gnas pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-6: phyogs bcu kun nas dus gcig rnga brdung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-7: phyogs bcu'i sgra kun lhan cig thos pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-8: 'di ni yang dag par ni rdzogs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-9: mig gis bar du chod pa'i gzugs mi mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-10: kha dang sna yang de dang mtshungs pa nyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-11: lus kyis reg na da gdod shes par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-12: sems dang dran pa mi rtag nges gzung med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-13: ra bas chod pa'i sgra la nyan pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-14: nye dang ring ba kun kyang thos pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-15: dbang lnga'i 'jug pa mi mnyam la brten na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-16: 'di ni yang dag par na rdzogs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-17: sgra dbyangs rang bzhin g-yo dang mi g-yo ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-18: mnyan pa'i lam du yod dang med pas phye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-19: sgra med ni na thos pa med ces bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-20: thos pa'i rang bzhin gtan nas med pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-21: sgra med pas ni 'gag par mi 'gyur la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-22: sgra yod pas ni skye bar yang mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-23: skye 'gag gdod nas bral ba nyid kyi phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-24: 'di ni yang dag par na rtag pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-25: rmi lam rmis pa'i yul gyi snang ba yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-26: ma bsam par ni med pa yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:501b-27: rig cing sgom pa sems kyi rtogs las 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-1: kyis phyin par nus ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-2: da lta mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'dir ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-3: sgra yi brjod pa la brten gsal bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-4: 'gro kun thos pa'i rang bzhin la rmongs pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-5: sgra rjes 'brang bas kun tu 'khyams shing 'khor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-6: kun dga' bo khyod ji ltar blo ldan yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-7: log rtog dra ba'i 'ching ba las mi 'gro la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-8: 'di ni yul rjes 'brang bas bying min nam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-9: nad du bsdus pas bden pa'i don mthong 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-10: kun dga' bo khyod da lta legs par nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-11: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi byin mthus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-12: 'jig pa med par rdo rje'i rgyal po dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-13: sgyu ma lta bu smra bsam yul las 'das //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-14: bder gshegs yum grur yang dag ting nge 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-15: khyod kyis rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-16: gsang ba zab mo'i sgo kun thos na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-17: 'dod pa'i zag pa sngon du ma bsal na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-18: mang du thos pa 'khrul pa skyed pa'i rgyu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-19: thos pas sangs rgyas la ni mngon zhan nas //
