K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-20: nang du thos pa'i rang bzhin cis mi sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-21: thos pa rang gi ngang gis skyes ba min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-22: sgra la brten nas ming du grub pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-23: thos pa nang la gzhol bas sgra las grol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-24: gang dag grol bar nus de su la brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-25: dbang po gcig nyid gdong ma'i gzhir gzhol na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502a-26: drug po dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-0: @502b shes dang thos pa sgyu ma rab rib 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-1: srid gsum nam mkha'i me tog dag dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-2: thos pa nang gzhol rab rib rtsa ba sel //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-3: yul mi dmigs na gsal rig rdzogs par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-4: gsal mthar thug na kun tu khyab par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-5: zhi ba gsal na mkha' yang nang du chud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-6: slar yang 'jig rten dag la bltas pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-7: rmi lam gyi ni bya byed dag dang mtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-8: ma tanggi mo yang nyid rmi lam 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-9: su zhig khyod nyid la ni 'gog par nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-10: dper na 'jig rten gyi ni sgyu ma mkhan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-11: sgyu mas skyes ba bud med sprul byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-12: ji ltar dbang po so sor g-yo mthong yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-13: gnad 'gag gcig gi 'phrul la brten pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-14: 'phrul 'gag zhig ma thag tu mi g-yo pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-15: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-16: dbang po drug kyang de dag nyid dang rmtshungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-17: gdod nas gsal rig gcig nyid la brten nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-18: 'phrad dang ltos pa drug gi cha ru 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-19: yul gcig zad nas nang du gzhol gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-20: longs spyod drug pa 'grub par 'gyur ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-21: yul gyi dri ma 'dod rgur zad gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-22: rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig 'grub par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-23: dmigs pa'i lhag ma yod na slob pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-24: gsal rig mthar thug gyur na sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:502b-25: dge 'dun 'dus pa dang bcas kun dga' bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-1: 'jug pa nang du gzhol gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-2: thos pa'i rang bzhin la ni mnyan par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-3: rang bzhin mngon gyur bla na med pa'i lam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-4: mngon par byang chub nges par de dang mtshungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-5: 'di ni rdul snyed de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-6: bgrod pa gcig pa mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-7: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-8: sgro 'di nyid nas byang chub grub pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-9: da lta bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-10: so so nas ni gsal rig nyid la 'jug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-11: ma 'ongs skye bo lam la slob pa rnams; ;chos 'di nyid la brten nas brtson par rigs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-12: bdag kyang tshul 'di nyid kyis rtogs pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang gcig pu ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yis bdag la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-15: lam la bkri ba'i thabs mkhas thams cad kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-16: dus mtha'i sems can skyob tshul dris par mdzad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-17: 'jig rten las ni thar par brtson pa rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-18: mya ngan 'das sems sgrub par byed pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-19: spyan ras gzigs kyi tshul 'di mchog ces bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-20: lam la bkri ba'i thabs mkhas 'di las gzhan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-21: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi byin mthur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-22: brten nas yul dang kun nyon spang ba tsam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503a-23: rtag tu slob pa'i thun mong lam ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-0: zab dang mi zab mnyam par @503b 'jug pa min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-2: zag pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-3: ma 'ongs skye bo dag la byin brlabs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-4: sgo 'dir the tshom med par mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-5: thabs mkhas 'di yis bde blag 'grub pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-6: kun dga' bo yi blo dang shin tu 'tsham //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-7: tha ma'i dus su bying ba'i sems can rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-8: dbang po gcig pu 'di la rab sbyangs na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-9: mngon byang chub 'di gzhan las khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-10: yang dag pa yi sems ni 'di bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-11: de nas kun dga' bo dang bcas pa 'khor 'dus pa thams cad lus sems shin tu gsal bar gyur te rgyas par bstan pa rnam par rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la blta ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-13: skye bo 'ga' zhig dgos pa'i phyir thag ring por song ste phyir ldog par ma nus kyang rang yul du 'gro ba'i lam gsal bar shes pa ltar der 'dus pa'i skye bo thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-17: theg pa 'bring la brtson pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:503b-18: yang sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa gangg'a'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed thams cad la so sor rtsa ba'i sems rdul gyi dri ma dang bral te chos kyi mig shin tu gsal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-0: rigs sad pa'i dge slong mas tshigs su bcad pa thos nas dgra bcom par gyur @504a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-2: grangs med pa'i sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i yang bla na med pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-3: kun dga' bos gos chags bcos te 'dus pa thams cad kyi nang nas thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas sems dang yod shin tu dang bar gyur te dga' ba dang skyo ba lhan cig tu skyes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-4: ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo thams cad la phan pa'i slad du slar yang phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-5: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-6: bdag gis da lta sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i tshul rtogs nas 'di brtson pa na slad nas yid gnyis za ba dang nem nur med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-7: rgyun du de bzhin gshegs pa las thos pa la rang nyid ched du grol ba don du mi gnyer bar thog mar gzhan dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa'i tshul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-9: rang nyid kyis khong du chud cing gzhan khong du chud du 'jug pa de de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa'i mdzad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504a-11: bdag grol bar ma gyur kyang snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can dgrol bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-0: 'di @504b lta bu'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas dang ma 'phrad nas rim gyis rgyang ring du gyur te mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad pa'i tshul gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur pa las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-1: de dag gi sems bsdus nas ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya snyam na ji ltar de dag la chos kyi chogs gtan la phab nas bdud kyi las thams cad rgyang ring du bsrings shing gdod byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog cing mi gol bar byed nus zhes gsol pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du kun dga' bo la bsngags pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-3: khyod chos kyi tshogs gtan la phab nas snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can thams cad 'dam du bying pa lta bu rnams grol zhing skyong ba'i tshul dris pa legs so legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-8: 'dus pa thams cad gus pas bka'i rjes su bstan pa nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-10: khyod kyis ngas gdungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nan tan du bya ba rnam pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i don ma thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-11: sems bsdu ba la tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:504b-12: tshul khrims las ting nge 'dzin skye zhing ting nge 'dzin las shes rab skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-0: zhes bya ba 'di nyid zag pa med pa'i @505a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-1: bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-3: ngas sems bsdu ba la tshul khrims zhes btags pa de ci yin zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-4: gal te 'jig rten khams kyi rigs drug gi sems can de dag thams cad 'dod pa la mi chag na skye shi gnyis res mos su rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dbang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-5: khyod ting nge 'dzin la sbyong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-6: nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-7: log par g-yem pa'i sems ma bsal na yul dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-8: ji ltar shes rab che zhing ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur na yang log par g-yem pa ma spangs na nges par bdud kyi ris su ltung bas rab bdud kyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-11: de dag la yang bdud kyi slob ma yod cing so so nas rang nyid bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-13: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes chos kyi snyigs ma'i dus su bdud 'di dag 'jig rten du 'ur zhing dar nas ches cher zhen pas log par g-yem pa byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505a-14: rang nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes sgrog cing sems can thams cad 'dod chags kyi lta ba'i dong du ltung bar byas te byang chub kyi lam stor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-0: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag la ting @505b nge 'dzin sbyong zhing slob tu 'jug pa na thog mar sems kyis log par g-yem pa chod cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-1: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-4: rnam par dag pa rmad du byung ba'i bslab pa dang po zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-6: de'i phyir gal te log par g-yem pa ma spangs par ting nge 'dzin la spyod snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-8: bye ma dang rngo bza' bar bya ba'i phyir 'tshed pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-9: bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du 'tshed kyang bye ma 'tshir zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-11: 'di nyid bzhin sa bza' ba'i nyer rgyu ma yin zhing thog ma nas bye ma dang rdo btsos pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-12: khyod kyis log par g-yem bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dam pa tshol bar bya snyam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-13: ji ltar de kho na nyid rtogs na yang thams cad log g-yem gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-14: log g-yem rtsa bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-15: ngan song gsum du 'khor nas thar par mi nus pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i myang 'das su bgrod pa'i lam gang gis gsal bar nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:505b-17: nges par log g-yem gyi kun slong lus sems kyis thams cad du spangs shing spangs pa'i rang bzhin yang med par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-0: gdod sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang tshol zhing @506a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-1: don du gnyer bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-3: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-4: gal te 'di las gzhan du 'chang na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-5: bdud kyis smras pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-6: gzhan yang 'jig rten khams kyi rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la srog gcod med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-7: skye shi gnyis res mos su rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dbang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-8: khyod ting nge 'dzin la sbyong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-9: nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-12: ji ltar shes rab che zhing ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur na yang srog gcod ma spangs na nges par mi ma yin gtum po'i rigs su ltung bas skye bo rnams 'dre mthu che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-13: 'bring mkha' la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin gyi bdag por 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-14: tha ma sa la rgyu ba'i srin por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-15: lha 'dre de dag la yang slob ma yod cing so so nas bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-17: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes chos kyi snyigs ma'i dus su lha 'di dag 'jig rten du 'ur zhing dar nas de dag gis sha zos pas byang chub kyi go 'phang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506a-20: ngas dge slong rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sha lnga za bar gnang ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-0: sha 'di dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul @506b gyis bskyed pa yin gyi srog dang 'brel ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-1: khyed cag bram ze'i gnas drod gsher dang ldan pa'i steng du rdo ba dang bye ma dang bcas pos rtsva dang lo ma mi skye bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-2: ngas snying rje chen po dang rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs nas 'di lta bu'i byams snying rje chen pos rdzun pa'i sha zhes ming du btags nas khyed cag gis ro myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sems can gyi sha za bzhin du ji ltar sh'akya'i sras zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-4: khyed cag shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-5: skye bo sha za ba 'di dag blo sad nas bsam gtan thob pa ltar gyur na yang de dag thams cad srin por gyur nas las kyi 'bras bu rdzogs te nges par skye 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ma yin pa'i skye bo 'di dag phan tshun gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-7: za pa dag rgyun mi 'chad pa la 'di dag khams gsum las ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur; khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag ting nge 'dzin la slob tu 'jug pa na gzhan gsod pa'i rgyun chod cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:506b-8: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag pa'i rnam par dag pa rmad du byung ba'i bslab pa gnyis pa zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-0: de'i phyir srog gcod pa rgyun mi gcod par ting nge @507a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-3: skye bo 'ga' zhig rang gi lag pas rna ba bkab nas rang gi skad chen pos bos pa gzhan gyis thos par mi 'gyur snyam du sems pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-4: 'di bzhin du 'chad pa las phyir zhing gsal bar gyur pa yod ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-5: dge slong rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-6: yang byang chub sems dpa' dag lam du 'gro pa na rtsva sngon po brdzi bar yang mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-7: lag pas gcad pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-8: snying rje chen po can gyi skye bo dag gis sems can gyi sha khrag ji ltar za bar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-9: gal te dge slong dag shar phyogs kyi srin bal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-11: phyogs 'di'i ko lpags kyi lha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-16: zhun mar la sogs pa'i bar bgo bar mi byed cing bza' bar mi phyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-17: dge slong 'di lta bu 'jig rten las nges par grol nas sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu rdzogs par smin nas khams gsum du 'khor bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-19: de dag gi lus las byung ba dag longs spyad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-20: de dag dang las kyi 'brel ba can du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-21: da lta'i skye bo dag kyang sa las skyes pa'i 'bru rigs pa rgya dag zos pas rkang mthil sa la mi reg par ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507a-22: gdon mi za bar rang gi lus sems kyis sems can gyi lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-0: lus @507b las skyes pa'i dngos po bgo bar mi byed cing bza' bar mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-1: ngas skye bo de nges par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-4: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-6: bdud kyis smras pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad de dag gi sems ma byin len gyi dbang du ma song na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-9: skye shi gnyis res mos ma rgyun mi 'chad pa'i dbang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-10: khyod ting nge 'dzin la sbyong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-11: nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-12: ma byin len gyi sems ma bsal na yul dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-13: ji ltar shes rab che zhing ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur kyang ma byin len ma spangs na nges par phyin ci log tu ltung bas rab rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-16: tha ma 'byung pos brlams pa'i skye bo dman par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-17: log par spyod pa de dag la yang slob ma yod cing so so nas rang nyid bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:507b-19: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes chos kyi snyigs ma'i dus su gdon log par spyod pa dag 'jig rten du 'ur zhing dar nas g-yo thabs nang du sbed cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bur brdzus te rang nyid ring mo zhig nas mi'i chos bla ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-1: skye bo phal pa rnams bslus te de dag yid ches shing dran pa rmongs su bcug nas gang du sleb pa'i yul gyi khyim pa'i skye bo dag brlag cing 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-2: ngas dge slong rnams la ljongs rgyu zhing bsod snyoms spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-3: de dag la ched du zhen pa spong zhing byang chub kyi lam bsgrub pa'i don du yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-4: dge slong de dag rang nyid zas kyi g-yos mi byed par srog gi lhag ma 'tsho ba'i phyir du yin zhing srid pa gsum gyi mgron khang rnams su 'gro ba dang 'ong ba lan gcig byas shing song nas phyir mi ldog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-5: 'di la skye bo rkun po dag rdzun gyis nga'i gos dur smig gyon te de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas rnyed pa don du gnyer te sdig pa sna tshogs pa byed bzhin du thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba nyid mi dgos zhes smra zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong dag theg pa dman pa'o; ;zhes smad pa 'di ci zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-6: tshul 'dis sems can grangs med pa dag 'khrul du bcug nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508a-7: gal te nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su dge slong gang dag sems bskyed nas nges par ting nge 'dzin la sbyong ba dag yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lus @508b la mar me gcig 'jugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-1: sor mo'i tshigs gcig sbar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-2: yang na lus la spos 'bru gcig gis bsreg par nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-3: ngas de la skye ba thog ma med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu dus gcig tu zad nas 'jig rten las ring du gyur te zag pa thams cad dang gtan du 'bral bar 'gyur ro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-5: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'phral du mngon du ma gyur kyang skye bo de'i sems chos las ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-6: gal te 'di lta bu'i lus gtong ba'i rgyu cung zad la ma 'bad na zhi ba thob kyang nges par mi'i skye ba blangs nas skye ba snga ma'i las kyi 'bras bu myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-7: ngas sngar rta'i chag zos pa dang 'dra bar shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-8: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi skye bo dag ting nge 'dzin la sbyong zhing slob tu 'jug pa na thog mar ma byin par len pa spongs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-9: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag pa'i rnam par dag pa rmad du byung ba'i bslab pa gsum pa zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-11: de'i phyir gal te ma byin par len pa ma spangs par ting nge 'dzin sbyong bar 'dod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-13: skye bo 'ga' zhig pug pa brdol ba'i bum par chu blug pa dang 'dra ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-14: de 'geng bar 'dod na bskal pa rdul snyed kyi bar du yang 'geng bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:508b-15: gal te dge slong gang dag snam sbyor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-0: @509a *// dang lhung bzed ma gtogs pa'i yo byad khru dang sor du longs pa tsam yang mi 'chang bar bsod snyoms kyi lhag ma sems can bkres pa rnams la sbyin pa btang zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-1: dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs su thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-2: rang la brdeg pa dang spyos pa dag yod na bsngags pa dang 'dra bar sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-3: gdon mi za bar lus sems yal bar dor nas lus kyi sha khrag rus pa sems can la gtad zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po'i dgongs pa'i don gtso bor bshad nas las dang po la lam las gol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi byed pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag 'di lta bu dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-5: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-8: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-10: bdud kyis smras pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-12: da lta 'jig rten gyi rigs drug gi sems can thams cad kyis srog mi gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-13: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-14: log par g-yem pa mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-15: spyod pa 'di gsum spyod nus na yang gal te rdzun chen po smras na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509a-16: ting nge 'dzin dag par byed mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-0: 'di la 'dod pa'i lta ba can gyi bdud du gyur nas @509b de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs stor ba'i phyir des ma thob pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-4: yang 'jig rten gyi rnyed bkur don du gnyer bas skye bo rnams kyi mdun du 'di ltar smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-5: bdag da lta rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-6: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-7: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-8: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-9: rang rgyal gyi theg pa pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-11: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-12: zhes smras nas thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-13: thal mo sbyor ba la re zhing mchod pa la zhen par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-14: skye bo 'di ngan pa tha chad sangs rgyas kyi kyi go 'phang rlag par byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-16: skye bo 'ga' zhig gis shing ta la ral gris gcod pa ltar skye bo de dge rtsa chad nas shes pa dang nus pa med pa'i sdug bsngal gsum rgya mtshor phyir nas ji ltar gyur kyang mnyam par 'jog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-17: ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-18: zhes sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:509b-19: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-0: dgra bcom pa rnams gdul bya de dag dang 'tsham pa'i lus kyis chos kyi snyigs ma'i dus su skye ba blangs te sna tshogs pa'i @510a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-1: gzugs su sprul te 'khor bar 'khor ba rnams grol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-4: blon po chen po'i rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-6: sna chen po la gtogs pa'i rigs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-7: bu dang bu mo yang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-10: gang dag 'khrig pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-11: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-13: tshong pa dag gi gzugs su sprul nas de dag dang lhan cig tu mthun par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod nas de dag gi lus sems ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bar byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-14: ci nas kyang rang nyid nges par byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-15: nges par dgra bcom pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-16: zhes sangs rgyas kyi gsung zab mo sgrog cing las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du ci bder smra bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-17: che 'pho ba na lkog tu tshul de kha chem gyi tshul du bsnyad par byed pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-19: 'di lta bu dag ni; sems can thams cad rmongs su bcug nas spyod pa 'khrug pa'i rdzun chen po smra bar ci zhig 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510a-20: khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi skye bo ting nge 'dzin la sbyong zhing slob tu 'jug pa na thog mar rdzun chen po smra ba spongs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-0: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag pa'i rnam par dag pa rmad du byung @510b ba'i bslab pa bzhi pa zhes gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-2: de'i phyir gal te rdzun chen po smra ba ma spangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-4: mi'i phyi sa la tsandan ltar bcos pa la dri bzang gtan nas 'byung mi srid ba dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-5: ngas dge slong rnams la yang dag pa'i sems kyis tshogs kyi nang du gdams pa na bslab pa rnam pa bzhi nas brtsams te bya ba dang spyod pa gang la yang rdzun dang g-yo sgyu bya mi rung zhes bka' stsal pa bzhin du dang nyid ma'i chos bla ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-6: zhes spyoms na ji ltar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-8: mi dbul pos rang nyid rgyal po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-10: gsod pa'i nyes pa la thug cing thar par mi nus na chos kyi rgyal po ltar brdzus shing 'chos par ji ltar rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-11: brten pa'i gnas yang dag pa ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-13: 'dis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la re na skye bo 'ga' zhig rang gi lte ba la so 'debs pa dang 'dra bar de ltar su zhig nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-14: gal te dge slong rnams sems gzhu rgyud ltar drang por gyur cing rnam pa thams cad du bden pa'i tshul la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-15: nam du yang bdud kyi las mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:510b-16: ngas skye ba de la byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-1: rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-3: bdud kyis smras pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-6: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo; bam po bdun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-8: khyod kyis sems bsdu ba'i tshul dris pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-9: ngas khyod la thog mar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgo dam pa la brtson pas sbyangs te byang chub sems dpa'i lam tshol bar 'dod na nges par thog ma nyid bslab pa 'di bzhi ji ltar 'khyags pa dang ba mo ltar dri ma med par srungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-10: 'di ltar na nyes spyod kyi yan lag sna tshogs pa dag rang nyid 'phel zhing skye bar mi 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-12: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi gang gi rjes su skye bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-14: bsdam par bya ba rnam pa 'di bzhi gal te ma btang na sems gzugs dri ro reg bya rnams dang 'bral ba med pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-15: las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs gang las skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511a-16: gal te sngon gyi bag chags sel bar ma nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-0: khyod skye bo de la rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis nga'i gtsug tor gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gyi bla na med pa'i rig @511b sngags zlos su chug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gcug tor bltar mi mngon pa las dngos po med pa'i chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid mngon par byung ste rin po che'i padma'i gdan la bzhugs nas snying po'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-2: re zhig da lta khyod skye ba sngan mar bu mo ma tingga dang bskal pa mang por 'brel bas 'dod cing gces pas sngon gyi bag chags bskal pa gcig nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-3: tshe rabs gcig nyid ma yin pa la ngas lan gcig gsungs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems rnam par dag nas dgra bcom par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-4: de yang 'dod chags can gyi bud med yin zhing slob cing sbyong ba'i sems med pa la rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus mi mngon par byin gyis brlabs pas myur du mi slob par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-5: khyed cag nyan thos rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po don du gnyer na sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-7: rdul rlung gi rdzi phyogs dang mthun par 'phyar ba ltar dka' ba'i gnas ci zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-8: gal te chos kyi snyigs ma'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la 'jug par 'dod pa dag yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-9: des thog mar dge slong gi sdom pa rnam par dag pa bsrung dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:511b-10: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar sdom pa rnam dag dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong mchog slob dpon du bsten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-0: gal te sdom pa rnam par dag pa dang ma 'phrad na de dag gi @512a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-1: tshul khrims kyi brtul zhugs ji ltar yang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-2: sdom pa blangs pa'i rjes su gos gsar pa gyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-4: lus sems dben par 'dug ste sems 'dis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i rjes su gzhi bcas nas dkyil 'khor bzhengs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer spros te de'i spyi gtsug tu phog par bsgom mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-6: snyigs ma'i dus der sdom pa rnam dag dang ldan pa'i dge slong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-8: khyim bdag gos dkar po can dag 'dod chags kyi sems bsal zhing sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam btab cing nang du 'jug pa dang phyir 'gro ba thams cad la khrus byas te dus drug tu bsgoms nas 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis mi nyal bar zhag bdun phrag gsum du bsgrubs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-9: nga de'i mdun du 'ong zhing zhal dngos su bstan te spyi bor phyag bzhag nas dbugs dbyung zhing de'i blo rgyas par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512a-10: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-0: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i thugs rje'i bka' drin las blo phye ste lam @512b bsgoms nas mi slob pa'i go 'phang 'grub pa'i tshul rang nyid mi 'khrul bar shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-1: chos kyi snyigs ma'i dus su sgom pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-2: gzhi ji ltar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa dang mthun pa'i cho ga rnam par dag pa ji ltar sgrub ces gsol pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-5: gal te snyigs ma'i dus kyi skye bos dkyil 'khor bzhengs par 'dod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-6: thog mar gangs kyi ri'i nye 'dabs su gnas pa'i ba dkar mo stobs dang ldan pa tshol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-7: 'dis ri las skyes pa'i rtsva snum zhing bzang ba zos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-8: gangs ri'i chu gtsang ma 'thungs pas de'i lci ba gtsang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-9: lci ba de blangs te tsandan dang bsres nas sa la byug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-10: gangs kyi phyugs ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-11: de'i lci ba dri ngan zhing mi gtsang bas sa la byug tu mi rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-13: thang bde ba nas sa la khru lnga tsam brkos te 'og gi sa ser po blangs nas tsandan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-20: spos bya lce can te rnam pa de bcu po phye mar btags nas 'jim pa dang bsres la dkyil 'khor gyi sa la byugs te tha dkar khru bcu gsum zur brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:512b-24: shing las byas pa'i padma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-0: de'i steng du lhung bzed bzhag ste lhung bzed kyi @513a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-1: nang du ston zla 'bring po'i zil ba'i chu blugs nas ji ltar rnyed cing 'os pa'i lo ma dang bcas pa'i me tog gzugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-2: yang me long zlum po brgyad rang rang gi gnas su bzhag ste me tog dang ldan pa'i lhung bzed la bskor bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-3: me long gi mthar me tog padma bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-4: spos phor bcu drug spel te gzhag par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-5: spos phor gyi nang du aa ga ru 'ba' gzhig bsreg cing me lce mi 'bar bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-6: ba dkar mo'i 'o ma snod bcu drug tu blug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-8: ka ra btab pa'i snum 'khur dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-10: dug dang ma 'dres pa'i sman spos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-11: sprang rtsis spags pa'i sga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-13: sbrang rtsi rnams cha bcu drug tu byas te me tog gi mthar bskor te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la mchod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-14: nyin gung dang mtshan gung gi dus su sbrang rtsi bre byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-15: mar khyor ba gsum sta gon byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du spos phor chung ngu gzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-16: dri zhim po'i dur ba'i me la chu skol te khrus gsol nas me de gtsang ma byas te mar dang sprang rtsi bsregs pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513a-17: phyi'i phyogs bzhir ba dang me tog gi phyang phrul bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i nang gi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa @513b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku brnyan bzhugs su gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-2: dbus su rnam par snang mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-7: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa spyan ras gzigs la sogs pa'i sku brnyan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-8: g-yas g-yon du byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po sogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-16: log 'dren rnams sgo'i g-yas g-yon dus brengs te dgod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-17: yang me long brgyad steng nas 'od tu phyogs par btags te dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi me long dang thad kar 'od phan tshun du phog par byas te gzugs brnyan dag brtsegs mar 'char du bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-18: zhag bdun phrag dang po la rtse gcig tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-19: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-20: dgra bcom pa rnams kyis mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal nas dus drug drug tu sngags bzla zhing bskor ba byed la sems rtse gcig pas chos spyod bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-21: dus re rer yang rgyun ma chad par lan brgya rtsa brgyad re bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-22: zhag bdun phrag gnyis par sems rtse gcig pas byang chub sems dpa'i smon pa'i sems rgyun ma chad par bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:513b-23: smon sems kyi bslab bya ngas sngar 'dul ba'i sde snod las gsal bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-1: gsum pa la dus bcu gnyis su rgyun gcig gis gdugs dkar po can gyi sngags bzla bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-2: zhag bdun pa la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dus gcig tu mngon sum du byon te me long gi 'od zer phog pa der phyag spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-3: 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma'i dus bee d'urya ltar dag par byed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-5: gal te dge slong gi sdom pa blangs pa'i mkhan po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-6: 'dus pa'i tshogs dge slong bcu'i nang nas tshul khrims ma dag pa gcig yod na 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa phal cher 'grub par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-7: zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi rjes su drang zhing mi g-yo bar 'dug ste zhag brgya song ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-8: dbang po rnon po'i rigs yin na stan dang ma bral bar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-9: des lus sems khyad par du 'phags pa'i go 'phang ma thob kyang sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang thob la mi bslu bas yid gnyis ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-10: khyod kyis dris pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i tshul ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514a-12: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba bdag rab tu byung ba tshun chad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gces par bskyangs pas mang du thos pa la 'bad pa las chos nyid 'dus ma byas mngon du byed ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-0: tshangs pa'i @514b gdams ngag phyin log gi 'ching ba dang 'phrad nas sems kyis gsal bar shes kyang rang rang deb na du ma gyur pas 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'phrad pa las bdag rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i rig sngags kyis mi mngon par bskyab par mdzad kyang dngos po ma thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-2: brtse ba chen pos slar yang gsal bar gsungs nas 'dus pa 'di'i slob pa thams cad skyong zhing skyob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-3: yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'khor ba'i skye bo phal pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gsang bas lus sems rnam par grol ba thob par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-4: de'i tshe 'dus pa thams cad so so nas phyag 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba zab mo mnyan pa don du gnyer zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas rin po che'i 'od zer brgya phrag steng du 'phro zhing 'od zer gyi nang nas rin po che'i padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa gsal bar byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rin po che'i padma de la bzhugs nas gtsug tor nas rin po che'i 'od zer brgya phrag bcu 'phros shing 'od zer de dag la gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcu'i gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dngos su bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:514b-6: ri bo 'des shing rdo rje bsnams pa nam mkha'i bar du khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-0: thams cad nam mkha' la bltas te skrag pa @515a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-1: dang dga' ba'i sems lhan cig tu skyabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes tshol zhing rtse gzig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig stsol pa la mnyan cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-2: gtsug tor bltar mi mngon pa'i mtshan gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-3: na mo smi t'a ta su ga t'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-4: aarha te sa mya ksam buddh'a shya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-5: si t'a ta buddha ko ti aushni sham/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-6: nam ssarba buddha boddhi satve bhya: na ma sspat'a nam sa mya ksam buddha ko t'i n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-7: sa shra wa ka sam gh'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-8: na ma: lo ke aarta t'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-9: na ma: sro t'a pann'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-10: na massa kri ta g'a m'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-11: na mo lo ke samyagga t'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-13: na mo de wa ri sh'i n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-14: na ma ssiddhi bingya dha ra n'i sh'a n'ram/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-15: sha p'a nu gra ha sa hi sra m'a th'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-18: na mo bha ga wa te ru tr'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-19: au ma pa ti sa hi y'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-20: na mo bha ga wa te n'a ra ya n'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-21: banytsa mah'a sa mu dra na ma skra t'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-22: na mo bha ga wa te mah'a k'a l'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-23: tri pu ra na gar bi dra wa na ka r'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-24: aa dhi mukti shma sh'a na ni w'a sa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-25: m'a tra ga na na ma skri t'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-26: na mo bha ga wa te ta th'a ga ta ku l'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-27: na mo padma ku l'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-28: na mo badzra ku l'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-29: na mo ma ni ku la ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-30: na mo ga dza ku la ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-31: na mo bha ga wa te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-33: pra ha ra na r'a dz'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515a-35: na mo bha ga wa te na mo aa mi ta bh'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-0: @515b aarta ta sa mya ksam buddh'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-1: na mo bha ga wa te aaksho bhya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-3: aarha te samya ksam buddh'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-4: na mo bha ga wa te bhee sha dzye gu ru bee d'urya pra bh'a r'a dz'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-6: na mo bha ga wa te sam bushpe ta sa lendra r'a dz'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-8: aarta te samya ksam buddh'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-9: na mo bha ga wa te sh'a kya mu na ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-12: na mo bha ga wa te ratna ke tu r'a dz'a ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-15: te bhyo na ma skri tva: ai dam bha ga wa to si /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-16: ta th'a ga to shn'i sham/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-18: n'a ma aa pa ra dzi ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-19: pra tyam gi ra: sarba bhu ta gra ha ni gra ha ka gra ha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-20: pa ra bitya tstshe da ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-21: aa ka la mrityu pa ri tra ya ni ka rim/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-23: sarba dushta dussv'a pna ni wa ra ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-24: tsa tu ra sh'i t'i n'am gra ha gra ha sr'a n'anytsa bidhvins'a na ka rim/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-25: aashta bim sha t'i n'a naksha tr'a nytsa pra sa dha na ka rim/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-26: aasht'a n'am ma h'a gra h'a n'am dzrvam bi dhva ns'a na ka rim/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-27: sarba sha tru ni wa ra shtsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-28: gho ra du spha n'anytsa n'a sha ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-29: bi sha sha sta aagni au de ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-31: aa pa ra dzi ta gho ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-35: mah'a ba la panta ra w'a si n'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-36: a'arya t'a r'a bhri ku ti shtse wa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-38: badzra ma li ti bi shru ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-39: padmam ka badzra dzi hna tsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-40: m'a la tse w'a pa ra dzi ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-41: badzra tsinti bi sha ra tsa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-42: shanta sha bee de wa p'u dza ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-43: soo mya r'u pa mah'a shve ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-44: a'arya t'a ra mah'a b'a la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-46: badzra shri kha le shtse wa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:515b-47: badzra koo ma ri ku landha ri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-3: bee ro tsa na ku la ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-6: badzra k'a na ka pra bha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-7: lo [?] badzra tu nti ta shve tata /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-8: ka ma l'a kshi sha shi pra bha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-9: aadya di mu dra ga na su bi ra ksham tsa ku wantu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-11: aom ri shi ga na pra sha sta sarba ta th'a ga to shn'i sha h'um tr'um/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-14: pa ra bidya sambha ksha na k'a ri h'um tr'um/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-15: sarba yaksha raksha sa gra h'a n'am bi dhvans'a na k'a ri h'um tr'um/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-16: tsa tu ra shi t'i n'am gra ha sa ha sra' nam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-17: bi dhva s'a na k'a ri h'um tr'um/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-18: raksha bha ga wansa ta th'a ga to shn'i sham/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-19: pra gi ra: mah'a sa ha sra bhu dze /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-21: ti sa ha sra ne tri /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-22: aa bhe de dzva li tattam ke /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-24: tri bhu wa na manta la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-26: ma ma ai tvanma ma sya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-30: au da ka bha ya bi sha bha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-32: pa ra tsa ka bha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-35: aa ka la mri tyu bha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-36: dha ra ni bhu mi kampa ka pa da bha ya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-37: au lka p'a da bha ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-49: ka ta p'u ta na gra ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-58: ru dhi ra ha ri n+ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516a-63: ji bi ta ha ri n+ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-2: aa shu tsya ha ri n+ya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-4: te sh'am sarbe sh'um sarba gra h'a n'am/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-6: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-7: pa ri pra dza ka kri tam bi dhyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-8: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-9: d'am ki ni kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-10: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-11: mah'a pa shu pa ti ya ru dra kri tam bidhyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-12: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-13: n'a ra ya na kri tam bidhyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-14: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-15: ta tva ga ru ta si kri tam bidyam; ;tstshe da y'a mi ki la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-16: mah'a k'a la ma tri ga na kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-17: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-18: ka p'a li ka kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-19: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-20: dza ya ka ra ma dhu ka ra sarba aartha sa dha na kri tam bidhya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-21: tstsho da y'a me k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-22: tsa turbha gi n'i kri tam bi byam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-23: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-24: bhri gi ri ti nanda ke shvar ga na pa ti sa hi ya kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-25: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-26: nag shra ma na kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-27: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-29: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-30: tstshe bi ta r'a ga kri tam bidya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-31: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-32: badzra p'a ni guhya guhya k'a dhi ba ti kri tam bidyam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-33: tstshe da y'a mi k'i la y'a mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-37: si t'a ta pa tre na mo stu te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-38: aa s'it'a na l'a rka [?] spu ta bi ka si t'a ta ba tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-39: dzva la dzva la; da ra da ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-40: bi da ra bi da ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-42: h'um h'um phat phat phat phat phat sv'ah'a /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:516b-45: aa pra ti ha t'a phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-0: [?] phat/ aa su ra bi dra ba k'a r'a ya @517a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-1: phat; sarba de wa bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-5: sarba p'u ta ne bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-6: ka ta p'u ta ne bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-7: sarba du rlam ghi te bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-10: sarba aa pasma re bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-11: sarba shra wa na bhye: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-13: sarba ta ma da ke bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-14: sarba bidhya r'a dza dzva re bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-15: dza ya ka ra ma dhu ka ra sarba aarta sadha ke bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-17: tsa turbha gi n'i bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-18: badzra koo ma ri bidya r'a je bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-19: mah'a pra tyam tha gi re bhya: phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-20: badzra shram kha la phra tyam gi ri r'a dza ya phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-21: mah'a k'a l'a ya mah'a ma tri ga na na maskri t'a ya phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-30: k'a la ra tri ye phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-32: aa dhi mukti ka shma sha na w'a si ni ye phat/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517a-33: ye ke tsitsha tva sya ma ma aitvanma masya; dushta tsitta aa mi tra tsitta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-0: aunma da gra @517b ha; tstsha ya gra ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-2: d'a ka d'a ki n'i gra ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-6: ma tri nandi ka gra ha /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-10: ae ka hi ka dv'i ti yi ka tri t'i yi ka tsa tu rthi ka ni tya dzva ra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-12: batti ka betti ka shleshmi kasanni patti ka sarba dzra ra shtsa rakshyanti /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-13: mardha b'a te lu tsi kam aakshi ro gam mu kha ro gam gantha ro gam gra ha gra ram/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-25: p'a da shu lam; sva aangga pratyam ga shu lam/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-41: bhi ra ganda ra; aa ka la mrityu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-42: tree mbu ka tree la ta /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-49: mri shri bhya: te sh'i sarbe sh'am si t'a ta pa tre /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-52: ya baddva da sha yo dza na a'abhyanta re na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-53: bi bya bindham ka ro mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-54: te dzo ba ndhem ka ro mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:517b-55: pa ri bida bandham ka ro mi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor las byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba 'di gsang ba zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don las phyogs bcu'i de bzhi @518a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-2: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo; ;phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di bzung bas bdud thams cad bcom zhing mu stegs pa rnams btul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-3: phyogs bcu'i da bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di la brten nas rin po che'i padma la bzhugs bzhin du rdul snyed kyi zhing khams thams cad du don mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-4: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di bzung bas rdul snyed kyi zhing khams su chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-5: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di bcangs pas phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi spyi bor phyag bzhag nas lung ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-6: sems can de dag rang nyid go 'phang ma thob byang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa las lung bstan thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-7: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di la brten nas sa phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams sdug bsngal las grol zhing skyong bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518a-14: mi sdug pa dang 'phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-1: 'dod pa btsal gyis mi rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-2: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i sdug bsngal la sogs chags che ba dang nyam nga ba thams cad las dus gcig tu 'grol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-5: rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-7: rlung dang me dang chu'i 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-8: bkres skom dang dbul 'phongs la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-9: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di'i rjes su 'brangs pas phyogs bcu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhis bnyen bkur yid bzhin du sgrub nus shing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su chos kyi rgyal po'i sras kyi thu bo zhes bsngags par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-10: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di spyad pas 'brel pa can la byin gyis brlabs pa dang theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dag gsang ba zab mo'i mdzod thos pas 'jigs pa dang bral bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:518b-11: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di bzlas pas bla na med pa'i byang chub grub pa dang byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-1: bzhin gshegs pa rnams snying po'i sngags 'di spel bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-2: 'dul khrims dam zhing rnam par dag pa srung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-3: gal te nges de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gyi sngags 'di'i phan yon rtag tu nyin thog thag skad rgyun mi 'chad par tshigs ma zlos par tshul 'di nyid kyis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du brjod kyang zad par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-4: 'di'i ming la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor zhes kyang bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-5: khyed cag slob pa rnams 'khor ba las ma grol bas sems bskyed de zhe thag pa nas dgra bcom par 'gyur bar bya snyam na spags 'di ma bzlas par chog byas nas lus dang sems kyi bdud kyi las thams cad las rgyang bsring bar 'dod pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul so so'i sems can thams cad rang gi yul du skyes pa'i gro ga'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519a-12: ras dkar po la sngags 'di bris te bzang po'i snod du bcug la mi de sems rmongs shing klog pa dang 'dzin par ma nus na lus la 'chang ngam khyim gyi nang du bris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-0: mi de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du @519b dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-2: ngas da lta khyod la slar yang bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-3: sngags 'dis 'jig rten bsrungs shing bskyabs nas 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar nus shing sems can thams cad la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab bskyed nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-4: gal te nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su snyigs ma'i dus kyi sems can thams cad rang nyid kyis klog pa dang gzhan la klog tu bcug na 'di ltar klog pa dang 'dzin pa'i skye bo de dag mes bsreg par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-6: dug chen po dang chung dus gnod par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-13: gnod sbyin dang; 'dre dag gi rig sngags kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-14: sems mnyam par bzhag pa thob pas ngan sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-24: sbrul la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyi dug gi rlangs pa skye bo de'i khar song na bdud rtsir 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:519b-25: gza' dang rgyu skar drag po rnams dang bcas pa lha 'dres thams cad kyis gnod par brtsams kyang skye bo de la tshugs par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-1: sogs pa dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad de'i bka' drin mnos te rtag tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-3: khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-4: rig sngag 'di rdo rje'i rigs gangg'a'i klung gi byem snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par gzungs kyi rjes su 'brangs nas srung bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-5: gal te sems can sems g-yengs shing 'khrugs nas sems ting nge 'dzin la mi gnas kyang sems kyis dran pa dang ngag gis bzlas na rdo rje'i rigs de dag rgyun du de'i rjes su 'brangs nas srung zhing skyob par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-6: de lta bu'i rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems brtan por gyur pa dag smos ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-7: rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po'i rgyal po 'di dag sems kyi rgyud byin gyis brlabs te myur du blo gros 'phel bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-8: skye bo de dus de nyid du bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyad khri bzhi stong gi las dren te thams cad gsal bar nus shing the tshom med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520a-9: thog ma'i bskal pa nas phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du skye ba thams cad du nam du yang gnod sbyin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-0: yi dvags la sogs pa'i @520b gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-3: 'du shes med pa'i gnas ngan par skye bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-4: rigs kyi bu gang dag 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-10: sna tshogs pas bkur zhing mchod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-11: bskal pa thams cad du dbul po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-13: bde bas phongs pa'i yul du skye bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-14: skye bo 'di dag rang nyid kyis dge ba'i bsam byas par yang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs pa'i dpal ji snyed pa skye bo de la stsal bas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa rnams su rtag par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi drung du skye zhing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-15: aa kra ku'i khyim ltar lhan cig tu 'brel nas nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-16: de'i phyir sdom pa nyams pa yang sdom pa rnams par dag par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-17: sdom pa ma thob pa yang sdom pa thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-18: brtson pa dang mi ldan pa yang brtson pa dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-19: shes rab dang mi ldan pa yang shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-20: mi gtsang ba yang myur du gtsang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:520b-21: shes rab ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-0: rigs kyi bu de dag sngags 'di bzlas shing 'dzin pa na gal te ma bzung ba'i skabs su sdom pa nyams na sngags @521a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-1: bzung phyin chad nas sdom pa nyams pa'i sdig pa lci yang thams cad gcig car du med par thams cad byang bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-2: chang 'thung ba dang sgog tsong sogs ro tsha ba'i tshod ma lnga zos pa dang mi gtsang ba'i zas sna tshogs pa zos kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-6: 'byung po dag gis de dag la skyon du mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-7: gal te mi gtsang ba'i gos hrul po gyon nas zhag gcig gnas pa dang dus gcig 'gro ba thams cad la rnam par dag pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-8: dkyil 'khor mi sgrub cho ga mi byed lam la di spyod na yang sngags 'di 'dzin zhing bzlas na dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang lam la spyod pa dang tha mi dad par phan yon 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-9: gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-11: dge slong ma rnams kyi spang bar bya ba rnam pa bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521a-12: rnam pa brgyad spyad na yang sngags 'di bzlas pas de lta bu'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba thams cad rlung drag pos bye ma'i phung po khyer ba bzhin du thams cad zad bar byas nas spu'i nyag ma tsam yang lus pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-0: sems can gang dag bskal pa dpag med grangs med pa nas byas pa'i sdig @521b sgrib lci yang thams cad tshe snga mar bshags pa ma byas kyang sngags 'di 'don pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-5: gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-7: nye 'khor la sogs pa dag tu bzhugs su gsol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-8: de lta bu'i sdig pa bsngags pa thams cad chu tshan gyis kha ba bzhu ba ltar dag par byas nas ring por mi thogs par skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-10: bud med gang bu dang bu mo ma skyes pa bu 'dod pa dag dad pas sngags 'di dran zhing bzlas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-11: yang na lus la gdugs dkar po can gyi sngags 'di 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-12: bzlas na khye'u dang bu mo tshe dang bsod nams dang blo dang ldan pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-13: dge ba'i 'bras bu smin par 'dod na myur du smin te lus dang srog dang mtha' thang yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-14: shi 'phos nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-15: mtha' 'khob kyi mir yang skye bar mi 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-16: shin tu dman pa'i skye gnas sna tshogs su mi skye ba smos ci dgos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:521b-21: grong rdal rnams su mu ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-0: yang na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs @522a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-3: 'thab rtsod la sogs pa gang dag 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-4: 'tshe ba byung ba'i gnas rnams su rig sngags 'di bris nas grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi'i sgo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-6: gtsug lag khang dang yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas yul khams der gnas pa'i skye bo dag mngon du phyogs te dad cing gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing sems rtse gcig pas mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-7: skye bo de dag rang rang gi lus la 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-8: yang na rang rang gi khyim du bzhugs su gsol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-9: mya ngan dang sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-11: gnas gang dang gang du sngags 'di bzhugs pa der sems can de dag la lha dang klu rab tu dga' nas rlung dang char dus dang mthun par 'byung zhing 'bru sna lnga 'phel nas skye bo mang po dag bde zhing skyid par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-12: yang skar ma drag po las ltas ngan pa phyogs phyogs su bstan pa rnams zhi bar byas nas gdon dang sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing sems can rnams la dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522a-15: lcags thag rnams de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur zhing nyin mtshan du bde bar gnyid log ste rmi lam ngan pa med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-0: kun @522b dga' bo; mi mjed kyi 'jig rten du ltas ngan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa'i skar ma ngan pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-1: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-2: de dag gi gtso bor gyur cing gza' chen po drag po brgyad rgyu skar de dag gi bdag por gyur te gzugs sna tshogs su sprul pa 'jig rten du mthong nas sems can la gdon dang ltas ngan pa sna tshogs gtor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-3: sngags 'di yod pa'i gnas su de dag thams cad zhi zhing dag nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun tshad du ltas ngan pa thams cad nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-4: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sngags 'di dngos su bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-5: ched du ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo las dang po pa nan tan gyis slob pa rnams bsrungs shing bskyabs nas ting nge 'dzin la zhugs shing lus sems mchog tu bde zhing brtan par 'gyur bas bdud dang lha 'dre yi dvags lha ma yin la sogs pa'i bar chad mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-6: yang thog ma med pa nas las kyi sha 'khon dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-8: skye ba snga ma'i lan chags yod pa rnams gnod pa byed du 'ong bar mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:522b-9: khyod la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa 'di'i slob pa'i skye bo nas ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob pa'i skye bo'i bar rnams kyis ngas bshad pa ltar dkyil 'khro la brten nas sdom pa 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-0: sdom pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge 'dun rnam par dag pa dang 'phrad @523a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-2: snying po'i sngags 'di la the tshom dang yid gnyis mi za na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-3: rigs kyi bu de pha ma las skyes pa'i lus de nyid kyis bden pa ma rtogs na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdzun gsungs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang 'khor 'dus pa'i nang gi rdo rje'i rigs brgya stong grangs med pa thams cad dus gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar bdag cag snying thag pa nas 'di ltar byang chub kyi lam sgom pa po rnams skyong zhing bsrung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-6: zhes smras pa'i rjes su de'i tshe tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-7: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-9: 'di ltar sgom zhing slob pa'i bsod nams byed pa dag yod na bdag cag gis snying thag pa nas skyong zhing bsrungs nas de la dus rtag tu gang byas pa'i las rnams bsam pa bzhin bsgrub par bgyi'o; ;yang grangs med pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523a-11: grul bum gyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-0: bgegs kyi rgyal po log @523b 'dren dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-1: bgegs kyi gtso bo de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-2: bdag cag kyang dam bcas te skye bo de skyong zhing bsrung ba dang byang chub kyi sems myur du rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-4: yang grangs med pa'i lha'i bu zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-10: glog gi bdag po la sogs pa lo la dbang zhing rgyu ba dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad so so nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-11: bdag cag kyang sgom pa po de skyong zhing srung ste cho ga bya ba'i gnas der 'jigs pa med par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-13: yang grangs med pa'i ri'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-16: chu dang skam dang mkha' la rgyu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-17: dngos po thams cad la gnas pa'i lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-19: gzugs med khams kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dus gcig tu phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:523b-20: bdag cag rnams kyis sgom pa po de skyong zhing srung ba dang byang chub sgrub pa'i tshe bdud kyi las mi 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-0: de'i tshe bye ba khrag khrig brgyad khri bzhi stong gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyal po rnams @524a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-1: 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-3: bdag cag la sogs pas tshogs bsags nas ring mo nas byang chub grub kyang mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rtag tu sngags 'di'i phyi bzhin 'brang nas snyigs ma'i dus su ting nge 'dzin la spyong zhing sgom pa pho dag la srung zhing skyob par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-5: 'di ltar sems bsdus nas ting nge 'dzin la brtson pa dag chog la gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-6: 'gro ba dang 'chag pa la sems g-yengs nas ljongs rnams su skyo bsangs la rgyu ba'i bar bdag cag gi slob 'khor rnams rgyun du skye bo de'i rjes su 'brang zhing skyong bar rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-7: bdud kyi rgyal po dga' rab dbang phyug gis glags tshol ba na nam du yang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la lha 'dre phra mo dag skye bo bsod nams can 'di las dpag tshad bcu'i pha rol tu 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524a-8: sems rtse gcig pas ting nge 'dzin la mos pa dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-0: de ltar bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis skye bo bsod nams can 'di la mtho brtsams pa na bdag gis rin po che rdo rjes de'i mgo la bsnun te mgo bo rdul @524b phran bzhin du rlag par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-1: lhag par skye bo 'di'i las kyi mtha' rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-3: de nas kun dga' bos stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-5: bdag cag blun zhing rtul ba'i phyir mang du thos pa la gzhol bas sems zag pa thams cad dang bral ba don du mi gnyer la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtse bas gdams pa'i bka' drin las yang dag pa'i lam la brtson pa thob nas lus sems la phan pa dang bde bas tshim par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-8: 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing thob nas mya ngan las 'das pa la ma sleb kyi bar du ji ltar na shes rab rkyang ba'i sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-9: sems bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-10: rim pa gang du sleb pa na sgom pa'i spyan thob pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-11: gnas gang du sleb pa nas la gnas pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-12: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mtha' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa bstan du gsol zhes gsol nas yan lag lngas la gtugs te 'khor 'dus pa thams cad sems rtse gcig pas bcom ldan 'das la mig gis blta bzhin du brtse ba'i bka' nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:524b-13: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-2: khyed cag 'khor 'dus pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-3: yang snyigs ma'i dus kyi skye bo dag ting nge 'dzin la sbyong ba dang theg pa chen po tshol ba la so so skye bo'i sa nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar bla na med pa yang dag par sgom pa'i lam rgya cher bstan pa'i slad du gsol bar spobs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-4: khyed cag legs par nyon dang ngas bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-6: kun dga' bo la sogs 'khor 'dus pa thams cad thal mo sbyar zhing sems dang bas cang mi smra bar rjes su bstan pa nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-9: khyed cag shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-10: rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig gi rang bzhin de ming dang rnam pa dang bral zhing gdod ma nas 'jig rten dang sems can med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-11: rdzun pa'i rkyen gyis skye bar 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-12: skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'gag par 'gyur bas skye ba dang 'gag pa gnyis rdzun pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525a-17: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gnyis kyi ming can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-0: khyed cag nges par ting nge 'dzin sgom zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen por myur du sleb @525b par 'dod na thog mar sems can dang 'jig rten phyin ci log gnyis kyi rgyu shes par bya rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-1: phyin ci log med na 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang dag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-3: ci'i phyir sems can phyin ci log ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-6: gsal rig gi sems yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-7: rang bzhin de gsal rig yin pa'i phyir gsal ba las rang bzhin 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-8: rang bzhin rdzun pa'i mthong ba skyes pas de gzhi med pa las phyir zhing yod la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-9: yod pa dang gang yod pa 'di gnyis kyi bar du rgyu dang gang gi rgyu ma yin zhing gnas pa dang gang du gnas pa'i rnam pa mthar thug na gzhi med pas gdod ma nas gnas pa med pa las 'jig rten dang sems can 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-10: thog ma'i gsal rig 'grib nas rdzun pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-11: rdzun pa'i rang bzhin la dngos po med pas rten du gzung du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-12: 'di las bden pa tshol na de nyid kyis na bden pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-13: bden pa ma yin pa las tshol na rnam pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-14: de dag skye ba ma yin gnas pa ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-16: chos ma yin pas rim gyis 'khor nas skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:525b-17: skye ba'i mthus gsal bar gyur nas bag chags kyi dbang gis las 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-0: 'dra bar gyur na phan tshun bskul zhing de nas rjes mthun bskul @526a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-1: pa'i las yod pa'i dbang gis phan tshun du 'gag bzhin phan tshun du skye bzhin pa de lta bus sems can phyin ci log tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-3: ji ltar 'jig rten phyin ci log ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-5: gang yod pa de cha so so nas rdzun par skyes pa'i phyir 'di las 'jig rten du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-6: skyed byed dang bskyed bya ma yin; gnas byed dang gnas bya ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-7: de las rim par 'pho bzhin du mi gnas pas 'di las 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-8: dus gsum dang phyogs bzhi 'phrad cing ltos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-9: phan tshun du zhugs pas sems can rnams 'gyur zhing skyes nas ris rnam pa bcu gnyis su 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-10: de'i phyir 'jig rten la g-yo ba'i rkyen gyis sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-11: sgra'i rkyen gyis gzugs byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-12: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis dri byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-13: dri'i rkyen gyis reg bya byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-14: reg bya'i rkyen gyis ro byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-15: ro'i rkyen gyis chos shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-16: 'khrul pa drug po 'di rdzun pa'i sems kyis las kyi rang bzhin 'grub pa'i phyir ris bcu gnyis su gyur nas de las 'khor bar 'khor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-17: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sgra dri ro reg bya la sogs pa rigs bcu gnyis su gyur nas lan gcig 'khor ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-18: 'di ltar 'khor ba phyin ci log gi mtshan ma la brten pas 'jig rten na sgo nga las skye pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526a-20: drod gsher las skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-0: rdzus te skye ba dang @526b gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-4: gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-5: gzugs med ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-6: 'du shes can ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-7: 'du shes med pa ma yin pa de dag so sor phye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-9: 'jig rten gyi rdzun zhing mi bden pas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du g-yo ba'i byin ci log gis rkyen la 'phrad cing ltos nas dbugs kyi dbang gis 'phur ba dang bying ba brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khrul pa'i 'du shes 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-10: de'i phyir sgo nga'i nur nur po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas nya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-13: sprul la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-14: 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs pas bgos nas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du rtog pa phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos nas 'dres pas 'greng ba dud pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-15: de'i phyir mngal gyi mer mer po yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-16: yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas mi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-19: drang srong gi rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:526b-20: 'jig rten gyi 'dzin zhing 'brel bas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du 'gro ba phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa'i drod las skyes pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'pho zhing 'gyur ba'i 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-0: de'i phyir nar nar po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor @527a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-1: zhing skyes nas rig pa med pa'i khum pa dang nur pa'i srin bu'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-2: 'jig rten gyi 'pho zhing 'gyur bas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du bcos ma'i phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa'i reg pas brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khrul pa'i sems gsar rnying 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-3: de'i phyir rdzus skyes kyi gzugs gor gor po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas lus brje ba dang 'phur ba dang 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to; ;'jig rten gyi khams su lus shing thogs pas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du sgrib pa phyin ci log gi rkyen gyi sa 'phrad cing ltos pa'i 'dzin pas brgyad khri bzhi stong gsal zhing 'tsher ba'i 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-4: de'i phyir rnam pa'i gzugs can gor gor po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas mtshan ma bzang po dang ltas ngan pa shes pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527a-5: 'jig rten gyi zhi ba dang 'thor bas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du rtog pa phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pas mi mngon pa'i gzugs phra mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi 'khrul ba'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-0: de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i gor gor po yod cing yul khams su brgyud da de 'khor bar skyes nas stong ba dang @527b 'thor ba dang zhi ba dang byir ba la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-1: 'jig rten gyi gzugs srab mos 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du grib ma'i phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltes pa'i 'dod pas brgyad khri bzhi stong gi mi mngon par 'ching ba'i 'khrul ba'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-2: de'i phyir 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i gor gor po yod cing brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas lha 'dre bdud dang gdon la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-3: 'jig rten gyi rmongs shing blun pas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du rmongs pa phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa sems med kyis brgyad khri bzhi stong rtsva skam lta bu'i 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-4: de'i phyir 'du shes med pa'i gor gor po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas dvangs ma 'gyur nas sa shing lcags rdo la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-5: 'jig rten gyi phan tshun 'grogs pas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du bcos ma'i phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa'i bgobs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi brten pa dang yid ches pa'i 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:527b-6: de'i phyir gzugs dang gzugs can ma yin pa gzugs su gyur pa'i gor gor po yod cing yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas chu'i ma zhes bya ba'i srin bu la lcang mos mig byas pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:528a-1: drangs nas 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du rang bzhin phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa'i dmod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi 'bod pa dang bsgrags pa'i 'khrul pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:528a-2: de'i phyir gzugs med ma yin zhing gzugs med pa'i gor gor po yod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:528a-3: yul khams su brgyud de 'khor zhing skyes nas mnan pa dang byad dang dmod pa bor ba la sogs pa'i rigs kyis gtams shing gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:528a-4: 'jig rten gyi rdzun gyis 'brel ba'i 'khor bar 'khor bzhin du 'khrul pa'i phyin ci log gi rkyen gyis 'phrad cing ltos pa las gzhan brgyad khri bzhi stong phan tshun 'khrug pa'i sems 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:528a-5: de'i phyir 'du shes can gzugs can ma yin zhing 'du shes can sgrub pa'i gor gor po yod cing /
