K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-3: sems can 'di dag gdod ma'i sems ngo mi shes pa'i phyir 'di ltar 'khor bar 'khor zhing sdig pa'i 'bras bu myong bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa 'das kyang yang dag pa'i dag pa thob par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-5: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-6: 'dod pa'i dbang gis song ba'i rkyen las byung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-7: gsum po 'di las log na srog mi gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-8: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-9: 'dod pas log par mi spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-11: ngan song gi rigs zhes bya la med na mtho ris kyi rigs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-12: las de yod med gnyis kyis phan tshun go skabs 'phrog nas 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rang bzhin 'phel la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-13: gal te rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed nus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-14: rtag brtan rmad du byung bar gyur cing yod med thams cad las 'da' bar 'gyur la yod med las 'das pa nyid kyang mi dmigs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-16: ma byin par mi len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-17: 'dod pas log par mi g-yem pa yin pa la ji ltar srog gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-18: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555a-19: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brang ba yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-0: @555b las gsum ma spangs na rang rang gi rtog pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rtog pa skal ba mnyam pa dag gnas nges pa med pa ma yin la 'khrul pa las skye zhing 'khrul pa yang rgyu med pas dpyad na 'thad pa'i gnas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-1: khyod kyis nan tan du sbyongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-2: byang chub thob par 'dod na nges par rtog pa gnas gsum po bsal bar rigs so; ;rtog pa gsum po ma bsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-3: ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur kyang 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-4: bag chags ma bsal bas bdud kyi lam du ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-5: ji ltar 'khrul pa bsal bar 'dod na yang phyir zhing 'khrul pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-6: snying rje rje zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-7: khyod kyi 'khrul pa rang gis byas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-8: byang chub kyi skyon min no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-10: yang dag pa'i smra ba yin la de las gzhan du smra ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-12: de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar chos ston pa'i mjug re zhig bsdus nas slar yang sku gser gtso ma'i ri lta bu dam pa'i chos kyi gdan sengge'i khri la slar bzhugs te rin po che sna bdun gyi sku rten drangs te de la sku brten nas kun dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:555b-13: khyod la sogs pa nyan thos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-0: @556a *// rang sangs rgyas slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-1: mi slob pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed de rmad du byung ba gsal rig blang ba'i phyir ngas de yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos bshad zin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-2: khyed cag gis da dung khong du mchud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-3: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la rnal 'byor du byed pa na shin tu phra ba'i bdud kyi las dang bdud kyi yul mngon sum du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-4: khyed cag gis de ma rig na sems yang dag par sbyangs pa zhes mi bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-5: log pa'i lta bar ltung bas skabs skabs su phung po'i bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-6: skabs skabs su lha'i bdud dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-7: skabs skabs su yi dvags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-8: lha ma yin gyis glags rnyed cing gdon phra mo dag gis 'tshe bar 'gyur bas nang du sems kyis ma tshor bar rkun po la bur 'khrul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-9: yang de las cung zad tsam thob pa la chog shes te bsam gtan bzhi pa la chags pa'i dge slong dang mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-11: thos pa med par 'phags lam ma thob pa thob par smra zhing tshe zad khar yang srid len pa mngon du gyur te dgra bcom pa yang phyi ma'i lus len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-12: zhes skur ba btab nas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556a-13: khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-0: ngas khyod la zhib tu phye @556b ste bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-2: kun dga' bo stan las langs te 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig tu rab tu dga' nas spyi bos btud de lus dang sems shin tu gus shing dang bas thugs rjes dgongs pa'i bka' la nod cing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa; khyod la sogs pas shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-4: ngo bo nyid kyi gsal rig khyab pa la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-6: rigs bcu gnyis kyi sems can zag pa can rnams gnyis su med cing so so ma yin mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-7: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes 'khrul pa las rmongs pa dang sred pa 'byung zhing skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-8: skyes nas 'khrul pa las stong pa'i rang bzhin yod par 'gyur te 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-9: 'khrul pa las rdzun pa'i snang ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'jig rten byung ngo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-11: phyogs bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi zhing rnams kyang bzhag pa ma yin pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-13: 'khrul pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis bzhag par shes par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-14: nam mkha' stong pa khyed cag gi sems kyi nang du chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:556b-16: nam mkha' la sprin gyi dum bu chags pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-0: nam mkha' yang de'i nang du chud na 'jig rten gyi khams thams @557a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-1: cad chud pa lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-2: khyed cag yang dag pa 'di la zhugs na phyogs bcu'i stong pa thams cad zhi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-3: de lta na stong pa la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ci'i phyir bshig par mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-4: khyed cag bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-5: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-6: zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams kyis sems dvangs shing gsal bar de bzhin nyid la rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gyur na bdud kyi rgyal po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-8: lha phal pa rnams rang rang gi khang khyim kun nas nyil zhing sa chen po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-9: rab tu g-yo ba dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-10: chu dang skam na gnas pa dang nam mkha' la 'phur ba dag la mi skrag pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-11: skye bo phal pa rmongs pa rnams kyis log par sgro 'dogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-12: de dag mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan zhing zag pa ma zad pas 'khor ba la 'dris shing zhen pas ci'i phyir de dag gnas rnams khyed cag la bshig tu bcug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-13: de'i phyir lha ma yin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557a-14: yi dvags dang; lha'i bdud rnams khyed cag bsam gtan sgom pa'i thad du 'ongs nas 'tshe bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-0: de lta na yang bdud de dag thams cad cher khros kyang de dag nyon mongs @557b te 'khrul par bying ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-1: khyed cag rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig la gnas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-3: 'od la rlung gis phog pa dang chu la ral gri btab pa ltar cung zad kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro; ;khyed cag chu tshan dang 'dra zhing de dag 'khyag rom sra ba dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-4: drod dang nye bas khad kyis 'ju ba ltar de'i rdzu 'phrul phyir zhing nyams te rang nyon mongs pa tsam du zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-5: de ni; mgron dang mtshungs par glo bur du 'ongs te grub pa'i don bshig shing 'khrug par byed de khyed cag gi sems kyi nang du phung po lnga'i khyim bdag 'khrul na mgron des glags rnyed la; bsam gtan sgom pa'i tshe shes bzhin gyis tshor na bdud kyi rgol bas khyod la glags mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-6: phung po zhi zhing gsal ba la zhugs na phyin ci log gi tshogs kun so sor mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-7: snang bas mun nag sel bar nus la nye bar 'ongs kyang rang nyid zad par 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-8: bsam gtan la gnod par byed pa ga la spobs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-9: gal te shes bzhin gyis tshor bar ma gyur na phung pos rmongs par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:557b-11: khyod bdud kyi bur 'gyur la bdud nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-0: bu mo ma tanggi lta bu mthu chung yang sngags kyi mthus khyod kyi tshul khrims gzhig pa'i bsam pas spyod pa brgyad khri'i nang nas gcig bshig par 'dod kyang sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying par ma @558a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-3: khyod kyi rin po che'i gsal rig gi lus rdzogs par 'joms so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-5: blon po chen po'i khyim glo bur du gtor ba na kun tu 'phyar zhing 'thor ba la sus kyang brtse bas skyob mi nus pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-8: khyod rnal 'byor sgom pa na rnam tog 'gag pa'i tshe rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad de sna tshogs pa'i sems dang bral zhing kun tu dvangs shing gsal bar 'gyur te g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba thams cad kyis mi bskyod la dran pa dang brjed pa gnyis mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-9: 'dir ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa na dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-10: skye bo mig dang ldan pa mun nag gi nang du phyin pa dang mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-11: rang bzhin gsal zhing dvangs mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-12: sems kyi 'od ma byung bas gzugs kyi phung po'i sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-13: gal te mig dang ldan pa de mun pa sangs pa na phyogs bcu gsal bar snang zhing mun pa med pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-14: 'di la gzugs kyi phung po zad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-16: bskal pa'i snyigs ma las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558a-17: don de la brtags na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes brtan pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-0: 'di'i nang gi rmad du byung ba'i @558b gsal rig la zhib par brtags nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi ma 'dres par gyur pa las yud tsam gyis lus sgrib pa dang 'bral nus pas 'di la gsal ba'i rang bzhin spro zhing sdud pa'i 'du 'phrod kyi gzugs mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-2: gcig tu brtson zhing sbyangs pa'i mthu las yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-5: 'di la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-6: dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-7: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-9: yang sems gsal rig rmad du byung ba 'di la shin tu sbyangs na lus kyi nang dvangs shing gsal ba las skye bo de'i lus kyi nang nas yud tsam zhig tu srin grol ma phyung ba ltar lus sngar bzhin te rmas shing nyams pa yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-10: 'di la spro zhing sdud pa'i gzugs mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-12: gcig tu brtson zhing spyad pa las yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:558b-15: 'di la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsams na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi ;gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-0: yang sems 'di phyi dang nang du shin tu sbyangs nas de'i tshe nye bar len pa'i rnam shes ma gtogs pa sems @559a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-1: dang yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams phan tshun du 'brel nas mgron dang khyim bdag gi tshul du 'gyur zhing glo bur du nam mkha' stong pa las chos ston pa'i sgra thos pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-2: yang na phyogs bcur gcig tu zab mo'i don 'chad pa lta bu'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-3: 'di la sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa phan tshun 'du ba dang 'bral ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-4: dge ba'i sa bon sgrubs pa las yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-7: 'di la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-8: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-9: yang sems 'di dvangs shing gsal ba'i nang nas 'od byung ste phyogs bcur khyab par dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te sna tshogs pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur ma thag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad lha'i rin po che'i khri 'od 'bar ba la bzhugs te sangs rgyas stong gis bskor zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i zhing padma dang bcas pa lhan cig tu snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559a-10: 'di la sems dang rnam par shes pa las ye shes mngon du gyur te sems sbyang ba'i 'od las 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-0: @559b de yang yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-3: 'di la 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi ;gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-4: yang sems gsal rig rmad du byung ba 'di la shin tu sbyangs pas dpyod pa rgyun mi 'chad cing 'phro rgod btul te gnas cha tshad las lhag par gyur pa'i tshe skad cig gis phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog can nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-5: yang na kha dog sna brgyar yang gyur nas dus gcig tu khyab la phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi sgrib par sngon po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-8: dkar po dag ma 'dres par snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-9: 'di la gnas shing 'dul ba la brtson pa'i stobs kyis tshad las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-10: de yang yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-13: 'di ni; 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:559b-14: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-0: yang sems 'di dvangs shing gsal bar shin tu sbyangs te rang bzhin mi 'khrug par gyur nas skad cig gis mtshan gung mun nag gi khang pa'i nang du dngos po sna tshogs pa nyin mo dang 'dra bar @560a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-2: mun pa'i nang gi sgrib byed zad cing 'gag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-3: 'di la sems shin tu phra ba'i mthong ba rnam par dag nas sna tshogs mthong zhing mun pa sangs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-4: de yang yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-9: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-10: yang sems 'di stong pa'i rang bzhin la khyab par zhugs nas skad cig gis yan lag bzhi rtsa dang shing 'dra bar gyur te mes bsregs shing mtshon gyis gtubs kyang mi tshor la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-11: me'i 'od kyis gdung bar yang mi 'gyur zhing sha bcad na yang shing gzhogs pa dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-12: 'di la yul zad cing khams bzhi ma dmigs par de kho na nyid la zhugs pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-13: de yang yud tsam zhig 'di ltar gyur pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-17: 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560a-18: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-0: yang sems 'di gsal zhing dvangs par grub ste sems yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi mthar thug nas skad cig gis sa chen @560b po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-2: chu klung thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gyur nas rin po che sna bdun dang ldan zhing snang bas khyab cing gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-3: yang gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhal med khang dang bcas pa nam mkha' gang bar mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-4: 'og tu sems can dmyal ba dang steng du lha'i gzhal med khang dag mthong zhing sgrib thogs med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-5: 'di la dga' ba dang skyo ba'i sems kyis rnam par bzung nas yun ring du sems pa las gyur pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-6: 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni; mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-8: 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-9: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-10: yang sems 'di sbyangs pa yun ring bas skad cig gis mtshan gung rgyang ring bo'i tshong 'dus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-14: yang na de dag gi gtam zer pa thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-15: 'di la sems bsgrims te dmigs pa las mngon du gyur nas bar du chod pa'i rgyang ring po mthong ba zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-16: 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni; mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-18: 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na dge ba'i mngon rtags su rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:560b-19: gal te 'phags pa'i snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-1: sems 'di shin tu sbyangs nas phra ba'i mthar thug nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gi lus dang cha byad bsgyur zhing yud tsam du rgyu med par rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgyur ba mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-2: 'di la phyin ci log gi sems lha ma yin khong du chud pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-3: yang na lha'i bdud dang 'phrad cing de'i sems la zhugs nas rgyu med par chos zab mo'i don thogs pa med par 'chad pa la mkhas te 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-6: 'phags pa'o snyam du ma bsam na bdud kyi las zhi zhing zad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-7: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na log pa'i mthar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-9: rnam pa bcu po 'di ting nge 'dzin la snang ba'i yul te 'di kun gzugs kyi phung po la sems sbyangs pa 'khrul pa las 'di 'dra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-10: sems can rmongs pa rnams rang gi drod ma zin pas rgyu rkyen 'di lta bu dang 'phrad nas 'khrul ba [?] la rang nyid kyis ma shes par bdag 'phags pa'o zhes rdzun chen po smras te mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561a-11: khyed cag ngas bstan pa 'di la brten nas nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu snyigs ma'i dus su ngas bstan pa'i don 'di dag rgyas par shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-0: lha'i bu'i bdud kyis @561b skabs mi rnyed par skyong ba dang srung zhing skyob na bla na med pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-2: rigs kyi bu dag zhi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gzugs kyi phung po zad pa na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-3: me long dag pa'i gzugs gsal bar snang ba dang 'dra bar rnyed pa dang 'dra yang longs spyod par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-5: skye bo grib gnon gyis gnon pa ltar rkang lag snga mkho bzhin du yod cing mthong ba dang thos pa ma 'khrul yang sems phyin ci log gis bslad pas lus g-yo mi nus pa dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-6: 'di la tshor ba'i phung po'i sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-7: gal te non pa de sangs nas 'khrul pa'i sems de lus dang bral te rang ngo shes shing 'gro ba dang 'dug pa la rang dbang du gyur te chags thogs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-8: 'di la tshor ba'i phung po zad pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-9: skye bo de lta ba'i snyigs ma las 'da' bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:561b-10: rgyu 'di la brtags na gsog tu gyur pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rtsa bar gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-0: rigs kyi bu dag 'di'i nang nas 'od gsal ba chen po byung ste de'i sems 'od gsal bar gyur pa la nang du bsgrims te lhag par gnas pa'i dbang gis glo bur du tshad med pa'i snying rje skyes nas sbrang bu phra mo yan chad mthong ba na @562a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-1: bu gcig pa bzhin du byams shing bltas nas de snying rje'i dbang gis rang dbang med par mchi ma 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-2: 'di la brtson pa'i spyod pas lhag par gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-3: tshor ba nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-5: tshor bas zin te ma 'khrul na ring zhig nas de zhi bar 'gyur ro; ;gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na de nas snying rje'i bdud khong du zhugs pa ste mi dag mthong na snying rje skye zhing mchi ma rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ste yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-7: rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-10: gsal bar gyur te rmad du byung ba'i rnam pa mngon du gyur pas shin tu rings pa'i sems lhag par gyur te de las glo bur du shin tu dpa' ba'i sems bskyed de brtul phod pa'i sems des sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par bya zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-11: sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa grangs med gsum 'da' bar nus so snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562a-12: 'di la brtson 'grus spyod pa la brten nas khengs pa lhag par gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-0: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes @562b ni; mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-1: shes bzhin gyis tshor te ma 'khrul na ring zhig nas de zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-2: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na smyo byed kyi bdud khong du zhugs pa ste mi dag mthong na rgyags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-3: nga rgyal dpe med pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-4: gong du sangs rgyas la mi brtsi 'og tu mi la mi brtsi ste yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-5: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-9: sngon du don gsar pa ma thob cing phyir log pa na gzhi la yod pa'i gnas stor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-10: ye shes kyi stobs nyams te bar ma dor gnas shing ci yang mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-11: sems kyi nang nas glo bur du yid shin tu gdungs te dus thams cad du brjed pa med par gcig tu dran nas de la brtson 'grus kyi rnam par gyur to snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-12: 'di la sgom pa'i shes rab 'chal zhing rang nyid kyis stor ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-13: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-15: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na dran pa'i bdud khong du zhugs pa ste nyin mtshan du sems kyis mi gtong bar 'dzin cing gcig tu dmigs te yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:562b-16: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-3: gsal bar gyur te shes rab kyi stobs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-4: zhi gnas lhas lhag par gyur te dpyod pa rnon pos khyer nas rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin sems la bzhag ste rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad yin no snyam du sems shing cung zad thob pa la chog par 'dzin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-5: 'di la so sor rtogs pa las nyams te rang nyid kyis mthong zhing shes pa la zhen pas 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-6: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-8: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na dman pas chog shes pa'i bdud khong du zhugs pa ste mi dag mthong na rang gis bla na med pa'i don dam pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-9: zhes smras te yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-10: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-13: gsal bar gyur te don gsar pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563a-17: de gnyis kyi tshul mthong bas zhum pa'i sems skyes nas glo bur du mya ngan tshad med pa skyes ba [?] lcags [?] ba sregs kyi khri la 'dug pa dang mtshungs shing dug 'thungs pa dang 'dra bar 'tsho bar mi 'dod pa'i sems skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-0: rtag par gzhan la bdag gi srog chod la rnam par grol @563b ba la bzhag par mdzod cig ces gsol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-1: 'di la spyod pa sbyong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa stor ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-2: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-4: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na mya ngan gyi bdud kyi rigs gcig khong du zhugs pa ste lag tu gri mtshon thogs nas rang gi sha gcod cing srog 'gag par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-5: yang na rtag tu mya ngan gyis bros te ri dang nags su 'gro zhing mi dag mthong bar mi 'dod de yang dag pa'i ngas stor nas leg pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-6: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-9: gsal bar gyur te rnam par dag pa'i nang nas sems bde zhing glo bur du rang nyid dga' ba dpag tu med pa skyes nas dga' zhing rol ba de 'gog mi nus par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-10: 'di la shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba dang bcas kyang shes rab 'chal bas 'gog mi nus pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-11: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-13: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na dga' zhing rol ba la sred pa'i bdud kyi rigs gcig de'i sems la zhugs te mi dag mthong na rgod cing lam srang gi bzhi mdor rang nyid glu len zhing gar byad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:563b-14: rang nyid thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-0: zhes smra zhing yang dag pa'i @564a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-1: gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-2: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-7: zhes smra zhing glo bur du rgyu med par nga rgyal chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-8: de nas nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal dang nga rgyal las kyang che ba'i nga rgyal dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal cig car du skye zhing sems kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mi gus na theg pa dman pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-9: 'di la rang nyid rgyal bar mthong zhing rang skyob pa'i shes rab 'chal ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-10: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-12: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na nga rgyal chen po'i bdud kyi rigs gcig de'i sems la zhugs te mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang la phyag mi 'tshal zhing glegs bam dang sku gzugs bshig par byed de sbyin bdag la 'di skad du 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-19: sha'i lus 'di bden zhing rtag pa yin pa la mi gus par phyir zhing sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564a-23: de la dad cing yid ches pa dag de'i tshig gis bshig cing dral te sa 'og tu spa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-0: sems @564b can rnams la the tshom skyed cing log par 'dzin du bcug pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-1: yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-2: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-5: gsal bar gyur te dvangs shing gsal ba'i nang nas gnas lugs phra mo rtog cing rang dbang du gyur nas de'i sems la glo bur du shin tu sbyangs ba'i bde ba tshad med pa skye ste rang nyid 'phags par gyur cing mchog gi dbang thob bo zhes smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-6: 'di la shes rab la brten nas shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-7: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-9: gal te 'phags ba'o snyam du bsam na shin tu sbyangs pa la sred pa'i bdud kyi rigs gcig de'i sems la zhugs te bdag nyid rab tu tshim mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-10: zhes smra zhing slar yang 'bad par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-11: de dag la sogs pa thos pa med pa'i dge slong phal che bas sems can rnams la the tshom skyed cing log par 'dzin du bcug pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-12: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni; zhi bar mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:564b-14: gsal bar gyur te gsal bar rtogs pa'i nang nas stong zhing gsal ba'i rang bzhin thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-0: de'i nang nas glo bur du rtog pa zhi ba'i 'gog @565a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-1: pa la zhugs nas rgyu 'bras med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-2: zhes 'dzin cing stong pa rkyang ba la zhugs pas stong pa'i sems mngon du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-3: 'di la rtag pa dang chad pa 'gog pa'i sems skye ba la thug pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-4: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-6: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na stong pa'i bdud de'i sems la zhugs te tshul khrims srung ba dag la theg pa dman pa zhes smod cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-7: byang chub sems dpa' dag stong nyid rtogs pas srung ba dang bshig pa med ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-8: des rgyun du sbyin bdag dad pa can gyi khyim du chang 'thung zhing sha za la log par g-yem pa spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-9: bdud kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs nas skye bo de dag kyang de la the tshom mi byed cing smod pa'i sems mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-10: bdud sems la ring du gnas pas bshang gci za ba yang sha chang dang 'dra bar sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-11: stong pa rkyang pa la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba dang tshul khrims bshig cing skye bo rnams la the tshom skyed cing sdig pa la 'god do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-12: de nas yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-13: yang rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin de'i nang nas gzugs kyi phung po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565a-15: tshor ba'i phung po ni; gsal bar gyur te stong zhing gsal ba'i ro myong zhing snying dang rus pa'i bar zhen cing zhugs pas de'i sems la glo bur du sred pa tshad med pa skye zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-0: shin tu sred bas myos te log @565b par g-yem pa spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-1: 'di la ting nge 'dzin gyi yul mthun zhing bde bar sems la zhugs nas rang la skyob pa'i shes rab med pas 'khrul zhing log par g-yem pa la ltung ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-2: tshor na nyes pa med de 'phags pa'i 'bras bu zhes ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-4: gal te 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam na 'dod pa'i bdud de'i sems la zhugs te 'dod chags ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-5: byang chub kyi lam yin par khyim bdag la ston cing lhan cig tu log par g-yem pa spyod nas de dag la chos 'dzin pa'i bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-7: bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus snyigs ma'i dus na skye bo phal pa blun po dag 'dus te brgya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-11: de las kyang mang ba stong dang khri'i bar du 'du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-12: de nas bdud de skye bo de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus dang bral ba na de gzi brjid med par gyur te rgyal po'i chad pa phog cing skyo bo rnams la the tshom bskyed de log par 'dzin du bcug pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-13: yang dag pa'i gnas stor nas log pa'i gol sar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-15: rnam pa bcu po 'di ting nge 'dzin la snang ba'i yul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:565b-16: 'di kun tshor ba'i phung po la sems sbyangs pa 'khrul pa las 'di 'dra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-0: sems can rmongs pa rnams rang gi drod ma zin pas rgyu rkyen 'di lta bu dang 'phrad nas 'khrul pa la rang @566a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-1: nyid kyis ma shes par bdag 'phags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-2: zhes rdzun chen bo smras te mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-3: khyed cag ngas bstan pa 'di la brten nas nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu snyigs ma'i dus su ngas bstan pa'i don 'di dag rgyas par shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-5: lha'i bu'i bdud kyis skabs mi rnyed par skyong ba dang srung zhing skyob na bla na med pa'i lam thob bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-7: rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin sgom pas tshor ba'i phung po dag zad pa na zag pa ma zad kyang sems lus dang bral nas bya skon pa las thar ba dang 'dra bar rab tu sgrub pas lus phal pa las 'phags pa'i gnas drug cu'i bar yid kyi lus thob ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la thogs pa med do; ;dper na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-8: mi la la zhig gnyid kyi brdol gtam smra ba na don gzhan mi shes kyang tshig gi go rim dang 'bru dang dbyangs kyi brjod pa rnams gnyid ma log pa gzhan gyis shes par nus pa dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-9: 'di la 'du shes kyi phung bo'i sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566a-10: gal te g-yo ba'i dran pa zad cing 'du shes 'khrul ba zhi zhing dag na gsal rig gi sems rdul gyi dri ma phyis pa dang mtshungs bar 'gyur la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gcig gi skye shi'i thog mtha' rdzogs par mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-0: 'di la 'du shes kyi phung po zad pa zhes bya @566b ste; skye bo de nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma las 'da' bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-1: rgyu 'di la brtags na kun tu khyab cing chud pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes rtsa bar gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-3: rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems gsal rig la sred pas snying thag pa nas 'bad cing thabs la mkhas pas 'tshol ba na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-4: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag thabs la mkhas pa 'tshol ba'i gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing gzugs gcig la mi gnas par skabs la lar dge slong gi gzugs su sprul te skye bo de la ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-5: la lar brgya byin du sprul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-6: la lar bud med du sprul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-7: la lar dge slong mar sprul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-8: la lar khang pa mun nag gi nang du nyal nas lus las 'od 'gyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:566b-9: skye bo de 'khrul nas byang chub sems dpa' snyam du yid ches nas des bslab pa bzhin du byed cing lus sems bag yangs su btang ste sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig cing lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-0: ngag tu 'jigs pa dang dge ba dang ltas bzang po dang ngan @567a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-1: pa'i gtam smra bar 'dod la skabs la lar gnas ga ge mo zhig tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-3: la lar me'i bskal pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-6: zhes smra zhing skye bo dag skrag par byed cing nor dang yo byad sogs brlag tu 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-7: 'di la mi sdug pa'i 'dre rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-8: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro; ;khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567a-10: rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing lag par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems la kun tu rgyu bar 'dod cing shin tu brtson pas sna tshogs pa mthong bar 'dod pa na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-0: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag kun tu rgyu bar 'dod pa de'i gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing @567b de'i lus ma 'gyur yang de las chos gnyan pa gzhan dag glo bur du so so nas rang nyid rin po che'i padma'i gdan la 'dug cing lus thams cad gser btso ma'i kha dog tu gyur pa mthong nas chos nyan pa de dag thams cad sngar ma thob pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-2: skye bo de dag 'khrul te 'di la byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du yid ches nas log par g-yem pa'i sems bskyed de sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig cing lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-3: ngag tu sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig rten du byon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-5: yul ga ge mo'i mi che ge mo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-6: sangs rgyas che ge mo'i sprul pa 'dir 'ongs ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-8: byang chub sems dpa' che ge mo'i sprul pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-9: 'jig rten pa'i skye bo 'dul ba'i don du 'ongs so; ;zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-10: gzhan dag gis skye bo de dag mthong ba na sems dad cing gdugs nas phyin ci log gi lta ba ma tshor bar rgyas shing yang dag pa'i ye shes 'gag cing nub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-11: 'di la than pa gtong ba'i 'dre rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:567b-12: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i chul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-0: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar @568a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-1: med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-2: rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems rjes su mthun par gzhol bar 'dod pas shin tu 'bad cing brtson pas tshol ba na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-3: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag rjes su mthun pa tshol ba dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing de dang chos nyan pa bo dag gi lus gzhan du mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-4: nyan pa po dag chos ma thos gong nas rang nyid kyis de'i don shes shing skabs la lar sems 'gyur te sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-5: la lar gzhan gyi sems shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-6: la lar sems can dmyal ba mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-7: la lar mi'i 'jig rten gyi legs nyes shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-8: la lar ngag tu tshigs su bcad pa smra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-9: la lar kha ton byed pa sogs su 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568a-10: so so nas rol zhing dga' bas sngon ma thob pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-0: skye bo de dag 'khrul te 'di la byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du yid ches nas rjes su mthun par 'dod de sangs rgyas kyi 'dul @568b khrims bshig cing lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-1: ngag tu 'di ltar smra bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-2: sangs rgyas la che chung gi bye brag yod ces pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-3: sangs rgyas de dang de sngon du byon sangs rgyas de dang de rjes su byon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-4: de la yang yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang bcos ma'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-6: bud med kyi sangs rgyas yod cing byang chub sems dpa' la yang de dang 'dra bar yod ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-7: mi dag gis de mthong ba dang snga ma'i sems 'gyur nas phyin ci log gi lta ba la 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-8: 'di la rmongs byed kyi 'dre rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o; ;mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:568b-9: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas [?] ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-0: rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems la dngos po rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba dang thog ma dang tha ma'i mthar thug par dpyod pa'i shes rab phra zhing gsal ba bskyed de 'bad pas bye brag 'byed par 'dod pa na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs @569a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-1: shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-2: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag rtsa ba'i rgyu 'tshol ba dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-3: de'i lus gzi brjid can du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-4: tshol ba po dag dad cing 'dun par byas nas chos ma thos gong nas sems mos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-5: skye bo de dag la khyed cag gis sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-7: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa de da lta'i sha'i lus 'dis pha bu rim par brgyud de skye ba nyid chos kyi sku rtag brtan ther zug tu gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-9: da lta'i gnas 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin gyi 'di las gzhan du dag pa'i zhing dang mtshan bzang po dang gser gyi kha dog med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-11: mi de dag yid ches pas nges par bzung nas sngar gyi bsam pa de dor nas lus srog la mi blta bar gus pas bsten te sngar ma thob pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-13: skye bo de dag 'khrul te 'di la byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du yid ches nas sems gcig tu zhen nas sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig cing lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569a-17: lce kun sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-0: pho mo'i @569b dbang po gnyis byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-1: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-3: shes rab med pa de dag tshig ngan pa de la yid ches par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-4: 'di la srog chags gdug pa'i 'dre rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-5: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus dang bral ba na slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-6: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:569b-7: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las lhag pa'i lha'i byin rlabs 'byung bar 'dod pas sgo sna tshogs nas brtson zhing nang nas bskul bar 'dod pa na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-0: rigs kyi bu gang dag byin rlabs 'dod pa dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing nyan pa po dag gis de mthong ba na lo brgya stong gi bar du 'grogs shing 'dris pa dang mtshungs par de la chags @570a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-1: te 'bral mi phong bar rang nyid bran bzhin du 'tsho ba rnam pa bzhis mchod pas ngal zhing skyo ba'i sems mi skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-2: de'i rjes su 'brang ba de dag so so nas 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-3: bdag gi sngon gyi slob dpon dge ba'i bshes gnyen no snyam du dad cing chos la sred pa'i sems khyad par ba'i dbang gis de la chags pa'i sems spyin dang 'byar rtsi brtan pa ltar mi phyed par gyur te sngon ma thob pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-5: skye bo de dag 'khrul te 'di la byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du yid ches nas de la brten cing bsnyen nas sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig cing lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-6: ngag tu 'di ltar smra bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-7: bdag sngon skye ba che ge mo zhig tu mi che ge mo zhig bsgral to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-9: de'i tshe de dag bdag gi chung ma chen dang phu nu dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-10: da lta khyed cag 'dul ba'i slad du 'dir 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-11: bdag cag lhan cig par 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig tu de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig la bsnyen bkur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-13: yang 'di ltar smra ste 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i lha'i gnas gcig logs su yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-14: de ni; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570a-15: zhes smras pa la blo dman pa dag de'i rdzun gyi tshig la yid ches nas sngar gyi bsam pa de dor ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-0: 'di @570b la rims gtong ba'i 'dre rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-1: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-2: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-3: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems zab mdo la 'jug par 'dod de dka' thub kyis dben zhing zhi ba la mi g-yo bar gnas pa la sred pas mi g-yo ba'i bde ba tshol ba na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-5: rigs kyi bu gang dag dben pa 'dod pa dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing nyan pa po de dag rang rang gi sngon gyi byung ba shes par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:570b-6: yang 'ga' zhig tu mi la la dag la khyed da lta ma shi bar dud 'gro'i lus su gyur to zhes smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-0: yang gzhan gcig la khyod song la de'i mjug ma rdzis shig ces smra zhing des kyang de ltar byas pas mi @571a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-1: de ldang bar ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-2: 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad kyang shin tu dad cing mos par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-3: skye bo la la dag la sems kyi rtog pa skyes pa na de yang shes par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-4: sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims las nyis 'gyur gyi khrims bcas nas dka' thub bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-5: rgyu des dge slong rnams la skur ba 'debs shing rab tu byung ba dag la kha zer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-6: skye bo dag la klan ka tshol zhing ngo tsha dang khrel med par spyod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-7: ngag tu ma 'ongs pa'i legs nyes lung ston zhing ji ltar smras pa bzhin dus la bab pa na cung zad tsam yang mi 'khrul bar 'byung ngo 'di la 'dre stobs po che rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-8: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571a-9: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-0: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems la mngon par shes pa 'dod pas brtul zhugs la brtson zhing sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa tshol ba na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags @571b rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-1: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag mngon par shes pa tshol ba dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-2: chos 'chad pa'i gam du rgyus med par nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur la bdud de skabs la lar dud 'gro'i lus su sprul te nor bu de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-3: nor bu sna tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-4: gzhan yang yi ge glegs bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-5: smyu gu la sogs pa ya mtshan pa'i dngos po sna tshogs pa khas bzung ste skye bo dag la byin nas phyis bdud de skye bo de'i lus la gzhug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-6: la lar nyan pa po dag bslu bar 'dod pas nor bu rin po che dag sa'i 'og tu sbas te des bstan pa na zla 'od lta bu'i snang ba skye bo de dag gis mthong ste sngar ma mthong ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-8: sman dang rtsva sna tshogs pa za zhing kha zas bzang po mi za'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-9: la lar til 'bru gcig tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-10: nas 'bru gcig tsam re zos kyang bdud kyi mthus de'i lus kyi sha rgyas shing stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-11: bdud des dge slong la skur ba 'debs shing rab tu byung ba la kha zer nas ngo tsha dang khrel med par spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:571b-12: ngag tu 'di ltar smra bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-0: yul khams gzhan gyi rin po @572a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-2: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na 'phags pa rnams sbas pa'i tshul du yod pa dag smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-3: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i skye bo ya mtshan pa dag gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-8: gshin rje'i rigs kyi 'dre dag rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-9: la lar rang nyid log g-yem spyod de sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig cing skye bo gzhan dag kyang de'i rjes su 'brangs nas lkog tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-10: la lar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing rtsva dang shing za la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-11: gcig tu ma nges pa'i las dag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-12: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572a-13: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-0: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems la rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul bsgyur sna tshogs byed par 'dod nas 'bad pa chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu gang @572b las 'byung ba tshol zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'dod pa na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-2: rigs kyi bu gang dag rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing mi des lag tu me 'bar ba bzung ste cha mang por bgos nas chos nyan pa po 'khor rnam bzhi'i mgo la bzhag cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-3: nyan pa po de dag gi mgor bzhag pa'i me lce 'dom gang tsam du 'bar yang tsha ba'i rang bzhin yang med sreg par yang mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-4: skabs la lar chu'i steng du sa bde ba la 'gro ba bzhin du 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-5: la lar par snang la mi g-yo bar bde bar 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-6: la lar ril pa'i nang du 'jug cing snod chung ngu'i nang du yang 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-7: skar khung gi dra mig dang rtsig pa la yang thogs pa med par 'gro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-8: mtshon cha dang dmag la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-10: rang nyid sangs rgyas su khas 'che zhing gos dkar po gyon nas dge slong gi phyag dang du len /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-11: bsam gtan dang tshul khrims la skur ba 'debs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-12: rab tu byung ba dag la kha zer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:572b-13: skye bo dag la klan ka tshol zhing ngo tsha dang khrel med par spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-1: tu rdzu 'phrul la dbang thob par smra zhing la lar skye bo dag logs shig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-3: bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi yang dag pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-4: des log par g-yem pa la bsngags par byed cing sdig pa chen po la mi 'dzem /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-5: ngo tsha dang bral ba'i tshig la chos kyi gtam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-7: 'di la nam mkha' dang sa'i lha mthu bo che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-13: rtsva shing gi lha bskal pa'i thog ma nas yod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-14: yang na klu bdud dang drang srong tshe zad nas bdud du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-15: yang drang srong tshe zad nas 'chi ba la thug pa lus ma brjes par 'dre gzhan de'i lus la zhugs te rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-16: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573a-17: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-0: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs @573b la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'gog pa la 'jug par 'dod cing yun ring du brtson pas sprul bsgyur gyi rang bzhin la stong pa zab mo tshol ba na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-1: zhes smra zhing rigs kyi bu gang dag stong pa tshol ba dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing 'khor gyi nang du rang nyid kyi lus glo bur du mi snang bar gyur te 'khor gyis mi mthong zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-2: stong pa de'i nang nas thol gyis byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-3: 'byung ba dang nub par byed pa la dbang thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-4: la lar lus shin tu dvangs pa beed'urya ltar ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-5: rkang lag brkyang bskum tsam gyis tsandan gyi dri 'byin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-6: la lar bshang gci yang ro sbrang rtsi ltar ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-7: rgyu des 'dul khrims la skur ba 'debs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-8: rab tu byung ba la brnyas shing smod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-9: rtag par ngag tu rgyu dang 'bras bu med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-10: lan gcig shi nas slar gtan du mi skye /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-11: 'phags pa dang so so skye bo med ces smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-12: stong pa mngon du gyur kyang lkog tu log g-yem spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:573b-14: de dag 'dod pa dang du blangs te stong pa'i sems thob nas rgyu dang 'bras bu med ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574a-9: gzhan yang lo stong dang khri lon nas mi 'chi bar mi ma yin du gyur cing yul khams su 'byung ste rgas nas bdud du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574a-10: mi de la 'tshe bar byed pa'i tshul des skyo ba'i sems skyes nas de'i lus las bral ba dang slob mar bcas pa la rgyal po'i chad pa phog par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574a-11: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574a-12: yang rigs kyi bu dag tshor ba'i phung po mchog tu stong zhing log par rtog pa la ma thogs par brtan cing rdzogs la gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las sems la tshe ring bar 'dod pa'i dbang gis lus ngal ba khyad du bsad nas yun ring du 'tsho ba'i thabs tshol zhing las kyi dbang gis skye 'chi dor nas rang dbang gis skye 'chi nus pa'i gzugs phra mos ring du gnas par 'dod pa na de'i tshe lha'i bdud kyis glags rnyed nas de ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs shing mi de la zhugs te ngag gis mdo sde bshad kyang rang nyid la bdud zhugs pa ma tshor bar bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-0: rigs kyi @574b bu gang dag ring du 'tsho bar 'dod pa dag gi gam du 'ongs nas stan la 'dug ste chos 'chad cing 'di skad smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-1: rtag par yul gzhan du thogs pa med par 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-3: la lar dpag tshad khri'i bar du phyin te dbugs 'byung 'jug tsam du slar 'khor ba na yul de nas yo byad blangs nas 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-4: la lar khyim gcig na rang dang lhan cig tu 'dug pa dag la khyim de'i shar gyi rtsig drung nas nub kyi rtseg drung gi bar gom pa 'ga' tsam gyi sa la yang lo du mar bgrod kyang mi sleb par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-5: des de dag yid ches shing dad nas de nyid sangs rgyas dngos su byon pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-6: yang de'i ngag tu phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad nga'i bu yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-7: bdag las sangs rgyas thams cad skyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-8: nga ye nas sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon pa yin gyi 'jig rten las 'da' ba la lam bsgom pa la brten nas 'byung ba ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-9: zhes zer te; 'di la 'jig rten la gnas pa'i rang dbang can gyi lha'i bdud ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-11: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-12: sha za'i bu byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:574b-13: ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba dag la bskul te de dag gi gzi brjid dang mdangs 'phrog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-0: la lar rang nyid slob dpon la ma brten par lam bsgoms @575a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-2: rdo rje 'chang yin zhes bkur du bcug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-3: khyod la tshe ring bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-4: zhes smras te bu mo mdzes mar sprul nas de dang log par g-yem pa shin tu spyod pas ring po ma lon par de'i klad pa dang mchin pa yang skem par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-5: rang gcig pu zla med par smra bar byed la gzhan gyis nyan pa na 'dres brlams pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-6: gzhan gyi sems 'gyur zhing gzhan dag la gnod pa byas pas rgyal po'i chad pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-7: chad pa ma byung yang byung ba dang 'dra bar lus bskams te 'chi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-8: de lta bu'i skye bo de rmongs shing myos te srog chad pa la thug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-9: khyed cag thog ma nas rig na 'khor bar mi 'jug la 'khrul zhing bslus pas ma rig na mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-12: bdud rnam pa bcu po 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-13: snyigs ma'i dus su nga'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ste lam sgrub pa'i skye bo dag gi sems la 'jug par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-15: rang gi lus mngon par bstan te bdag ring po nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575a-16: zhes smra zhing log g-yem gyi spyod pa bsngags par byed la sangs rgyas kyi 'dul khrims bshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-0: bdud sdig can slob mar bcas pas log @575b par g-yem pa gcig nas gcig tu 'phel bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-1: 'di lta bu'i phyin ci log gi gdon de dag gis sems rmongs su bcug nas nye na tshe rabs dgu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-2: ring na tshe rabs brgya'i bar du de ltar spyod cing bdud kyi gnyen du 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-3: tshe 'phos nas bdud kyi ris su 'gyur la de nas kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dor nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-4: khyod rnam par grol ba thob kyang 'gog pa la lam 'jug par sngon gyi smon lam mi gtang bar bstan pa'i tha ma la snying rje chen po bskyed de yang dag pa'i sems kyis bltas pas sems can rnams skyob cing grol bar byas te bdud kyis mi tshugs par yang dag pa'i don thob par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-5: ngas khyed cag skye shi las thar par byas pas khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-7: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-9: rnam pa bcu po 'di ting nge 'dzin la snang ba'i yul te; 'di kun 'du shes kyi phung po la sems sbyangs pa 'khrul ba las 'di 'dra bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-10: sems can rmongs pa rnams rang gi drod ma zin pas rgyu rkyen 'di lta bu dang 'phrad nas 'khrul pa la rang nyid kyis ma shes par bdag 'phags pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:575b-11: zhes rdzun chen po smras te mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-0: khyed cag ngas bstan pa 'di la brten nas nga mya @576a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-1: ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu snyigs ma'i dus su ngas bstan pa'i don 'di dag rgyas par shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-3: lha'i bu'i bdud kyis skabs mi rnyed par skyong ba dang srung zhing skyob na bla na med pa'i lam thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-6: sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-9: rigs kyi bu gang dag ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas 'du shes kyi phung po zad pa na skye bo de rgyun du rmi lam dang 'du shes 'gags nas sad pa dang gnyid log pa 'dra zhing gsal rig dben zhing dvangs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-11: yang mdun gyi yul gyi rnam pa dang rags pa dang thogs pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-12: 'di la 'jig rten gyi sa chen po dang ri dang chu klung dag la bltas pa na me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan shar ba bzhin 'ongs pa na gos pa med cing song ba na rjes med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-13: rdzun pa'i snang ba tsam las sngon gyi bag chags zad de rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin kho na lus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576a-14: 'di nas skye 'gag gi rtsa ba mngon par rig par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-0: phyogs bcu'i @576b rigs bcu gnyis kyi sems can gyi rigs kyi rtsa ba shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-1: so so'i skye ba'i rgyu ma mthong yang mtshungs par skye ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-2: smig rgyu g-yo ba dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-3: gsob tu gyur pa'i dbang po dang yul gyi mthar thug pa'i gnad kyis gnas shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-4: 'di la 'du byed kyi phung po'i sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-5: gal te smig rgyu dang 'dra bar g-yo ba de rang gi rang bzhin la zhugs te sngon gyi bag chags zad pa na rlabs dang bral ba'i chu dang bar 'gyur ba dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-6: 'di la 'du byed kyi phung po zad pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-7: skye bo de sems can snyigs ma las 'da' bar nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-8: rgyu 'di la brtag na dben zhing mi mngon pa rdzun pa'i 'du shes rtsa bar gyur pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-11: yang dag pa'i shes rab thob ste lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas lha'i bdud rigs bcu pos glags mi rnyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-12: gdod rang rang gi rigs kyi rtsa ba phra zhing mthar thug par dpyad de shes par nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:576b-13: yang so so'i rigs kyi rgyu'i rtsa ba mngon du gyur kyang de la khad kyis g-yo ba'i rgyu la dpyad pa na rtsva ba'i rgyu las gal te rnam par rtog pa skyes na skye bo de rgyu med pa'i lta ba gnyis su ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-3: skye bo de skye ba'i rtsa ba mthong ba na mig gi dbang po yon tan brgyad brgya dang ldan pa'i mthu la brten nas bskal pa brgyad khri tshun chad kyi sems can rnams skye shi rim par brgyud de 'khor bar 'khor ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-4: sems can rnams 'khor bar 'khor ba'i gnas bskal pa brgyad khri phan chad mi snang ba'i rtog pa skyes nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams bskal pa brgyad khri tshun gyi 'di dag rgyu med par rang bzhin gyis yod snyam du rtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-5: de ltar rtogs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba stor nas mu stegs kyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-7: da lta'i rgyu med par mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-9: skye bo de skye ba'i rtsa ba mthong ba na mi nas mir skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-10: bya nas byar skye bar shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-22: kha bsgyur ba ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-23: bskal pa brgyad khri'i bar du yang gzhan du 'gyur ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-24: da lta'i lus 'di phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du yang 'di kho na bzhin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577a-25: ngas gzhi nas byang chub ces bya ba ma mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-0: ji ltar byang @577b chub sgrub pa'i bya ba yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-1: 'di la da lta'i dngos po sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa gzhi nas rgyu med par shes par gyis shig ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-2: de ltar rtog pas yang dag pa'i lta ba stor nas mu stegs kyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-3: 'di la dang po rgyu med par smra ba'i grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-5: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas lha'i bdud rigs bcu pos glags mi rnyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-6: gdod rang rang gi rigs kyi rtsa ba phra zhing mthar thug par dpyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-7: gal te kun tu rtag pa'i don la rnam par rtog pa'i sems skyes na skye bo de kun tu rtag par lta ba bzhir ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-8: de la dang po ni; sems dang yul gnyis rang bzhin la dpyad nas gnyis ka la rgyu gtan nas ma rnyed pas bsgom zhing sbyang bzhin du bskal pa nyi khri'i nang gi phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams skye 'gag rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor te rang bzhin de las 'da' ba med par mthong nas 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:577b-9: rtag pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-0: skye bo de 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la dpyad de khams bzhi'i rang bzhin rtag par gnas so snyam du rtogs nas bsgom zhing sbyang bzhin du bskal pa bzhi khri'i nang gi phyogs bcu'i sems @578a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-1: can rnams kyi skye 'gag rtag par gnas te rang bzhin de las 'da' ba med par mthong nas 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-2: rtag pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-4: skye bo de skye mched drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-7: sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i mthar thug par dpyad de rang bzhin rtag pa'o snyam du bsam nas bsgom zhing sbyang bzhin du bskal pa brgyad khri'i nang gi phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams 'khor bar 'khor yang gdod ma nas rtag par gnas pa'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur bar mthong zhing de la dpyad nas rtag pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-9: skye bo de 'du shes skye ba'i rgyun 'gag pa'i rjes su slar yang rgyun 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-13: 'gag pa'i 'du shes gcig tu 'gag pa'i phyir rang skye zhing 'gag pa med par rigs so snyam du sgro btags nas rtag pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578a-14: de ltar rtag par 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i lta ba stor nas mu stegs kyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo; ;'di la gnyis pa kun tu rtag par smra ba'i grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-0: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la @578b sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur bas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-1: skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba phra zhing mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa khad kyis skyes nas bdag dang gzhan du sgro 'dogs pa na skye bo de phyin ci log bzhi'i nang du lhung nas kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-4: mi rtag par lta ba'i lta bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-6: skye bo de rmad du byung ba'i gsal rig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab par mthong nas de'i mthar thug pa na rang nyid 'phags pa'o snyam du bsam nas lus 'di nyid kyis phyogs bcur khyab cing rnam par mi g-yo la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-7: sems can thams cad nga'i sems kyi nang du rang skye zhing rang 'chi bar snang ngo snyam nas rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-14: skye bo de rang gi sems la mi blta bar phyogs bcu'i gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la dpyad pa na mthar bskal [?] pas 'jig pa'i gnas su mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi mi rtag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:578b-16: mthar bskal pas mi 'jig pa de ni; rtag pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-0: skye bo de rang gi sems cha shas su phye ste dpyad pa na shin tu phra zhing lkog tu gyur pa rdul phra rab lta bur phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro yang @579a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-3: 'jig par yang byed cing de'i 'jig pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-5: skye 'chi thams cad nga las byung zhing mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-8: skye bo de 'du shes kyi phung po zad par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-10: 'du byed kyi phung po'i rgyun 'jug par ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-12: 'du byed kyi phung po rgyun du 'jug pas rtag pa'i rang bzhin no snyam du rtogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-13: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la sogs pa ni; gcig tu 'gag zin pas mi rtag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-18: mi rtag pa'o snyam du sems pas mu stegs can gyi lta bar lhung nas byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-19: 'di la gsum pa rtag par lta ba'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579a-20: yang ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba'i mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa khad kyis skyes nas rang gi cha shas la rtog cing dmigs pa na skye bo de bdag tu lta ba bzhir ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-0: skye bo de'i sems la skye ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu @579b kun tu 'khor zhing rgyun 'jug pa gcig tu mi sdod par sems pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' yod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-1: rim par 'thud pa'i sems kyi rgyun la mtha' med do snyam du sems so; ;gnyis pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-2: skye bo de brtags pa na bskal pa brgyad khri'i nang gi sems can rnams mthong la bskal pa brgyad khri phan chad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-3: mthong ba dang thos pa'i gnas med pas de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-4: mtha' dang bral ba yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-5: sems can yod pa'i gnas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-6: mtha' yod pa'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-8: skye bo de 'di snyam du bdag gis thams cad shes pa'i tshul la brtags pa na mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin khong du chud par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-9: sna tshogs pa'i sems can sems kyis gsal bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-10: bdag las gzhan sems can de dag la rang bzhin mthong ba'i sems yod par mi shes so snyam du bsam pas de dag gi mtha' dang bral ba'i sems thob par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-11: mtha' yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid yod do snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-13: skye bo de 'du byed kyi phung po'i stong pa la dpyad nas rang gi sems shes pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi sems la dpags shing brtags nas de dag las 'ga' zhig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:579b-16: 'chi'o snyam ste 'jig rten thams cad las phyed ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-3: mtha' med pa las brtags pas mu stegs kyi lta bar lhung nas byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-4: 'di la bzhi pa mtha' yod par lta ba'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-5: yang ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa bags kyis skyes nas 'du shes kyi mthong ba'i nang nas rtog pa skyes te skye bo de phyin ci log bzhis gcig tu ma nges par sna tshogs su smra ba'i rdzun pa'i lta ba'i ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-7: skye bo de sems 'gyur ba'i rgyu la brtag pa na 'pho zhing 'gyur bar mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-8: mi rtag pa zhes bya la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-9: rgyun mi 'chad par mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-11: gang mthong bar bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-15: rim par 'thud pa'i rgyu'i rang bzhin mi 'chad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580a-17: rim par brgyud pa las 'brel ba'i dngos po bral ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-0: gnas lugs ltar kun tu brtags pa na lta ba @580b gzhan mthong zhing chos tshol ba po dag gis de'i don dris pa na lan du nga da lta skye ba yang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-5: 'grib pa yang yin zhes 'khrul ba'i tshig ma nges par smra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-6: dri ba po'i sngar yid la nges pa'i tshig don stor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-8: skye po de sems la brtags pa na gang yod pa'i gnas ma rnyed pas med par rtogs nas gzhan gyis dris pa na lan du ci yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-9: zhes lan gcig pu smra la med ces bya ba'i tshig ma gtogs pa gzhan mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-11: skye bo de sems la brtags pa na gang du yang med pa'i gnas ma rnyed pas yod par rtogs nas gzhan gyis dris pa na lan du yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-12: zhes lan gcig pu smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-13: yod ces bya ba'i tshig ma gtogs pa gzhan mi smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-15: skye bo de yod pa dang med pa gnyis kar mthong nas de gnyis phan tshun 'gal bas de'i sems 'khrul nas dri ba po dag la lan du yod pa yang yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-18: yod pa'i nang nas med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:580b-19: zhes rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa'i tshig smra bas gzhan gyis zhib tu brgal zhing 'dri ba'i skabs mi rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-0: 'di ltar rtog cing sems pas kun tu 'khrul zhing rdzun smra ba'i mu stegs @581a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-1: can gyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-2: 'di la lnga pa phyin ci log bzhi'i rang bzhin kun tu 'khrul zhing mi 'chi ba smra ba'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-3: yang ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa khad kyis skyes nas rnam rtog gi rgyun zad pa med par skye zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-4: shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs yod ces phyin ci log gi rtog pa 'khrul bas res 'ga' rang gi lus rtag par bzung nas gzugs nga'o snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-5: res 'ga' rang nyid kyis thams cad la khyab par mthong nas nga la gzugs yod snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-6: res 'ga' mdun gyi yul rnams la rang dbang du longs spyad pas nga gzugs la dbang snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-7: res 'ga' 'du byed kyi 'brel ba rgyun ma chad pa la brten nas nga gzugs la gnas so snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-8: 'di ltar rnam par rtog cing shi pa'i 'og tu gzugs yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581a-10: de bzhin du phung po gzhan rnams la rigs pa spos te rnam pa bcu drug yod par rtog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-0: 'di nas yang na kun nas @581b nyon mongs pa kho nar 'gyur la yang na rnam par byang ba kho nar 'gyur zhing de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gcig tu gnas kyang phan tshun du mi sgrib bo zhes smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-1: 'di ltar shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-2: zhes rnam par rtog pas mu stegs kyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-3: 'di la drug pa phung po lnga'i nang nas shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-4: zhes phyin ci log tu smra ba'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-5: yang ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba'i mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa khad kyis skyes nas sngar gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes rnams 'gag pa las rnam par rtog pa skyes pas skye bo de shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs med ces phyin ci log gi sems skye ste gzugs 'gag par mthong ba na lus kyi rten med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-6: 'du shes 'gag par mthong ba na sems chags pa'i yul med ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-7: tshor ba 'gag par mthong ba na phyi ma'i 'brel ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-8: phung po'i rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag na skye ba tsam yod kyang tshor ba dang 'du shes med pa rtsa shing dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:581b-9: 'di nyid da lta thob pa med na shi ba'i 'og tu lta ga la yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-1: zhib tu brtag na shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs med ces smra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-2: 'di bzhin du rigs pa spos te dpyad na gzugs med pa rnam pa brgyad yod do snyam du sems so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-3: 'di nas brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-5: 'bras bu thams cad stong par mthong zhing ming tsam du zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-8: 'di ltar shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-9: zhes rtog pas mu stegs kyi lta bar ltung ste byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la 'khrul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-10: 'di la bdun pa phung po lnga'i nang nas shi ba'i 'og tu gzugs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-11: zhes phyin ci log tu smra ba'i mu stegs can zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-12: yang ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dag yang dag pa'i don la sems gsal zhing mi g-yo bar gyur pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-016:582a-13: skye ba'i rigs kyi rtsa ba mthar thug par dpyad de rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i rtog pa khad kyis skyes nas 'du byed gnas shing yod pa'i tshe tshor ba dang 'du shes gnyis 'gag ste med pas yod pa dang med pa de gnyis ka la brtag ste so sor 'jig par mthong la /
